content: Tau ob xyoos tom qaab kws cov Yixalayees tsiv nraag tebchaws Iziv lug, thaus lub ob hlis ntuj nub xab ib, tug TSWV has rua Mauxes huv tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib nraag taj suabpuam Xinais has tas,
“Aloos meb ca le sau cov Yixalayees npe lawv le tej cuab kwvtij hab tej tsev tuabneeg. Sau taagnrho txhua tug txivneej
kws noobnyoog neeg nkaum xyoo rov sau kws ua taug tubrog lawm tej npe.
Kuas ib cuab kwvtij twg tsaa ib tug lug ua tug thawj ntawm txhua xeem lug ua tug paab koj.”

Ntawm nuav yog cov txivneej kws yog thawjcoj ntawm puab tej xeem kws raug xaiv ntawm tej paab tej pawg tuaj ua teg num nuav: Lunpees yog Sede-us tug tub Elixus Xime-oos yog Xulisadais tug tub Selumiyees Yudas yog Aminadas tug tub Nasoos Ixakhas yog Zuag tug tub Nethanees Xenpuloos yog Heloos tug tub Eli-as Efalayees yog Amihus tug tub Elisamas Manaxes yog Pedaxes tug tub Nkamaliyees Npeenyamees yog Nkide-aunis tug tub Anpidaas Daas yog Amisadais tug tub Ahi-exes Aseles yog Aukhalas tug tub Pankiyees Khas yog Deyees tug tub Eli-axas Nathalis yog Enas tug tub Ahilas
Mauxes hab Aloos coj kaum ob leeg txivneej nuav moog ua cov paab obtug,

nub xab ib lub ob hlis ntuj, puab hu taagnrho txhua xeem hab txhua tsev tuabneeg tuaj txoos ua ke sau puab tej npe. Taagnrho cov tub hluas kws noobnyoog neeg nkaum xyoo rov sau puavleej muab sau npe hab suav tseg,
lawv le tug TSWV tau saamfwm tseg. Yog le ntawd, Mauxes txhaj sau cov pejxeem npe nyob tom taj suabpuam Xinais.
Cov Lunpees caajceg kws yog Yakhauj tug tub hlub tsev tuabneeg, taagnrho cov txivneej kws noobnyoog neeg nkaum xyoo rov sau kws ua taug tubrog, sau npe lawv le puab caajceg.
Xeem Lunpees, suav tau plaub caug rau txheeb tsib puas leej.
Xeem Xime-oos, taagnrho cov txivneej kws noobnyoog neeg nkaum xyoo rov sau kws ua taug tubrog, sau npe lawv le puab caajceg.
Xeem Xime-oos, suav tau tsib caug cuaj txheeb peb puas leej.
Cov Khas, taagnrho cov txivneej kws noobnyoog neeg nkaum xyoo rov sau kws ua taug tubrog, sau npe lawv le puab caajceg.
Xeem Khas, suav tau plaub caug tsib txheeb rau pua tsib caug leej.
Cov Yudas, taagnrho cov txivneej kws noobnyoog neeg nkaum xyoo rov sau kws ua taug tubrog, sau npe lawv le puab caajceg.
Xeem Yudas, suav tau xyaa caum plaub txheeb rau pua leej.
Cov Ixakhas, taagnrho cov txivneej kws noobnyoog neeg nkaum xyoo rov sau kws ua taug tubrog, sau npe lawv le puab caajceg.
Xeem Ixakhas, suav tau tsib caug plaub txheeb plaub puas leej.
Cov Xenpuloos, taagnrho cov txivneej kws noobnyoog neeg nkaum xyoo rov sau kws ua taug tubrog, sau npe lawv le puab caajceg.
Xeem Xenpuloos, suav tau tsib caug xyaa txheeb plaub puas leej.
Cov Yauxej, taagnrho cov txivneej kws noobnyoog neeg nkaum xyoo rov sau kws ua taug tubrog, sau npe lawv le puab caajceg.
Xeem Efalayees, suav tau plaub caug txheeb tsib puas leej.
Cov Manaxes, taagnrho cov txivneej kws noobnyoog neeg nkaum xyoo rov sau kws ua taug tubrog, sau npe lawv le puab caajceg.
Xeem Manaxes, suav tau peb caug ob txheeb ob puas leej.
Cov Npeenyamees, taagnrho cov txivneej kws noobnyoog neeg nkaum xyoo rov sau kws ua taug tubrog, sau npe lawv le puab caajceg.
Xeem Npeenyamees, suav tau peb caug tsib txheeb plaub puas leej.
Cov Daas, taagnrho cov txivneej kws noobnyoog neeg nkaum xyoo rov sau kws ua taug tubrog, sau npe lawv le puab caajceg.
Cov Daas, suav tau rau caum ob txheeb xyaa pua leej.
Cov Aseles, taagnrho cov txivneej kws noobnyoog neeg nkaum xyoo rov sau kws ua taug tubrog, sau npe lawv le puab caajceg.
Xeem Aseles, suav tau plaub caug ib txheeb tsib puas leej.
Cov Nathalis, taagnrho cov txivneej kws noobnyoog neeg nkaum xyoo rov sau kws ua taug tubrog, sau npe lawv le puab caajceg.
Xeem Nathalis, suav tau tsib caug peb txheeb plaub puas leej.
Taagnrho cov txivneej nuav puavleej yog cov kws Mauxes, Aloos hab cov Yixalayees kaum ob tug thawjcoj paab obtug suav, puab nyag ua tug sawv cev ntawm nyag xeem.
Cov Yixalayees kws noobnyoog neeg nkaum xyoo lossis laug dlua ntawd kws ua taug tubrog puavleej tuaj sau npe lawv le nwg caajceg.
Puab suav taagnrho tau rau pua peb txheeb tsib puas tsib caug leej.
Tsi tau suav cov Levis npe nrug kaum ob xeem nuav,
rua qhov tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas,
“Thaus koj sau cov txivneej kws ua taug tubrog npe, koj tsi xob suav cov Levis npe rua huv.

Tabsis koj tsaa cov Levis ua cov kwv lub Tsevntaub kws yog qhov chaw kws nrug kuv sis ntsib hab tej khoom kws nyob huv, puab yog cov tsaa lub tsevntaub, hab tsaa puab tej tsev nyob ncig lub tsevntaub ntawd.

Yog thaus twg mej tshais chaw tawm huv mej lub yeej moog, cov Levis yog cov kws muab lub Tsevntaub txu hab thaus mej moog nyob dlua lub yeej tshab, cov Levis yog cov kws tsaa lub tsevntaub ntawd. Lwm tug kws txaav lug ze lub Tsevntaub yuav raug tua tuag.
Dlua le cov Yixalayees yuavtsum tsaa puab tej tsevntaub lawv le puab tej paab ntawd, txhua tug txivneej yuavtsum nyob huv nwg lub yeej hab huv qaab puab tug chij.

Tabsis cov Levis yuavtsum tsaa puab tej tsevntaub nyob ncig lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib hab ua cov zuv lub tsevntaub sis ntsib, kuas tsi xob muaj leejtwg tuaj ze rua ntawm lub Tsevntaub hab ua rua kuv chim rua cov Yixalayees.”
Yog le ntawd, cov Yixalayees txhaj ua txhua yaam lawv le tug TSWV tau saamfwm rua Mauxes lawm.
Tug TSWV qha rua Mauxes hab Aloos has tas,

“Thaus twg cov Yixalayees tsaa puab tej tsevntaub, txhua tug tuabneeg yuavtsum tsaa nwg lub tsevntaub nyob rua huv qaab nwg xeem tug chij hab huv tsev tuabneeg tug qaab chij. Mej tej tsev yuavtsum nyob puagncig lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib.
“Tu saab nubtuaj rua xeem Yudas, puab moog tsaa tsevntaub nyob ua puab ib pawg, cov Yudas tug thawjcoj yog Aminadas tug tub Nasoos,
suav taagnrho nwg cov tuabneeg muaj xyaa caum plaub txheeb rau pua leej.
Xeem Ixakhas, tsaa puab tej tsevntaub nyob txuas nkaus ntawm xeem Yudas, cov Ixakhas tug thawjcoj yog Zuag tug tub Nethanees,
suav taagnrho nwg cov tuabneeg muaj tsib caug plaub txheeb plaub puas leej.
Txuas ntawd, yog xeem Xenpuloos, cov Xenpuloos tug thawjcoj yog Heloos tug tub Eli-as,
suav taagnrho nwg cov tuabneeg muaj tsib caug xyaa txheeb plaub puas leej.
Suav taagnrho cov tuabneeg kws nyob rua saab yeej kws cov Yudas nyob, muaj ib puas yim caum rau txheeb plaub puas leej. Puab yog cov kws yuav tawm moog ua ntej.
“Tu saab nraag rua xeem Lunpees, cov Lunpees tug thawjcoj yog Sede-as tug tub Elixus,
suav taagnrho nwg cov tuabneeg muaj plaub caug rau txheeb tsib puas leej.
Hab xeem Xime-oos, tsaa puab tej tsevntaub nyob txuas nkaus ntawm xeem Lunpees, cov Xime-oos tug thawjcoj yog Xulisadais tug tub Selumiyees,
suav taagnrho nwg cov tuabneeg muaj tsib caug cuaj txheeb peb puas leej.
Txuas ntawd yog xeem Khas, cov Khas tug thawjcoj yog Luyees tug tub Eli-axas,
suav taagnrho nwg cov tuabneeg muaj plaub caug tsib txheeb rau pua tsib caug leej.
Suav taagnrho cov tuabneeg kws nyob rua saab yeej kws xeem Lunpees nyob, muaj ib puas tsib caug ib txheeb plaub puas tsib caug leej. Puab yog cov kws tawm moog ua paab ob.

“Cov Levis maam le kwv tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib tuaj nruab nraab ob paab kws moog ua ntej hab ob paab kws moog ua qaab. Plaub paab ntawd nyag yuavtsum moog nyob nyag qhov chaw lawv le tub faib tseg lawm, txhua paab twg nyag yuavtsum moog nyob huv qaab nyag tug chij xwb.
“Tu saab nubpoob rua xeem Efalayees, puab moog tsaa puab tej tsevntaub nyob ua puab ib pawg, cov Efalayees tug thawjcoj yog Amihus tug tub Elisamas,
suav taagnrho nwg cov tuabneeg muaj plaub caug txheeb tsib puas leej.
Hab xeem Manaxes tsaa puab tej tsevntaub nyob txuas nkaus ntawm cov Efalayees, cov Manaxes tug thawjcoj yog Pedaxes tug tub Nkamaliyees,
suav taagnrho nwg cov tuabneeg muaj peb caug ob txheeb ob puas leej.
Txuas ntawd, yog xeem Npeenyamees, cov Npeenyamees tug thawjcoj yog Nkede-aunis tug tub Anpidaas,
suav taagnrho nwg cov tuabneeg muaj peb caug tsib txheeb plaub puas leej.
Suav taagnrho cov tuabneeg kws nyob rua saab yeej kws xeem Efalayees nyob, muaj ib puas yim txheeb ib puas leej. Puab yog cov kws tawm moog ua paab peb.
“Tu saab peg rua xeem Daas, puab moog tsaa tsevntaub nyob ua puab ib pawg, cov Daas tug thawjcoj yog Amisadais tug tub Ahi-exes,
suav taagnrho nwg cov tuabneeg muaj rau caum ob txheeb xyaa pua leej.
Hab xeem Aseles tsaa puab tej tsevntaub nyob txuas nkaus ntawm xeem Daas, cov Aseles tug thawjcoj yog Aukhalas tug tub Pankiyees,
suav taagnrho nwg cov tuabneeg muaj plaub caug ib txheeb tsib puas leej.
Txuas ntawd yog xeem Nathalis, cov Nathalis tug thawjcoj yog Enas tug tub Ahilas,
suav taagnrho nwg cov tuabneeg muaj tsib caug peb txheeb plaub puas leej.
Suav taagnrho cov tuabneeg kws nyob rua saab yeej kws xeem Daas nyob, muaj ib puas tsib caug xyaa txheeb rau pua leej. Puab yog cov kws tawm moog ua paab kawg.”
Xaam taagnrho cov Yixalayees kws muab faib ua tej paab tej pawg ntawd, muaj rau pua peb txheeb tsib puas tsib caug leej.
Tabsis tsi tau sau cov Levis npe nrug cov Yixalayees, lawv le tug TSWV tau saamfwm rua Mauxes lawm.

Yog le ntawd, cov Yixalayees txhaj ua lawv le tej lug kws tug TSWV tau saamfwm rua Mauxes. Puab nyag tsaa nyag tej tsevntaub rua huv qaab nyag xeem tug chij, hab puab sawv kev moog ua tej paab lawv le nyag xeem.
Ntawm nuav yog Aloos hab Mauxes obtug tsev tuabneeg, thaus lub sijhawm kws tug TSWV has rua Mauxes sau Roob Xinais.
Aloos muaj plaub tug tub: Nadas yog tug tub hlub, Anpihus, Ele-axas hab Ithamas.
Puavleej muab puab txhawb meejthawj ua povthawj,

tabsis Nadas hab Anpihus obtug raug tua tuag thaus kws tug TSWV tsi tau has kuas obtug rauv tawg hlawv khoom fij rua tug TSWV tom taj suabpuam Xinais. Obtug tsi tau muaj mivnyuas, yog le ntawd, Ele-axas hab Ithamas txhaj tau ua ob tug povthawj rua Aloos pum taag Aloos tam neej.
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas,
“Coj xeem Levis txaav lug rua tom hauv ntej nuav hab tsaa puab ua Aloos kws yog tug povthawj cov tubkhai.
Puab yuav ua tej num huv tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib hab ua cov povthawj lub luag num hab ua num rua cov pejxeem suavdlawg.
Puab ua cov saib taagnrho tej khoom siv huv tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib hab ua num rua cov Yixalayees.
Hab koj yuavtsum muab cov Levis cob rua Aloos hab nwg cov tub; puab yog cov kws xaiv ntawm cov Yixalayees lug muab rua Aloos taagnrho.
Koj yuavtsum tsaa Aloos hab nwg cov tub ua cov povthawj tuav lub luag num; yog leejtwg xaav txeeb ua, ca le muab tug ntawd tua kuas tuag.”
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas,
“Kuv xaiv cov Levis tawm ntawm cov Yixalayees lug hloov taagnrho cov Yixalayees cov tub hlub chaw. Cov Levis yeej yog kuv tug,

rua qhov txhua tug tub hlub puavleej yog kuv tug. Thaus kuv tua cov Iziv tej tub hlub, kuv yeej tshwj taagnrho cov Yixalayees tej tub hlub ua kuv tug, tsi has tuabneeg lossis tsaj txhu. Puab puavleej yog kuv tug. Kuv yog tug TSWV.”
Tug TSWV saamfwm rua Mauxes tom taj suabpuam Xinais has tas,
“Koj yuavtsum sau cov Levis npe lawv le puab tej caajceg hab tej tsev tuabneeg, txhua tug txivneej kws noobnyoog ib hlis rov sau yuavtsum sau npe huv tuabsi,.”
Ces Mauxes txawm ua lawv le tug TSWV tau has tseg.
Levis muaj peb tug tub hu ua: Nkesoos, Kauhas hab Melalis, puab yog yawmkoob rua puab xeem hab puab caajceg.
Nkesoos muaj ob tug tub hu ua: Linpenis hab Sime-is;
Kauhas muaj plaub tug tub hu ua: Alamas, Ixahas, Henploos hab Uxiyees;
hab Melalis muaj ob tug tub hu ua: Mahalis hab Musis. Puab cov nuav yog Levis caajceg, lawv le puab cov yawmkoob.
Linpenis hab Sime-is cuab kwvtij nuav yog caajceg ntawm Nkesoos tsev tuabneeg.
Suav taagnrho cov txivneej kws noobnyoog ib hlis rov sau muaj xyaa txheeb tsib puas leej.
Cuab kwvtij nuav puab tsaa tsevntaub nyob rua tom qaab lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib saab nubpoob,
Tug thawj kws coj Nkesoos caajceg yog Layees tug tub Eli-axas.
Puab lub luag num yog ua cov tu tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib, cov ntaub vuv saab huv, cov ntaub vuv saab nrau, cov ntaub thaiv qhovrooj,
cov ntaub xov vaaj ncig lub Tsevntaub, lub tshaav puam, lub thaaj, hab dlaim ntaub roojvaag kws xov saab nrau lub tshaav puam. Puab ua cov saib taagnrho tej hlua hab txhua yaam ntawd huv tuabsi.
Alamas, Ixahas, Henploos hab Uxiyees puab cuab kwvtij nuav yog Kauhas caajceg.
Suav taagnrho cov txivneej kws noobnyoog ib hlis rov sau, muaj yim txheeb rau pua leej.
Cuab kwvtij nuav puab tsaa tsevntaub txuas nkaus ntawm lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib saab nraag,
tug thawj kws coj Kauhas caajceg, yog Uxiyees tug tub Elixafas.

Puab lub luag num yog tu lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg, lub rooj, tug ncej txawb teeb, cov thaaj, tej khoom kws cov povthawj siv nyob huv Chaav Dlawbhuv, dlaim ntaub thaiv lub qhovrooj kws moog rua huv Chaav Dlawbhuv Kawg Nkaus, hab puab ua cov kws tu txhua yaam khoom siv rua tej ntawd.
Tug thawjcoj cov Levis yog tug povthawj Aloos tug tub Eli-axas. Nwg ua tug saib cov tuabneeg kws ua num huv Chaav Dlawbhuv.
Mahalis hab Musis obtug cuab kwvtij yog Melalis caajceg.
Suav taagnrho cov txivneej kws noobnyoog ib hlis rov sau muaj rau txheeb ob puas leej.
Puab cuab kwvtij nuav tsaa tsevntaub nyob rua ntawm lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib saab peg, cuab kwvtij nuav tug thawjcoj yog Anpihais tug tub Xuliyees.
Puab lub luag num yog ua cov saib tug laajkaab kws xov ncig lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib, tej nqaaj laajkaab, tej ncej laajkaab, tej tag taw laajkaab, hab txhua yaam khoom kws siv rua tej ntawd.
Dlua le ntawd puab tseem ua cov saib tej ncej, tej faab, tej ntsa hab tej hlua kws xov ncig lub tshaav puam huv tuabsi.

Mauxes, Aloos hab Aloos cov tub tsaa puab tej tsevntaub nyob rua ntawm tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub saab nubtuaj. Puab lub luag num yog ua cov sawv cev ntawm cov pejxeem Yixalayees nyob huv Chaav Dlawbhuv. Yog muaj leejtwg laam moog ua teg num ntawd yuav raug tua tuag.
Mauxes suav cov txivneej Levis kws noobnyoog ib hlis rov sau lawv le tug TSWV tau saamfwm rua nwg lawm, muaj neeg nkaum ob txheeb leej.
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Suav taagnrho cov Yixalayees tej tub hlub kws noobnyoog ib hlis rov sau hab sau puab tej npe kuas taag huv tuabsi.
Muab taagnrho cov Levis rua kuv hloov cov Yixalayees tej tub hlub chaw, hab cov Levis tej tsaj txhu hloov cov Yixalayees tej tsaj txhu thawj tug mivnyuas kws yog tug txiv chaw.”
Yog le ntawd, Mauxes txhaj sau taagnrho cov Yixalayees tej tub hlub npe, lawv le tug TSWV tau saamfwm rua nwg lawm.
Hab txhua tug tub hlub kws noobnyoog ib hlis rov sau, sau tau npe taagnrho muaj neeg nkaum ob txheeb ob puas xyaa caum peb leeg.
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas,
“Nwgnuav ca le muab cov Levis fij rua kuv hloov taagnrho cov Yixalayees tej tub hlub chaw, hab muab cov Levis tej tsaj txhu fij rua kuv hloov cov Yixalayees tej tsaj txhu chaw.
Vim cov Yixalayees cov tub hlub coob tshaaj cov Levis ob puas xyaa caum peb leeg lawm, mas mej yuavtsum txhwv cov tshaaj ntawd rov qaab.
Ib tug tub twg yuavtsum yog tsib choj nyaj, lawv le numtswv kevcai,
hab muab cov nyaj nuav rua Aloos hab nwg cov tub.”
Yog le ntawd, Mauxes txhaj khaws cov nyaj kws cov Yixalayees coj tuaj txhwv puab cov tub hlub kws cov Levis hloov tsi taag ntawd ca.
Nwg khaws cov nyaj kws cov Yixalayees coj tuaj txhwv puab cov tub hlub tau ib txheeb peb puas rau caum tsib choj, lawv le numtswv kevcai.
Mauxes txhaj muab cov nyaj nuav coj moog rua Aloos hab nwg cov tub, lawv le tug TSWV tau saamfwm rua Mauxes lawm.
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes hab Aloos has tas,
“Meb yuavtsum sau cov Levis kws yog cuab Kauhas tej npe lawv le tej tsev tuabneeg,
ca le sau taagnrho cov txivneej kws noobnyoog peb caug xyoo moog rua tsib caug xyoo npe, kuas puab tuaj ua num ntawm tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib.
Ntawm nuav yog cuab Kauhas teg num kws nyob huv tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib: puab yog cov tu txhua yaam khoom kws dlawbhuv.

“Thaus twg txug sijhawm mej lauj lub yeej mas yuavtsum ca Aloos hab nwg cov tub moog rua huv lub Tsevntaub, moog txu dlaim ntaub thaiv lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg, hab muab dlaim ntaub ntawd npug lub Phijxaab tsaiv.
Puab yuavtsum muab ib dlaim tawv tsaj kws zoo heev lug npug thoob plawg lub Phijxaab, hab muab ib dlaim ntaub xav npug tshooj rua sau hab muab ob tug laag kwv ntxig rua.

“Puab yuavtsum muab ib dlaim ntaub xav nthuav npug lub rooj kws rau ncuav fij rua tug TSWV hab muab tej twj taig tso rua sau, cov taig phab rau moov tshuaj tsw qaab, cov taig phab rau khoom fij, hab lub hub ntim cawv txiv maab ua khoom fij. Cov ncuav yuavtsum tso rua sau lub rooj taag moog le.
Kuas puab muab ib dlaim ntaub lab nthuav npug cov ncuav, hab muab ib dlaim tawv tsaj kws zoo heev nthuav npug tshooj rua sau dlaim ntaub, hab muab ob tug laag kwv ntxig rua.
“Kuas puab muab ib dlaim ntaub xav nthuav khwb tug ncej txawb teeb hab cov teeb, cov txab txav teebxeeb hab cov roj kws saam teeb.
Hab kuas puab muab tej khoom siv rua lub teeb, qhwv ua ib pob hab muab ib dlaim tawv tsaj kws zoo heev qhwv tuaj saab nrau hab muab tso rua sau ob tug laag.
“Puab yuavtsum muab ib dlaim ntaub xav nthuav npug lub thaaj kub, muab ib dlaim tawv tsaj kws zoo heev npug tshooj rua sau hab, ces muab ob tug laag kwv ntxig rua.

Puab yuavtsum muab taagnrho cov cuabyeej siv huv Chaav Dlawbhuv qhwv ua ib pob tso rua sau dlaim ntaub xav, muab ib dlaim tawv tsaj kws zoo heev qhwv tuaj saab nrau, hab muab tso rua sau ob tug laag kws kwv lub thaaj kub ntawd.
Puab yuavtsum muab cov tshauv kws ntub roj sau lub thaaj laub tawm hab muab ib dlaim ntaub paajyeeb nthuav vuv lub thaaj.

Ces puab muab tej cuabyeej siv coj moog tso huv tuabsi rua sau lub thaaj: cov laujkaub rau ncaig tawg, cov nqailauj, cov dluav hab cov taig tooj. Ces puab yuavtsum muab ib dlaim tawv tsaj kws zoo heev lug npug lub thaaj hab muab ob tug laag kwv ntxig rua.

Thaus lub sijhawm kws puab lauj lub yeej yuav tshais chaw, puab yuavtsum ca cuab Kauhas lug ua cov kwv tej khoom dlawbhuv kws Aloos hab nwg cov tub, tub muab qhwv tau taag lawm. Cov Kauhas yuavtsum tsi xob tuav tej khoom dlawbhuv ntawd hlo le, yog puab kov, puab yuav raug tua tuag. “Tej kws has taag lug nuav yog cuab Kauhas lub luag num kws yog thaus muab tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib tshais chaw coj tawm moog.

“Eli-axas kws yog Aloos tug tub lub luag num, yog ua tug saib lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib hab tej roj saam teeb, tej moov tshuaj tsw qaab, tej moov nplej kws coj tuaj fij, tej roj txhawb meejthawj hab txhua yaam khoom dlawbhuv huv lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib kws tub muab fij rua tug TSWV lawm.”
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes hab Aloos has tas,
“Tsi xob ca cuab Kauhas raug tua tuag taag huv xeem Levis moog.

Qhov kws puab yuav tsi raug tua tuag, thaus puab moog ze tej khoom dlawbhuv tshaaj plawg, mas ua le nuav: kuas Aloos hab Aloos cov tub moog qha saib tug twg yog tug kwv yaam twg, ces nwg tsuas kwv yaam ntawd xwb.
Yog cov Kauhas nkaag moog huv lub Tsevntaub hab saib cov povthawj tu tej khoom dlawbhuv kws coj tshais chaw tawm moog  ntawd, mas puab yuav raug tua tuag.”
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas,
“Koj ca le sau cov Levis kws yog cuab Nkesoos tej npe lawv le puab tej tsev tuabneeg,
hab sau txhua tug txivneej kws noobnyoog peb caug xyoo moog txug tsib caug xyoo, kuas puab tuaj ua num ntawm tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib.
Puab lub luag num yog yuavtsum kwv tej khoom le nraag qaab nuav:
lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib, dlaim ntaub vuv saab huv nruab nrog, dlaim ntaub vuv saab nrau, dlaim tseem tawv tsaj kws vuv tuaj sau, dlaim ntaub thaiv qhovrooj,

cov ntaub xov lub tshaav puam kws ncig lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib hab lub thaaj, dlaim ntaub roojvaag ntawm lub tshaav puam, cov hlua hab txhua yaam khoom kws siv rua lub Tsevntaub. Puab yuavtsum ua txhua yaam num nuav kuas tav.
Mauxes hab Aloos obtug yuavtsum saib cov Nkesoos ua tej num nuav hab kwv txhua yaam kws Aloos hab nwg cov tub muab cob rua puab lawm.
Qhov nuav yog teg num kws cov Nkesoos yuavtsum ua huv tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib, puab kwv txhua yaam lawv le tug povthawj Ithamas kws yog Aloos tug tub qha rua puab lawm.”
Tug TSWV has kuas Mauxes sau cov Levis kws yog cuab Melalis tej npe lawv le puab tej tsev tuabneeg,
hab sau txhua tug txivneej kws noobnyoog peb caug xyoo moog rua tsib caug xyoo tej npe, kuas puab tuaj ua num ntawm tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib.
Hab ntawm nuav yog lub luag num kws puab ua ntawm tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib: puab kwv tej nqaaj, tej ncej, tej tag taw xov lub Tsevntaub,

tej ncej laajkaab, tej nqaaj, tej ntsa hab tej hlua paav laajkaab kws xov lub taj tshaav puam ncig lub Tsevntaub, hab txhua yaam khoom siv rua tej ntawd. Yog faib yaam twg rua tug twg kwv, nwg tsuas kwv yaam ntawd xwb.

Qhov nuav yog teg num kws cov Melalis yuavtsum ua rua ntawm tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib; puab yuav kwv tej khoom ntawd tawm moog lawv le tug povthawj Ithamas kws yog Aloos tug tub qha kuas puab kwv.
Mauxes, Aloos hab cov thawjcoj ntawm cov pejxeem suav cuab Kauhas lawv le puab cov yawmkoob tej tsev tuabneeg npe.
Suav taagnrho cov txivneej kws noobnyoog peb caug xyoo moog txug tsib caug xyoo kws puab tuaj ua num ntawm tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib,
hab suav taagnrho puab tej tsev tuabneeg, muaj ob txheeb xyaa pua tsib caug leej.
Taagnrho cov kws sau tau npe ntawd puavleej yog cuab Kauhas xwb, puab yog cov ua num ntawm tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib, Mauxes hab Aloos sau puab npe lawv le tug TSWV saamfwm tseg lawm.
Suav cuab Nkesoos lawv le puab cov yawmkoob tej tsev tuabneeg npe,
taagnrho cov txivneej kws noobnyoog peb caug xyoo moog txug tsib caug xyoo kws tuaj ua num ntawm tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib,
muaj ob txheeb rau pua peb caug leej.
Taagnrho cov kws suav tau npe ntawd puavleej yog cuab Nkesoos xwb, puab yog cov ua num ntawm tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib, Mauxes hab Aloos sau puab npe lawv le tug TSWV tau saamfwm tseg lawm.
Suav cuab Melalis lawv le puab cov yawmkoob tej tsev tuabneeg npe,
taagnrho cov txivneej kws noobnyoog peb caug xyoo moog txug tsib caug xyoo kws tuaj ua num ntawm tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib,
muaj peb txheeb ob puas leej.
Taagnrho cov kws suav tau npe ntawd puavleej yog cuab Melalis kws Mauxes hab Aloos sau puab tej npe lawv le tug TSWV tau saamfwm tseg lawm.
Yog le ntawd, Mauxes, Aloos hab cov Yixalayees tej thawjcoj txhaj sau taagnrho cov Levis txhua cuab hab txhua yim tuabneeg npe.
Txhua tug txivneej kws noobnyoog peb caug xyoo moog txug tsib caug xyoo txhaj tau tuaj ua num hab ua cov kwv tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib,
cov kws suav tau npe lawm muaj yim txheeb tsib puas yim caum leej.

Txhua tug txivneej puavleej tuaj sau npe lawv le tug TSWV tau saamfwm rua Mauxes lawm; faib num rua txhua tug yog leejtwg ua yaam twg lossis kwv yaam twg, nwg tsuas ua yaam ntawd lossis kwv yaam ntawd xwb.
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas,

“Koj has rua cov Yixalayees kuas ca le ntab txhua tug tuabneeg kws mob ruas lossis mob ua kua paug rua huv nwg lub cev hab txhua tug tuabneeg kws ua rua nwg tsi huv kws yog moog tuav tej tuabneeg tuag, kuas tawm huv lub yeej moog.
Muab taagnrho tej tuabneeg tsi huv ntab tawm moog kuas taag, nyob tsaam puab ua rua lub yeej kws yog qhov chaw kws kuv nrug mej nyob ntawd tsi huv lawm.”
Cov Yixalayees txawm ua le ntawd; puab txhaj muab cov tuabneeg kws tsi huv ntab tawm huv lub yeej moog taag lawm. Puab ua lawv le tug TSWV saamfwm rua Mauxes ntaag.
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas,
“Koj ca le has rua cov Yixalayees has tas, ‘Thaus ib tug txivneej lossis ib tug quaspuj twg ua txhum rua ib tug twg, ces yog nwg ua tsi ncaaj rua tug TSWV, hab nwg yog tuabneeg muaj txim,
nwg yuavtsum leeg lub txim kws nwg ua txhum ntawd, hab them nyaj neeg nkaum feem pua ntxiv rua tug kws nwg ua txhum rua lawm.

Tabsis yog tug tuabneeg ntawd tuag lawm, hab tsi muaj ib tug kwvtij txheeb ze yuav them cov nyaj ntawd rua, ces cov nyaj ntawd yog tug TSWV tug, yuavtsum muab rua tug povthawj. Hab muab ib tug laug yaaj rua tug povthawj tua fij ua kevcai dlaws txim.
Txhua yaam khoom kws cov Yixalayees muab pub tshwjxeeb rua tug TSWV puavleej yog tug povthawj kws puab muab cob rua ntawd tug.
Txhua tug povthawj yuavtsum khaws tej khoom kws luas muab pub rua nwg lawm ca ua nwg tug.’ ”
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas,
“Koj has rua cov Yixalayees has tas, yog tug txivneej twg tug quaspuj moog ua txhum hab ua tsi ncaaj rua nwg
kws yog moog ntxag lwm tug txivneej nraim nkoog kws nwg tug quasyawg tsi pum, hab nwg tau ua tej kev txhum kws tsi muaj leejtwg paub, tsi muaj leejtwg ua timkhawv hab nteg tsi tau;
yog nwg yeej tau ua tsi ncaaj, txhaj ua rua nwg tug quasyawg khib hab tsi ntseeg nwg lossis yog tug quaspuj tsi tau ua txhum, tabsis tug quasyawg laam khib hab tsi ntseeg sab xwb,

ces nwg yuavtsum coj nwg tug quaspuj moog cuag tug povthawj. Hab nwg yuavtsum nqaa ob choj moov nplej moog ua khoom fij, tabsis tsi xob muab roj laub rua lossis tsi xob muab moov tshuaj tsw qaab nphoo rua, rua qhov yog cov moov nplej kws fij vim txujkev khib sab, ua kuas qhov tseeb tawm tuaj rua suavdlawg paub.
“Tug povthawj yuavtsum coj tug quaspuj ntawd moog sawv ntawm lub thaaj hauv ntej.
Nwg yuavtsum muab cov dlej dlawbhuv laub rua huv lub taig aav hab muab mivntsiv moov aav huv lub plaag Tsevntaub kws yog tug TSWV qhov chaw sis ntsib nphoo rua huv cov dlej ntawd.

Ces tug povthawj yuavtsum muab tug quaspuj ntawd tug ku taujhauv dlaws hab muab cov moov nplej kws fij ntawd rua nwg tuav ntawm teg. Tug povthawj tuav rawv lub taig dlej ab dlej dlaw kws raug foom tsi zoo ntawm nwg teg.

Ces tug povthawj yuavtsum kuas tug quaspuj ntawd lug tsaa teg coglug taabmeeg tug povthawj le nuav: ‘Yog koj yeej tsi tau ua txhum kev nkauj kev nraug, cov dlej kws foom tsi zoo nuav yuav tsi ua rua koj raug kev puamtsuaj.
Tabsis yog koj saib tsi taug koj tug quasyawg, koj tau moog ua txhum kws yog nrug lwm tug txivneej pw kws tsi yog koj tug quasyawg,
thov kuas tug TSWV ua rua koj lub npe raug foom tsi zoo taabmeeg koj tsaav tuabneeg. Hab thov kuas nwg ua rua koj chaw xis qhuav hab ua rua koj lub tsev mivnyuas o.

Thov kuas cov dlej ab dlej dlaw kws koj haus moog rua huv koj lub plaab lawm, ua rua koj lub tsev mivnyuas o hab koj chaw xis qhuav.’ “Tug quaspuj ntawd yuavtsum txaus sab teb has tas, ‘Kuv yeej zoo sab; Amees! Thov kuas tug TSWV ua le ntawd ntaag.’
“Ces tug povthawj yuavtsum muab tej lug foom tsi zoo ntawd sau rua huv ntawv hab muab coj moog yaug rua huv cov dlej ab dlej dlaw ntawd.

Hab nwg yuavtsum muab cov dlej ab dlej dlaw kws ris cov lug foom tsi zoo ntawd rua tug quaspuj haus, hab cov dlej ab dlej dlaw kws ris cov lug foom tsi zoo yuav nkaag moog rua huv nwg lub cev hab yuav ua mob phem rua nwg.
Ces tug povthawj yuavtsum muab cov moov nplej kws yog khoom fij tshem txujkev khib ntawm tug quaspuj teg lug, hab nqaa moog rua tom lub thaaj muab yom fij rua tug TSWV.
Ces tug povthawj yuavtsum yawm ib phoov teg cov moov nplej ntawd coj moog hlawv rua sau lub thaaj fij ua kev ncu txug. Thaus kawg tug povthawj kuas tug quaspuj ntawd haus cov dlej ab dlej dlaw.

Yog nwg yeej ua txhum hab ua tsi ncaaj rua nwg tug quasyawg lawm tag, thaus nwg haus cov dlej kws ris cov lug foom tsi zoo ntawd moog rua huv nwg lub cev lawm, yuav ua rua nwg lub cev mob heev; nwg lub tsev mivnyuas yuav o hab nwg chaw xis yuav qhuav, hab nwg lub npe los yuav raug foom tsi zoo taabmeeg nwg tsaav tuabneeg.
Tabsis yog tug quaspuj ntawd yeej tsi tau ua txhum hab nwg yog tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg, nwg yuav dlim lub txim ntawd hab tseem muaj taug mivnyuas.

“Tej kws has taag lug nuav yog txuj kevcai tu plaub ntug ntawm txujkev sis khib, thaus tug quaspuj kws tseem nyob huv nwg tug quasyawg kev tswjfwm los nwg ca le moog ntxag hluas nraug hab ua txhum lawm,

lossis thaus tug quasyawg ntawd khib nwg tug quaspuj, vim tsi ntseeg tug quaspuj sab, ces nwg yuavtsum coj tug quaspuj moog sawv taabmeeg tug TSWV, hab tug povthawj yuavtsum ua lawv le txuj kevcai nuav txhua nqai.
Tug quasyawg yuav tsi raug txim dlaabtsi, tabsis yog tug quaspuj muaj txim tag, nwg yuav tau ris lub txim ntawd.”
Tug TSWV saamfwm rua Mauxes has tas,
“Koj muab txuj kevcai nuav qha rua cov Yixalayees. Txhua tug txivneej lossis quaspuj kws nwg tau coglug tshwjxeeb ua Naxis hab muab nwg fij rua tug TSWV,
mas nwg yuavtsum caiv tsi xob haus cawv txiv maab hab cawv ntsim. Nwg yuavtsum tsi xob haus tej cawv kws muab kua txiv maab ua lossis tsi xob noj tej txiv maab qhuav hlo le.
Thaus nwg tseem ua Naxis, nwg tsi xob noj tej khoom kws yog muab kua txiv maab ua, txawm yog tej noob lossis tej tawv txiv maab los tsi xob saaj.

Thaus kws nwg tseem nyob huv qhov kws coglug ua Naxis, nwg tsi xob txav nwg cov plaubhau lossis chais nwg cov fwjtxwv. Nwg yuavtsum ua tuabneeg dlawbhuv moog txug thaus lub sijhawm kws nwg ua kevcai tav lawm, hab nwg yuavtsum tseg nwg cov plaubhau kuas ntev.
“Thaus lub sijhawm kws nwg ua kevcai fij nwg rua tug TSWV, nwg yuavtsum tsi xob moog ze tej tuabneeg tuag.

Txawm yog nwg nam nwg txiv, nwg kwv nwg tij lossis cov muam tuag los nwg yuavtsum tsi xob moog ze, yuav ua rua nwg lub cev tsi huv, rua qhov lub cim kws muab nwg cais fij rua Vaajtswv nyob sau nwg taubhau.
Thaus kws nwg tseem ua Naxis, nwg yeej yog tug tuabneeg dlawbhuv rua ntawm tug TSWV.

“Yog muaj ib tug tuabneeg ca le tuaj tuag rua ntawm tug Naxis ib saab, ua rua nwg cov plaubhau dlawbhuv tsi huv lawm, nwg yuavtsum tog xyaa nub tom qaab, nwg chais nwg cov plaubhau hab cov fwjtxwv, nwg txhaj rov ua tau tug tuabneeg dlawbhuv.
Nub yim nwg yuavtsum nqaa ib nkawm nquab taug lossis ib nkawm nquab nyeg tuaj rua tug povthawj ntawm tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib lub qhovrooj.

Tug povthawj muab ib tug fij dlaws txim hab muab ib tug hlawv ua khoom fij, ua kevcai ntxuav nwg, rua qhov nwg tau chwv tug tuabneeg tuag lawm. Nub ntawd nwg yuavtsum ua kevcai ntxuav nwg cov plaubhau kuas huv

hab nwg rov muab nwg fij rua tug TSWV thaus lub sijhawm kws nwg tseem ua Naxis hab caab ib tug thaav yaaj noobnyoog ib xyoos tuaj tua ua khoom fij dlaws txim. Tsi suav lub sijhawm qub kws thaus nwg xub ua, rua qhov nwg tau ua rua nwg tsi huv lawm.
“Ntawm nuav yog txuj kevcai rua tug Naxis, thaus lub sijhawm kws nwg ua kevcai txwm noobnyoog lawm. Nwg yuavtsum moog rua tom tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib lub qhovrooj

hab coj peb tug tsaj kws tsi muaj ib qhov phem le moog fij rua tug TSWV: ib tug thaav yaaj noobnyoog ib xyoos moog hlawv fij, ib tug nwm yaaj noobnyoog ib xyoos moog fij dlaws txim, hab ib tug laug yaaj moog fij ua kev sis raug zoo.

Nwg yuavtsum nqaa ib tawb ncuav kws tsi xyaw keeb moog fij hab: muab ib co puab ua tej lub ncuav tuab tuab xyaw roj txiv ntoo hab muab ib co puab ua tej lub ncuav nyag nyag pleev roj txiv ntoo, hab muab ib co moov nplej hab cawv txiv maab tuaj fij ntxiv.
“Tug povthawj ca le coj taagnrho tej khoom nuav moog fij rua tug TSWV, muab ibtxha fij dlaws txim hab muab ibtxha hlawv ua khoom fij rua tug TSWV.
Nwg yuavtsum muab tug laug yaaj hab tawb ncuav kws tsi xyaw keeb fij rua tug TSWV ua kev sis raug zoo; hab nwg muab cov moov nplej hab cov cawv txiv maab fij nrug ua ke.

Tug Naxis yuavtsum chais nwg cov plaubhau rua ntawm tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib lub qhovrooj hab muab nwg cov plaubhau coj moog hlawv rua huv lub cubtawg kws taabtom hlawv cov khoom fij ua kev sis raug zoo.

“Ces thaus kws muab ceg teg yaaj hau sav lawm, tug povthawj yuavtsum muab ceg teg yaaj ntawd coj moog tso nrug lub ncuav tuab hab lub ncuav nyag kws muab huv lub tawb lug, cob rua tug Naxis txhais teg.

Ces tug povthawj yuavtsum muab cov khoom nuav moog yom fij rua tug TSWV, nrug lub hauv nrob hab cegqaab yaaj kws muab yom fij ua tug povthawj tug lawv le txuj kevcai; cov khoom fij nuav yog cov dlawbhuv rua tug povthawj. Tom qaab ntawd tug Naxis, maam le haus tau cawv.

“Ntawm nuav yog txuj kevcai kws tug Naxis yuavtsum coj. Tabsis yog tug Naxis twg tau coglug tseg yuav muab khoom fij tshaaj le cov Naxis txuj kevcai coglug tseg, mas nwg yuavtsum ua kuas tav lawv le nwg tau coglug tseg lawm.”
Tug TSWV saamfwm rua Mauxes has tas,
“Koj qha rua Aloos hab nwg cov tub siv tej lug nuav foom koob moov rua cov tuabneeg Yixalayees:
Thov tug TSWV foom koob moov rua mej hab tsomkwm mej;
Thov tug TSWV ua sab dlawb sab zoo rua mej hab hlub mej;
Thov tug TSWV tsaa qhovmuag saib mej hab pub rua mej muaj kev kaaj sab lug.”
Hab tug TSWV has tas, “Yog puab tuav kuv lub npe foom koob moov rua cov Yixalayees, kuv txhaj yuav foom koob moov rua puab.”
Nub kws Mauxes tsaa lub Tsevntaub kws yog qhov chaw nrug tug TSWV sis ntsib tav lawm, nwg muab lub Tsevntaub hab tej cuabyeej, lub thaaj hab tej cuabyeej ua kevcai fij.
Ces cov Yixalayees tej thawjcoj, cov thawjcoj ntawm tej tsev tuabneeg, hab cov thawjcoj ntawm tej xeem yog cov kws sau npe,

coj puab tej khoom fij tuaj pub rua tug TSWV le nuav: rau lub tsheb nyuj hab kaum ob tug txiv nyuj, ob tug thawjcoj koom ib lub tsheb nyuj hab ib leeg ib tug txiv nyuj. Tom qaab kws puab coj tuaj fij rua tug TSWV taag lawm,
tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas,
“Ca le txais tej khoom fij nuav ntawm puab, txhaj tau coj moog siv ua num huv tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib; hab muab tej khoom nuav cob rua cov Levis lawv le teg num kws puab yuavtsum tau ua.”
Yog le ntawd, Mauxes txhaj muab cov tsheb nyuj hab cov txiv nyuj cob rua cov Levis.
Nwg muab ob lub tsheb hab plaub tug txiv nyuj rua cov Nkesoos,
hab muab plaub lub tsheb nyuj hab yim tug txiv nyuj rua cov Melalis. Taagnrho tej num kws puab ua, Aloos tug tub Ithamas qha le caag puab yuavtsum ua kuas tav le ntawd.
Tabsis Mauxes tsi muab tsheb nyuj lossis txiv nyuj rua cov Kauhas, rua qhov lub luag num kws puab ua, tsuas yog kwv tej khoom dlawbhuv sau xubpwg xwb.
Cov thawjcoj tseem nqaa khoom tuaj ua kevcai fij lub thaaj huv tuabsi hab. Thaus puab npaaj tau tej khoom ntawd txhij coj tuaj fij rua ntawm lub thaaj,
tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Koj qha rua puab has tas muab kaum ob nub rua puab fij puab tej khoom rua lub thaaj, kuas ib tug thawjcoj tuaj ib nub.”
Nub ib yog Amithais tug tub Nasoos kws yog tug thawjcoj xeem Yudas muab nwg cov khoom moog fij;

cov khoom kws nwg nqaa moog fij yog ib lub phaaj nyaj nyaav peb choj hab ob laag, ib lub taig nyaj nyaav ib choj hab yim laag, lawv le numtswv txuj cai kom tseg, lub phaaj hab lub taig ntawd puavleej ntim tej tseem moov nplej kws ntse roj rua lawm puv nkaus coj moog fij;
ib lub taig kub nyaav plaub laag, ntim moov tshuaj tsw qaab puv nkaus;
caab ib tug ntsuag nyuj, ib tug laug yaaj, hab ib tug thaav yaaj noobnyoog ib xyoos, coj moog tua hlawv fij;
caab ib tug laug tshis coj moog tua fij dlaws txim;

hab ob tug txiv nyuj, tsib tug laug yaaj, tsib tug laug tshis, hab tsib tug thaav yaaj noobnyoog ib xyoos coj moog fij ua kev sis raug zoo. Cov khoom fij nuav puavleej yog Aminadas tug tub Nasoos cov.
Nub ob yog Zuag tug tub Nethanees kws yog tug thawjcoj xeem Ixakhas, muab nwg cov khoom moog fij;

cov khoom kws nwg nqaa moog fij yog ib lub phaaj nyaj nyaav peb choj hab ob laag, ib lub taig nyaj nyaav ib choj hab yim laag lawv le numtswv txuj cai kom tseg, lub phaaj hab lub taig ntawd puavleej ntim tej tseem moov nplej kws ntse roj rua lawm puv nkaus coj moog fij;
ib lub taig kub nyaav plaub laag kws ntim moov tshuaj tsw qaab puv nkaus;
caab ib tug ntsuag nyuj, ib tug laug yaaj, hab ib tug thaav yaaj noobnyoog ib xyoos, coj moog tua hlawv fij;
caab ib tug laug tshis coj moog tua fij dlaws txim;

hab ob tug txiv nyuj, tsib tug laug yaaj, tsib tug laug tshis, hab tsib tug thaav yaaj noobnyoog ib xyoos, coj moog tua fij ua kev sis raug zoo. Cov khoom fij nuav puavleej yog Zuag tug tub Nethanees cov.
Nub peb yog Heloos tug tub Eli-as kws yog tug thawjcoj xeem Xenpuloos, muab nwg cov khoom moog fij;

cov khoom kws nwg coj moog fij yog ib lub phaaj nyaj nyaav peb choj hab ob laag, ib lub taig nyaj nyaav ib choj hab yim laag, lawv le numtswv txuj cai kom tseg, lub phaaj hab lub taig ntawd puavleej ntim tej tseem moov nplej kws ntse roj rua lawm puv nkaus coj moog fij;
ib lub taig kub nyaav plaub laag kws ntim moov tshuaj tsw qaab puv nkaus;
caab ib tug ntsuag nyuj, ib tug laug yaaj, hab ib tug thaav yaaj noobnyoog ib xyoos, coj moog tua hlawv fij;
caab ib tug tshis coj moog tua fij dlaws txim;
hab ob tug txiv nyuj, tsib tug laug yaaj, tsib tug laug tshis, hab tsib tug thaav yaaj noobnyoog ib xyoos, coj moog fij ua kev sis raug zoo. Cov khoom fij nuav puavleej yog Heloos tug tub Eli-as cov.
Nub plaub yog Sede-us tug tub Elixus kws yog tug thawjcoj xeem Lunpees, muab nwg cov khoom moog fij;

cov khoom kws nwg coj moog fij yog ib lub phaaj nyaj nyaav peb choj hab ob laag, ib lub taig nyaj nyaav ib choj hab yim laag lawv le numtswv txuj cai kom tseg, lub phaaj hab lub taig ntawd puavleej ntim tej tseem moov nplej kws ntse roj rua lawm puv nkaus coj moog fij;
ib lub taig kub nyaav plaub laag kws ntim moov tshuaj tsw qaab puv nkaus;
caab ib tug ntsuag nyuj, ib tug laug yaaj, hab ib tug thaav yaaj noobnyoog ib xyoos, coj moog tua hlawv fij;
caab ib tug laug tshis coj moog tua fij dlaws txim;

hab ob tug txiv nyuj, tsib tug laug yaaj, tsib tug laug tshis, hab tsib tug thaav yaaj noobnyoog ib xyoos, coj moog fij ua kev sis raug zoo. Cov khoom fij nuav puavleej yog Sede-us tug tub Elixus cov.
Nub tsib yog Xulisadais tug tub Selumiyees kws yog tug thawjcoj xeem Xime-oos, muab nwg cov khoom moog fij;

cov khoom kws nwg coj moog fij yog ib lub phaaj nyaj nyaav peb choj hab ob laag, ib lub taig nyaj nyaav ib choj hab yim laag, lawv le numtswv txuj cai kom tseg, lub phaaj hab lub taig ntawd puavleej ntim tej tseem moov nplej kws ntse roj rua lawm puv nkaus coj moog fij;
ib lub taig kub nyaav plaub laag kws ntim moov tshuaj tsw qaab puv nkaus;

caab ib tug laug tshis coj moog tua fij dlaws txim,

hab ob tug txiv nyuj, tsib tug laug yaaj, tsib tug laug tshis hab tsib tug thaav yaaj noobnyoog ib xyoos, coj moog fij ua kev sis raug zoo. Cov khoom fij nuav puavleej yog Xulisadais tug tub Selumiyees cov.
Nub rau yog Deyees tug tub Eli-axas kws yog tug thawjcoj xeem Khas, muab nwg cov khoom moog fij;

cov khoom kws nwg coj tuaj fij yog ib lub phaaj nyaj nyaav peb choj hab ob laag, ib lub taig nyaj nyaav ib choj hab yim laag lawv le numtswv txuj cai kom tseg, lub phaaj hab lub taig ntawd puavleej ntim tej tseem moov nplej kws ntse roj rua lawm puv nkaus coj moog fij;
ib lub taig kub nyaav plaub laag kws ntim moov tshuaj tsw qaab puv nkaus;

Nub xyaa yog Amihus tug tub Elisamas kws yog tug thawjcoj xeem Efalayees, muab nwg cov khoom moog fij;

cov khoom kws nwg coj moog fij yog ib lub phaaj nyaj nyaav peb choj hab ob laag, ib lub taig nyaj nyaav ib choj hab yim laag, lawv le numtswv txuj cai kom tseg, lub phaaj hab lub taig ntawd puavleej ntim tej tseem moov nplej kws ntse roj rua lawm puv nkaus coj moog fij;
ib lub taig kub nyaav plaub laag kws ntim moov tshuaj tsw qaab puv nkaus;

caab ib tug laug tshis coj moog tua fij dlaws txim;

hab ob tug txiv nyuj, tsib tug laug yaaj, tsib tug laug tshis hab tsib tug thaav yaaj noobnyoog ib xyoos, coj moog fij ua kev sis raug zoo. Cov khoom fij nuav puavleej yog Amihus tug tub Elisamas cov.
Nub yim yog Pedaxes tug tub Nkamaliyees kws yog tug thawjcoj xeem Manaxes, muab nwg cov khoom moog fij;

cov khoom kws nwg coj moog fij yog ib lub phaaj nyaj nyaav peb choj hab ob laag, ib lub taig nyaj nyaav ib choj hab yim laag, lawv le numtswv txuj cai kom tseg, lub phaaj hab lub taig ntawd puavleej ntim tej tseem moov nplej kws ntse roj rua lawm puv nkaus coj moog fij;
ib lub taig kub nyaav plaub laag kws ntim moov tshuaj tsw qaab puv nkaus;
caab ib tug ntsuag nyuj, ib tug laug yaaj hab ib tug thaav yaaj noobnyoog ib xyoos, coj moog tua hlawv fij;
caab ib tug laug tshis moog tua fij dlaws txim;

hab ob tug txiv nyuj, tsib tug laug yaaj, tsib tug laug tshis hab tsib tug thaav yaaj noobnyoog ib xyoos, coj moog fij ua kev sis raug zoo. Cov khoom fij nuav puavleej yog Pedaxes tug tub Nkamaliyees cov.
Nub cuaj yog Nkide-aunis tug tub Anpidaas kws yog tug thawjcoj xeem Npeenyamees, muab nwg cov khoom moog fij;

cov khoom kws nwg coj moog fij yog ib lub phaaj nyaj nyaav peb choj hab ob laag, ib lub taig nyaj nyaav ib choj hab yim laag, lawv le numtswv txuj cai kom tseg, lub phaaj hab lub taig ntawd puavleej ntim tej tseem moov nplej kws ntse roj rua lawm puv nkaus coj moog fij;
ib lub taig kub nyaav plaub laag kws ntim moov tshuaj tsw qaab puv nkaus;
caab ib tug ntsuag nyuj, ib tug laug yaaj hab ib tug thaav yaaj noobnyoog ib xyoos, coj moog tua hlawv ua khoom fij;
caab ib tug laug tshis moog tua fij dlaws txim;

hab caab ob tug txiv nyuj, tsib tug laug yaaj, tsib tug laug tshis hab tsib tug thaav yaaj noobnyoog ib xyoos, coj moog fij ua kev sis raug zoo. Cov khoom fij nuav puavleej yog Nkidi-aunis tug tub Anpidas cov.
Nub kaum yog Amisadais tug tub Ahi-exes kws yog tug thawjcoj xeem Daas, muab nwg cov khoom moog fij;

cov khoom kws nwg coj moog fij yog ib lub phaaj nyaj nyaav peb choj hab ob laag, ib lub taig nyaj nyaav ib choj hab yim laag, lawv le numtswv txuj cai kom tseg, lub phaaj hab lub taig ntawd puavleej ntim tej tseem moov nplej kws ntse roj rua lawm puv nkaus coj moog fij;
ib lub taig kub nyaav plaub laag kws ntim moov tshuaj tsw qaab puv nkaus;
caab ib tug ntsuag nyuj, ib tug laug yaaj hab ib tug thaav yaaj noobnyoog ib xyoos, coj moog tua hlawv fij;
caab ib tug laug tshis moog tua fij dlaws txim;

hab caab ob tug txiv nyuj, tsib tug laug yaaj, tsib tug laug tshis hab tsib tug thaav yaaj noobnyoog ib xyoos, coj moog fij ua kev sis raug zoo. Cov khoom fij nuav puavleej yog Amisadais tug tub Ahi-exes cov.
Nub kaum ib yog Aukhalas tug tub Pankiyees kws yog tug thawjcoj xeem Aseles, muab nwg cov khoom moog fij;

cov khoom kws nwg coj moog fij yog ib lub phaaj nyaj nyaav peb choj hab ob laag, ib lub taig nyaj nyaav ib choj hab yim laag, lawv le numtswv txuj cai kom tseg, lub phaaj hab lub taig ntawd puavleej ntim tej tseem moov nplej kws ntse roj rua lawm puv nkaus coj moog fij;
ib lub taig kub nyaav plaub laag kws ntim moov tshuaj tsw qaab puv nkaus;
caab ib tug ntsuag nyuj, ib tug laug yaaj, hab ib tug thaav yaaj noobnyoog ib xyoos, coj moog tua hlawv fij;
caab ib tug laug tshis moog tua fij dlaws txim;

hab caab ob tug txiv nyuj, tsib tug laug yaaj, tsib tug laug tshis hab tsib tug thaav yaaj noobnyoog ib xyoos, coj moog fij ua kev sis raug zoo. Cov khoom fij nuav puavleej yog Aukhalas tug tub Pankiyees cov.
Nub kaum ob yog Enas tug tub Ahilas kws yog tug thawjcoj xeem Nathalis, muab nwg cov khoom moog fij;

cov khoom kws nwg coj moog fij yog ib lub phaaj nyaj nyaav peb choj hab ob laag, ib lub taig nyaj nyaav ib choj hab yim laag, lawv le numtswv txuj cai kom tseg, lub phaaj hab lub taig ntawd puavleej ntim tej tseem moov nplej kws ntse roj rua lawm puv nkaus coj moog fij;
ib lub taig kub nyaav plaub laag kws ntim moov tshuaj tsw qaab puv nkaus;
caab ib tug ntsuag nyuj, ib tug laug yaaj, hab ib tug thaav yaaj noobnyoog ib xyoos moog tua hlawv fij;
caab ib tug laug tshis moog tua fij dlaws txim;

hab caab ob tug txiv nyuj, tsib tug laug yaaj, tsib tug laug tshis hab tsib tug thaav yaaj noobnyoog ib xyoos, coj moog fij ua kev sis raug zoo. Cov khoom fij nuav puavleej yog Enas tug tub Ahilas cov.
Ntawm nuav yog cov khoom fij kws cov Yixalayees cov thawjcoj, coj moog fij thaus ua kevcai fij lub thaaj, kaum ob lub phaaj nyaj, kaum ob lub taig nyaj, kaum ob lub taig kub,
ib lub phaaj nyaj twg nyaav peb choj hab ob laag, ib lub taig nyaj twg nyaav ib choj hab yim laag, taagnrho cov phaaj hab cov taig nyaj nyaav rau caum choj, lawv le numtswv txuj cai kom tseg.
Kaum ob lub taig kub kws ntim moov tshuaj tsw qaab puv nkaus, ib lub twg nyaav plaub laag, lawv le numtswv txuj cai kom tseg, taagnrho cov taig kub ntawd nyaav plaub caug yim laag.

Xaam taagnrho cov tsaj kws caab moog tua hlawv fij yog kaum ob tug txiv nyuj, kaum ob tug laug tshis, kaum ob tug thaav yaaj noobnyoog ib xyoos, nrug rua puab tej moov nplej kws coj moog ua khoom fij;

hab taagnrho puab tej tsaj kws caab moog fij ua kev sis raug zoo yog neeg nkaum plaub tug txiv nyuj, rau caum tug laug yaaj, rau caum tug laug tshis, rau caum tug thaav yaaj noobnyoog ib xyoos. Cov nuav yog tej khoom kws coj moog fij tom qaab ua kevcai fij lub thaaj taag lawm.

Thaus Mauxes moog nrug tug TSWV thaam huv tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib, nwg nov tug TSWV has lug rua nwg sau lub hau Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg, nruab nraab ntawm ob tug qhelunpees.
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas,
“Koj qha rua Aloos has tas thaus twg nwg coj xyaa lub teeb moog txawb rua ntawm tug ncej txawb teeb, nwg yuavtsum txawb kuas cov teeb ntawd ci pum kev moog rua tom hauv ntej.”
Aloos ua lawv le ntawd, nwg txhaj muab cov teeb moog txawb rua ntawm tug ncej txawb teeb tig taagnrho rua tom hauv ntej.
Tug ncej txawb teeb ntawd sau lub hau lug ti nkaus huv tug taw puavleej yog muab cov tseem kub ntaus ua, lawv le tug qauv kws tug TSWV qha rua Mauxes lawm.
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas,
“Muab cov Levis cais tawm ntawm cov Yixalayees lub chaw nyob hab muab puab ua kevcai ntxuav kuas huv
lawv le nuav: muab dlej nchus rua puab ua kevcai ntxuav hab kuas puab chais puab tej plaub thoob plawg ib ce hab kuas puab ntxhua puab tej rig tsho. Ces puab txhaj yuav huv.
Ces kuas puab caab ib tug ntsuag nyuj hab nqaa ib cov moov nplej kws tub ntse roj txiv ntoo rua lawm tuaj; hab koj muab dlua ib tug ntsuag nyuj tuaj tua fij dlaws txim.
Ces kuas cov Yixalayees tuaj txoos ua ke hab kuas cov Levis moog sawv tom hauv ntej tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib.
Cov Yixalayees yuavtsum tsaa teg rua sau cov Levis taubhau,
hab ca Aloos muab cov Levis kws yog cov Yixalayees yaam khoom tshwjxeeb fij rua kuv, kuas puab tau ua kuv teg num.
Cov Levis yuavtsum tsaa teg rua sau ob tug txiv nyuj taubhau; muab ib tug tua fij dlaws txim hab muab ib tug tua hlawv fij ua kevcai ntxuav kuas cov Levis huv.
“Muab cov Levis fij pub tshwjxeeb rua tug TSWV, hab tsaa Aloos hab nwg cov tub ua cov saib puab.
Koj ca le muab cov Levis cais tawm ntawm cov Yixalayees moog nyob rua ib qho, cov Levis yog kuv tug lawm.
Tom qaab kws koj muab cov Levis ua kevcai ntxuav hab muab puab fij lawm, puab txhaj tsimnyog ua kuv teg num huv lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib.
Puab yog cov dlawbhuv kws cov Yixalayees muab pub rua kuv, kuv txhaj yuav puab ua kuv tug hloov cov Yixalayees thawj tug tub hlub chaw.
Cov Yixalayees tej tub hlub hab puab tej tsaj txhu thawj tug mivnyuas kws yog tug txiv puavleej yog kuv tug, vim thaus u kuv tua cov Iziv tej tub hlub lawm.
Nwgnuav kuv txhaj xaiv cov Levis lug hloov cov Yixalayees tug tub hlub chaw,

hab kuv muab cov Levis cob rua Aloos hab nwg cov tub, ib yaam le puab yog cov Yixalayees cov khoom pub kws coj moog ua num huv lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib hloov cov Yixalayees chaw hab tiv thaiv cov Yixalayees ntawm txujkev puamtsuaj nyob tsaam puab txaav moog ze Chaav Dlawbhuv.”
Yog le ntawd, Mauxes, Aloos hab taagnrho cov Yixalayees txhaj muab cov Levis ua kevcai fij lawv le tug TSWV tau saamfwm rua Mauxes lawm.

Cov Levis puavleej ua kevcai ntxuav puab hab muab puab tej rig tsho coj moog ntxhua, hab Aloos muab puab ua kevcai fij pub tshwjxeeb rua tug TSWV. Dlua le ntawd, nwg tseem ua kevcai dlaws txim rua puab kuas huv.

Tom qaab kws cov pejxeem ua txhua yaam rua cov Levis lawv le tej kws tug TSWV tau has rua Mauxes lawm. Cov Levis txhaj tau moog ua num huv lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib kws yog Aloos hab nwg cov tub ua cov saib.
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas,
“Txhua tug Levis kws noobnyoog neeg nkaum tsib xyoos yuavtsum tau ua num huv tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib,
hab yuavtsum ca tug kws nwg noobnyoog tsib caug xyoo lawm moog su.

Tom qaab ntawd, nwg yuavtsum paab nwg cov kwvtij Levis ua puab tej num huv tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib, tabsis nwg tsi xob ua ib yaam num kws yog nwg tuab leeg ua xwb. Ntawm nuav yog lub luag num kws koj muab cob rua cov Levis ua.”
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes tom taj suabpuam Xinais thaus lub ib hlis xyoo ob, tom qaab kws cov Yixalayees tsiv nraag tebchaws Iziv lug. Nwg has tas,
“Lub hlis nuav nub kaum plaub, thaus nub poob qho, cov Yixalayees ca le tuaj pib ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau lawv le txuj kaab ke hab tej kevcai kws tub teem tseg lawm.”
Yog le ntawd, Mauxes txhaj kuas cov pejxeem pib ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau,
hab lub ib hlis nub xab kaum plaub thaus nub poob qho, puab txhaj le ua kevcai Hlaa Dlhau nyob rua tom taj suabpuam Xinais. Cov pejxeem ua txhua yaam lawv le tug TSWV tau saamfwm rua Mauxes lawm.

Tabsis muaj qee leej txivneej tseem tsi tau ua kevcai ntxuav kuas huv, vim puab moog tuav tej tuabneeg tuag, nub ntawd puab txhaj tsi tau lug ua kevcai Hlaa Dlhau. Puab moog cuag Mauxes hab Aloos obtug
hab has tas, “Peb yog tuabneeg tsi huv lawm, rua qhov peb tau moog tuav tej tuabneeg tuag, tabsis vim le caag txhaj txwv tsi pub peb nrug cov Yixalayees coj khoom moog fij rua tug TSWV?”
Mauxes teb puab has tas, “Mej ua sab ntev tog moog txug thaus tug TSWV qha rua kuv tsaiv.”
Tug TSWV qha rua Mauxes

kuas has rua cov Yixalayees has tas, “Thaus mej ib tug twg lossis mej tej xeebntxwv moog tuav tej tuabneeg tuag ua rua tug ntawd tsi huv lossis mej ib tug twg tseem taabtom moog kev dleb lawm, mas nwg tseem ua tau Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau rua tug TSWV,

tabsis koj ca nwg ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau rua ib lub hlis tom qaab kws yog lub ob hlis nub kaum plaub thaus nub poob qho. Puab maam ua kevcai noj tug yaaj ntawd nrug cov ncuav tsi xyaw keeb hab tej zaub kws ab.
Tsi xob tseg tej zaub mov ca txug taagkig sawv ntxuv hab tsi xob muab tug tsaj ntawd tej pobtxhaa ua luv le. Ncu ntsoov ua kevcai Hlaa Dlhau lawv le tej kevcai.

Tabsis tug kws tub ua kevcai ntxuav huv hab nwg tsi tau moog kev dleb, txhobtxwm tsi tuaj ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau, yuav muab tug ntawd rhu tawm huv kuv tsaav tuabneeg moog, vim lub sijhawm ntawd nwg tsi tau coj khoom tuaj fij rua kuv lawv le kws tub npaaj tseg lawm. Nwg yuavtsum ris nwg lub txim.

“Yog has tas, muaj tej tuabneeg txawv tebchaws nrug mej nyob, hab nwg xaav ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau rua tug TSWV, nwg yuavtsum ua lawv le tej kaab ke hab tej kevcai. Muab tuab txuj kevcai nuav rua txhua tug, tsi has cov txawm teb txawm chaw lossis cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws.”
Nub kws puab tsaa tau lub Tsevntaub kws yog qhov chaw nrug tug TSWV sis ntsib lawm, muaj ib tauv fuab lug laum nkaus lub tsevntaub ntawd. Mo ntuj tauv fuab ntawd cig laam lug le nplaim tawg.
Pheej ua le ntawd moog le; nruab nub tauv fuab roog rawv lub tsevntaub sis ntsib, hab mo ntuj tauv fuab cig laam lug le nplaim tawg.
Thaus twg tauv fuab ntawd tshem tawm moog nreg rua qhov twg lawm, cov Yixalayees txawm tshais chaw moog tsaa puab tej tsevntaub nyob rua qhov ntawd.

Cov pejxeem txu puab tej tsevntaub lawv le tug TSWV saamfwm, hab puab rov tsaa puab tej tsevntaub lawv le tug TSWV saamfwm. Yog tauv fuab nyob sau lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib ntev npaum le caag puab nyob huv lub yeej ntawd ntev npaum le ntawd xwb.
Txawm yog tauv fuab nyob ntev heev sau lub Tsevntaub los cov Yixalayees yeej noog tug TSWV lug hab puab tsi tshais chaw moog nyob qhov twg le.
Muaj tej zag tauv fuab tsuas nyob sau lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib ob peb nub xwb; txawm le caag los xij; puab tsuas nyob hab tshais chaw lawv le tug TSWV coj puab kev xwb.
Muaj tej zag tauv fuab nyob sau lub Tsevntaub ib mos xwb, thaus sawv ntxuv puab tshais chaw thaus tauv fuab ntawd tshem kag lawm.

Tsi has tauv fuab nyob ob nub, ib hlis, ib xyoos lossis nyob ntev tshaaj ntawd, tauv fuab ntawd nyob ntev npaum le caag puab yeej nyob ntev npaum le ntawd tsi tsiv tawm le; tabsis thaus twg tauv fuab tshem tawm lawm, puab maam le tshais chaw thaus ntawd.
Tug TSWV saamfwm kuas puab lauj puab tej tsev hab kuas puab tsaa puab tej tsevntaub. Puab noog tug TSWV tej lug kws nwg has rua Mauxes.
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas,
“Muab nyaj ntaus ua ob lub xyu tau tshuab hu cov tuabneeg tuaj txoos ua ke hab kuas suavdlawg lauj lub yeej.
Yog thaus twg tshuab ob lub suab xyu nrov ntev ntev, ces yog hu taagnrho cov pejxeem sis sau tuaj cuag koj rua ntawm tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib lub qhovrooj.
Tabsis yog thaus twg nov tshuab ib lub suab xyu nrov ntev ntev, ces yog hu txhua xeem cov thawjcoj tuaj cuag koj.
Thaus twg tshuab lub suab xyu nrov tuab tuab lu, ces yog txhib xeem kws nyob saab nubtuaj kuas ca le sawv kev tawm moog ua ntej.
Thaus rov tshuab dlua zag ob, ces yog txhib kuas xeem kws nyob saab qaabteb sawv kev tawm moog. Yog tshuab lub suab kws tsi nrov ntev, ces yog tshuab txhib kuas suavdlawg lauj lub yeej,
tabsis yog tshuab hu kuas cov pejxeem tuaj txoos ua ke, yuavtsum tshuab lub suab nrov ntev ntev.
Cov kws tshuab xyu yuavtsum ca rua cov povthawj kws yog Aloos cov tub ua cov tshuab xwb. “Ntawm nuav yog txuj kaab ke tswjfwm kws yuavtsum coj moog ibtxhis tsi kawg.

Thaus muaj kev tsuv kev rog huv mej lub tebchaws kws yog muaj yeebncuab tuaj tua mej, mej yuavtsum tshuab xyu kws yog lub suab sis tua. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv, kuv yuav paab mej hab cawm kuas mej dlim ntawm mej cov yeebncuab.

Nub kws mej muaj kev zoo sab kws yog ua kevcai Hli Xab hab ua lwm yaam kevcai kws mej teem tseg, mej ca le tshuab ob lub xyu thaus mej taabtom hlawv tej khoom fij hab fij mej tej khoom ua kev sis raug zoo. Ces kuv yuav paab mej, kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv.”
Lub ob hlis nub neeg nkaum, xyoo ob kws txwm nkaus rua thaus cov Yixalayees tsiv nraag tebchaws Iziv lug, ces tauv fuab kws roog rawv sau tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib txawm tshem,
hab cov Yixalayees pib sawv kev tawm nraag taj suabpuam Xinais lug. Ces tauv fuab lug nreg rua ntawm lub taj mojsaab qhua Palaas.
Puab pib sawv kev tawm moog thawj zag lawv le tug TSWV tau saamfwm rua Mauxes,
hab txhua zag kws puab tshais chaw, yuavtsum ca xeem Yudas moog ua ntej; puab moog ib paab quas ib paab kws yog Aminadas tug tub Nasoos ua tug thawjcoj.
Zuag tug tub Nethanees ua tug coj xeem Ixakhas,
hab Heloos tug tub Eli-as ua tug coj xeem Xenpuloos.
Ces maam muab lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib txu rua cov Nkesoos hab Melalis kwv sawv kev tawm moog.
Txuas ntawd moog yog cov kws nyob huv qaab xeem Lunpees tug chij sawv kev tawm moog, puab moog ib paab quas ib paab kws yog Sede-us tug tub Elixus ua tug thawjcoj.
Xulisadais tug tub Selumiyees ua tug coj xeem Xime-oos,
hab Deyees tug tub Eli-axas ua tug coj xeem Khas.
Ces xeem Levis kws yog cuab Kauhas maam kwv tej khoom dlawbhuv sawv kev tawm moog. Thaus kws puab moog txug rua ntawm lub yeej tshab lawm, puab yuavtsum rov tsaa lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib dlua.
Paab kws sawv kev tuaj tom qaab yog cov kws nyob huv xeem Efalayees tug qaab chij, puab moog ib paab quas ib paab kws yog Anpihus tug tub Elisamas ua tug thawjcoj.
Pedaxes tug tub Nkamaliyees ua tug coj xeem Manaxes,
hab Nkide-aunis tug tub Anpidaas ua tug coj xeem Npeenyamees.

Thaus kawg yog paab kws nyob huv xeem Daas tug qaab chij sawv kev tawm moog ua cov thaiv tom qaab txhua xeem huv tuabsi, puab moog ib paab quas ib paab kws yog Amisadais tug tub Ahi-exes ua tug thawjcoj.
Aunkilas tug tub Pankiyees ua tug coj xeem Aseles,
hab Enas tug tub Ahilas ua tug coj xeem Nathalis.
Ntawm nuav yog has txug zaaj kws cov Yixalayees lauj lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib hab rov tsaa dlua, hab puab sawv kev ib paab quas ib paab tawm moog.

Mauxes has rua nwg quaspuj tug nug Haunpas kws yog Yethoos  tug tub kws yog tuabneeg Midias has tas, “Taamsim nuav peb taabtom sawv kev moog rua thaaj chaw kws tug TSWV tau coglug yuav muab pub rua peb. Nwg tau coglug tseg lawm yuav pub kuas cov Yixalayees muaj kev vaammeej, koj ca le nrug peb moog, hab peb yuav ca koj nrug peb nyob huv peb lub tebchaws.”
Haunpas teb has tas, “Kuv tsi moog, kuv yuav rov qaab moog nrug kuv tsaav tuabneeg nyob huv kuv lub tebchaws.”
Mauxes has rua Haunpas has tas, “Thov koj tsi xob tso peb tseg, koj tub paub tej chaw kws peb tsuam yeej nyob huv taj suabpuam Xinais nuav, hab koj tub yog tug qha peb ntaag.
Yog koj nrug peb moog, peb yuav muab tej kws tug TSWV pub rua peb pub rua koj hab.”
Thaus puab taug kev tau peb nub tom Xinais kws yog lub roob dlawbhuv lug cov kws kwv lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg moog ua puab ntej hab nrhav chaw rua puab tsuam yeej su.
Txhua zag kws puab tshais chaw, tug TSWV tauv fuab yeej roog rawv puab taag nub.

Yog thaus twg cov tuabneeg kws kwv lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg sawv kev moog, Mauxes has tas, “Tug TSWV, koj ca le sawv; thov ua kuas koj cov yeebncuab tawg ri sua moog hab muab cov tuabneeg kws ntxub koj ntab tsiv tawm moog!”
Hab yog thaus twg cov tuabneeg kws kwv lub phijxaab nreg lawm, Mauxes yuavtsum has tas, “Tug TSWV, thov koj tig lug cuag tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees kws coob heev suav tsi txheeb nuav dlua.”

Nwgnuav cov pejxeem ywg puab tej kev txomnyem rua tug TSWV. Thaus tug TSWV nov puab tej lug ywg, nwg chim rua puab heev nwg txhaj tso suavtawg lug hlawv puab, hab puab tej tsev kub nyab taag ib tog yeej.
Cov pejxeem txhaj quaj moog thov Mauxes paab; Mauxes txhaj thov tug TSWV ces suavtawg txawm tuag taag lawm.
Yog le ntawd, txhaj muab qhov chaw ntawd tis npe hu ua Tanpelas,  rua qhov tug TSWV tso suavtawg lug kub puab.
Muaj cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws nrug cov Yixalayees taug kev lug. Puab tshaib hab nqhes nqaj heev, cov Yixalayees txawm ywg has tas, “Kheev laam yog peb muaj nqaj noj xwb lauj!

Thaus peb nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv peb xaav muab taagnrho tej ntseg huv dlej lug ua zaub noj los yeej tau, peb yeej tsi tau them nyaj le. Peb puas ncu qaab has tas, tej dlib ntsuab, dlib lab, tej dlog raaj, dlog ntug hauvpaug hab tej qej, peb puavleej muaj huv tuabsi?
Tabsis nwgnuav peb tsi muaj zug le lawm, rua qhov peb tsi muaj ib lub mov noj, tsuas yog naj nub noj cov manas nuav xwb!”
(Manas zoo le cov noob zaub txhwb kws dlaaj lig.

Mo ntuj thaus ntsu lwg lawv tej ntug yeej, manas txawm poob sau ntuj lug khov rua ntawm cov lwg ntawd, hab thaus kaaj ntug suavdlawg moog khaws coj lug zum lossis tuav ua moov, puab muab cub kuas sav maam le muab puab ua ncuav. Cov manas ntawd qaab ib yaam le tej moov nplej pleev roj txiv ntoo kws luas cub ua mov noj ntaag.)
Mauxes pum cov pejxeem tawm tuaj sawv ua tej paab tej pawg ywg zum zawg ntawm puab tej qhovrooj tsevntaub. Nwg nyuaj sab kawg le, rua qhov tug TSWV chim heev rua puab,
hab nwg has rua tug TSWV has tas, “Vim le caag koj txhaj ua nruj ua tsiv rua kuv? Vim le caag koj tsi txaus sab rua kuv? Vim le caag koj txhaj tsaa kuv ua tug saib cov tuabneeg nuav?

Kuv tsi yog tug kws tsim puab lossis tso puab lug yug ua tuabneeg los sav! Vim le caag koj txhaj kuas kuv tu puab hab muab puab puag rua huv xubndlag ib yaam le puab tseem yog mivnyuas mog, hab kuas kuv coj puab moog kuas txug lub tebchaws kws koj tau coglug tseg rua puab cov yawmkoob lawm?
Kuv yuav moog nrhav nqaj qhov twg txhaj yuav txaus cov tuabneeg nuav noj? Puab pheej kuas kuv muab nqaj rua puab noj.
Cov tuabneeg nuav ua lub nraa nyaav heev rua kuv, kuv nreg tsi taug puab lawm.
Yog koj pheej yuav sim kuv le nuav, thov koj ca le muab kuv tua povtseg taamsim nuav, kuas kuv txhaj tsi tau tiv koj tej kev nruj tsiv nuav ntxiv lawm.”

Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Hu cov Yixalayees xyaa caum leej txivneej tuaj cuag kuv, puab yog cov kws koj yeej paub has tas yuav ua taug thawjcoj coj cov pejxeem hab ibtxwm tswjfwm puab. Kuas puab tuaj rua ntawm kuv lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib, hab has kuas puab nrug koj sawv rua ntawd.
Kuv yuav lug nrug koj thaam, hab kuv yuav muab tug ntsujplig kws kuv muab rua koj faib rua puab. Ces puab txhaj paab tau koj ua num rua cov tuabneeg nuav, hab tsi xob ca koj ib leeg ua xwb.

Koj ca le qha rua cov pejxeem has tas, ‘Ua kevcai ntxuav kuas mej huv npaaj rua pigkig; mej txhaj yuav tau nqaj noj. Tug TSWV nov mej tej suab ywg has tas xaav tau nqaj noj hab thaus mej nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv mej yeej tau zoo dlua le lug nyob ntawm nuav. Nwgnuav tug TSWV yuav muab nqaj rua mej, hab mej yuav tau nqaj noj.
Mej yuav muaj nqaj noj tsi yog muaj noj ib ob nub lossis tsib rau nub lossis kaum nub lossis neeg nkaum nub xwb,

tabsis mej yuav muaj noj tsheej hli, moog txug thaus kws nqaj tawm huv mej qhovntswg lug, hab moog txug thaus kws mej dlhuav tej nqaj ntawd. Tej nuav yuav tshwmsim tuaj, rua qhov mej tso tug TSWV kws nrug mej nyob tseg hab tau quaj rua nwg has tas, Vim le caag peb txhaj tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug?’ ”
Mauxes has rua tug TSWV has tas, “Cov tuabneeg kws kuv coj lug nuav muaj rau pua txheeb leej, koj has tas yuav muab nqaj rua puab noj kuas txaus tsheej hli nua los?
Muab nyuj hab muab yaaj qhov twg lug tua txhaj txaus puab noj? Muab taagnrho cov ntseg huv havtxwv lug tua sov puas txaus puab noj?”
Tug TSWV teb has tas, “Puas muaj nrim rua kuv lub fwjchim? Zag nuav koj yuav pum has tas, tej lug kws kuv has nuav saib muaj tseeb lossis tsi tseeb.”
Mauxes txhaj tawm moog qha rua cov pejxeem Yixalayees lawv le tug TSWV has. Nwg hu tau xyaa caum leej txivneej tuaj hab coj puab moog sawv ncig lub Tsevntaub.

Tug TSWV lug rua huv tauv fuab hab has lug huv tauv fuab tuaj rua Mauxes. Nwg txhaj muab tug ntsujplig kws nwg pub rua Mauxes faib rua xyaa caum tug thawjcoj ntawd. Thaus tug ntsujplig ntawd lub fwjchim nkaag rua puab lawm, puab txawm qw ib yaam le tug cev Vaajtswv lug, tabsis tsi ntev pistsawg.

Xyaa caum leej thawjcoj ntawd, muaj ob tug kws npe hu ua Edas hab Medas, obtug nyob huv yeej xwb, tsi tau moog rua tom lub Tsevntaub. Obtug nyob huv yeej xwb los tug ntsujplig lub fwjchim lug rua sau obtug, hab obtug txawm pib qw ib yaam le cov cev Vaajtswv lug.
Muaj ib tug tub hluas txhaj moog pav tej kws Edas hab Medas ua ntawd rua Mauxes noog.
Noos tug tub Yausuas kws ibtxwm ua tug paab Mauxes thaus tseem yog tub hluas lug, txhaj has rua Mauxes has tas, “Tug tswv, koj ca le moog cheem kuas obtug tsum!”

Mauxes teb has tas, “Koj nim paab kuv mob sab hab los? Kuv yeej xaav kuas tug TSWV pub nwg tug ntsujplig rua nwg tsaav tuabneeg txhua tug huv tuabsi, kuas puab has tau le cov cev Vaajtswv lug has ntaag!”
Ces Mauxes hab cov Yixalayees xyaa caum leej thawjcoj txawm rov moog rua huv tsev lawm.

Taamsim ntawd tug TSWV txawm tso cua ntsawj noog ncuab yaa ua npoj ntwg nraag havtxwv sab le ob tshim sau npoo aav lug. Cov ncuab ntawd yaa lug tsaws ua npoj ntwg rua ntawm ntug yeej, hab nyob ua npoj ntwg puagncig lub yeej moog tsheej nub ke.

Cov pejxeem suavdlawg tawm moog nteg ncuab, nub ntawd ib nub, mo ntawd ib mos hab nub tom qaab ib nub; tsi muaj ib tug kws nteg tau tsawg tshaaj tsib caug tawb. Ces puab nqaa lug tseev hab coj moog zab lawv ntug yeej ca ua nqaj qhua.
Thaus puab tseem muaj nqaj noj ua npuav ua npo, tug TSWV chim rua cov pejxeem heev, nwg txhaj tso kaab mob kis lug rua puab.
Puab txhaj tis npe rua qhov chaw ntawd hu ua Kinpalus Hata-avas (lossis “Cov tuabneeg tshaib nqhes tej ntxaa”), rua qhov puab log cov tuabneeg nqhes nqaj tuag rua thaaj chaw ntawd.
Cov pejxeem suavdlawg txhaj tsiv ntawm Kinpalus Hata-avas moog rua ntawm Haxelaus hab puab moog tsuam yeej nyob rua ntawd.
Mauxes moog yuav tsaav tuabneeg Kusis  ib tug ntxhais lug ua quaspuj, mas Aloos hab Milias obtug thuam Mauxes rua qhov nwg yuav tug quaspuj ntawd.
Obtug has tas, “Tug TSWV tsuas cevlug  rua Mauxes tuab leeg xwb los? Nwg txawm tsi cevlug rua wb le los?” Obtug has le caag los tug TSWV yeej nov huv tuabsi lawm.
(Mauxes yog ib tug tuabneeg txu fwjchim heev, nwg txu fwjchim tshaaj plawg tej tuabneeg kws nyob huv qaab ntuj nuav huv tuabsi.)
Taamsim ntawd tug TSWV txawm has rua Mauxes, Aloos hab Milias has tas, “Kuv xaav kuas mej peb tug ko ca le tawm huv lub Tsevntaub kws yog kuv qhov chaw sis ntsib moog.” Puab txawm tawm lug,
hab tug TSWV nyob huv tauv fuab, nwg sawv ntawm qhovrooj Tsevntaub hu has tas, “Aloos! Milias!” Obtug txawm txaav zog moog sawv tom hauv ntej,
hab tug TSWV has tas, “Nwgnuav meb ca le noog tej lug kws kuv has! Thaus muaj ib tug cev Vaajtswv lug nrug mej nyob,  kuv qha kuv rua nwg pum huv ywgtoog hab kuv has rua nwg huv npau suav.
Tabsis thaus kuv nrug kuv tug tubkhai Mauxes thaam, kuv tsi ua le ntawd; kuv tsaa nwg ua tug kaav taagnrho kuv tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees.
Yog le ntawd, kuv txhaj nrug nwg thaam tim ntsej tim muag meej nplhav tsi yog ua npau suav xwb; nwg yeej pum kuv tug dluab lawm! Vim le caag meb yuav has lug saib tsi taug kuv tug tubkhai Mauxes le?”
Tug TSWV chim heev rua obtug; hab nwg txawm ncaim obtug moog lawm,

tauv fuab txawm tshem ntawm lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib moog lawm hab. Taamsim ntawd Milias lub cev ca le mob ruas thoob plawg hab dlawb paug ib yaam le te. Thaus Aloos tig saib Milias hab pum nwg mob ruas thoob plawg ib ce lawm,
Aloos has rua Mauxes has tas, “Thov lauj, kuv tug tswv, thov tsi xob rau txim nyaav npaum le nuav rua wb, vim wb tau ua tej yaam ruag le nuav.
Thov tsi xob ca nwg zoo le tug mivnyuas kws yug tau huv nwg nam plaab lug tub tuag hab ib nraab nqaj lwj taag lawm.”
Yog le ntawd, Mauxes txhaj quaj thov tug TSWV has tas, “Vaajtswv, thov koj khu Milias lauj!”

Tug TSWV teb has tas, “Yog nwg txiv ntu quavncaug rua nwg lub ntsejmuag, nwg yuav ris kev txaajmuag xyaa nub. Ca le ntab kuas nwg tawm huv lub yeej nuav moog nyob saab nrau xyaa nub, hab tom qaab ntawd maam coj nwg rov lug rua huv lub yeej.”
Milias raug ntab tawm moog rua saab nrau ntug yeej xyaa nub, cov tuabneeg txhaj tsi tau sawv kev moog txug thaus kws coj Milias rov lug rua huv lub yeej.
Ces puab maam le sawv kev tawm huv Haxelaus moog tsuam yeej nyob rua ntawm lub taj mojsaab qhua Palaas.
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas,
“Xaiv kaum ob tug thawjcoj ntawm ib xeem ib tug hab tso puab moog soj lub tebchaws Kana-aas kws kuv tub muab pub rua cov Yixalayees lawm.”

Mauxes noog tug TSWV lug, nwg txhaj tso cov thawjcoj kws muaj npe lawv le nuav tawm huv taj mojsaab qhua Palaas moog: Lunpees yog Xakus tug tub Samuas Xime-oos yog Haulis tug tub Safas Yudas yog Yefunes tug tub Kalej Ixakhas yog Yauxej tug tub Ikas Efalayees yog Noos tug tub Hauseyas Npeenyamees yog Lafus tug tub Patis Xenpuloos yog Xaudis tug tub Nkadiyees Manaxes yog Xuxis tug tub Nkadis Daas yog Kemalis tug tub Amiyees Aseles yog Mikhayees tug tub Xethus Nathalis yog Vausis tug tub Nanpis Khas yog Makhis tug tub Nkuyees
Cov tuabneeg kws muaj npe sau nuav yog cov kws Mauxes tso moog soj lub tebchaws Kana-aas. Nwg tis dlua ib lub npe rua Noos tug tub Hauseyas hu ua Yausuas.
Thaus Mauxes khaiv puab moog soj lub tebchaws nwg has rua puab tas, “Mej ca le moog rua tim tebchaws Kana-aas yaav qaabteb, hab moog soj txhua nrho huv lub tebchaws hab sau tej roob.
Moog saib saib lub tebchaws ntawd zoo le caag, muaj tuabneeg coob npaum le caag nyob huv, hab puab muaj zug npaum le caag.
Hab saib saib lub tebchaws ntawd zoo lossis phem, hab cov tuabneeg ntawd nyob ua zej ua zog lossis nyob huv tej nroog kws xov ntsaa yeej thaiv khov kho.

Mej saib saib aav puas zoo qoob los tsi zoo hab puas muaj haav zoov los tsi muaj. Hab ncu ntsoov dle qee yaam txiv nqaa lug rua suavdlawg saib.” (Lub caij ntawd yog lub caij kws txiv maab taabtom sav.)
Yog le ntawd, puab txhaj moog rua tim hab soj lub tebchaws txij ndlua ntawm taj mojsaab qhua Xees moog txhua nrho saab qaabteb moog rua peg Lehaus kws nyob ze lub Dlawm Hamas saab qaumteb.

Puab xub moog rua saab qaabteb hab lug txug rua huv lub nroog Henploos, yog lub nroog kws cov Ahimas, cov Sesais hab cov Talemais nyob. Cov tuabneeg nuav yog cov tuabneeg Anakees kws luj sab heev tej xeebntxwv. (Lub nroog Henploos luas tub xub ua xyaa xyoo ua ntej maam le ua lub nroog Xau-as nraag tebchaws Iziv.)

Puab lug txug huv lub Haav Esekaus, puab txav tau ib cov ceg txiv maab kws txi txiv ncw heev hab nyaav kawg le, puab muab paas ntxig rua txaus ob tug txivneej kwv lug. Hab puab tseem dle tau txiv ntsab pobkws hab txiv ncuav pas nqaa lug huv tuabsi.
(Puab txhaj tis npe rua qhov chaw ntawd hu ua lub Haav Esekaus,  rua qhov cov Yixalayees txav tau txiv maab ncw heev qhov ntawd lug.)
Tom qaab kws moog soj tebchaws tau plaub caug nub lawm, cov moog soj tebchaws maam rov lug txug.

Puab lug cuag Mauxes, Aloos hab cov pejxeem Yixalayees ntawm Kades huv lub taj mojsaab qhua Palaas. Puab pav tej kws puab tau moog pum, hab muab tej txiv maab kws puab dle tau lug rua cov pejxeem suavdlawg saib.
Puab has rua Mauxes has tas, “Peb tau moog soj lub tebchaws kws koj khaiv peb moog. Lub tebchaws ntawd aav rog hab zoo qoob heev; hab tej txiv maab nuav yog dle huv lub tebchaws ntawd lug ntaag.
Tabsis cov tuabneeg kws nyob tim muaj zug heev, puab tej nroog luj dlaav hab muaj ntsaa yeej thaiv zoo heev. Hab peb tseem pum cov tuabneeg kws luj sab cov xeebntxwv nyob tim huv tuabsi.
Cov Amalej nyob yaav qaabteb, cov Hitis, cov Yenpus hab cov Amaules nyob peg tej roob, cov Kana-aas nyob lawv ntug havtxwv Meditelanees hab nyob lawv tug dlej Yauladees.”

Kalej txwv cov pejxeem kws pheej ywg,  Mauxes kuas puab nyob tuabywv, hab nwg has tas, “Peb ca le moog txeeb kuas tau lub tebchaws ntawd; peb yeej muaj zug txaus kws yuav tua yeej lub tebchaws ntawd xwb.”
Tabsis cov tuabneeg kws nrug Kalej moog soj lub tebchaws has tas, “Peb tseem tsi tau muaj zug txaus yuav moog tua yeej puab; cov tuabneeg kws nyob tim muaj zug tshaaj peb.”

Yog le ntawd puab txhaj muab tej lug dlaag nthuav qha rua cov Yixalayees has txug lub tebchaws kws puab moog soj lug ntawd. Puab has tas, “Lub tebchaws ntawd ua qoob tub tsi txaus cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv noj. Cov tuabneeg kws peb moog pum puavleej yog cov tuabneeg kws luj sab heev xwb,

dlua le ntawd, peb tseem pum Anaj cov xeebntxwv kws luj hab sab tshaaj plawg nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd hab. Peb saib peb rua puab, mas peb miv heev zoo le cov nyuas kooj xwb, yuav ua le caag muab peb pev tau rua puab.”
Mo ntawd cov pejxeem suavdlawg tsaa suab hlo quaj nrov heev ib mos kaaj ntug plawg.
Taagnrho cov Yixalayees tuaj ywg Mauxes hab Aloos has tas, “Zoo dlua ca peb tuag nraag tebchaws Iziv lossis tuag ntawm taj mojsaab qhua nuav!

Vim le caag tug TSWV txhaj coj peb moog rua huv lub tebchaws ntawd? Peb yuav moog raug luas tua rua huv tshaav rog, hab luas yuav nteg peb tej quaspuj mivnyuas moog. Kuj zoo dlua ca peb rov qaab moog nraag tebchaws Iziv!”
Vim le nuav puab txhaj sis thaam has tas, “Peb ca le xaiv ib tug ua thawj, coj peb rov qaab moog nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv.”
Ces Mauxes hab Aloos ca le txhus caug ndlua nyo ti nkaus rua huv aav taabmeeg cov pejxeem suavdlawg.
Noos tug tub Yausuas hab Yefunes tug tub Kalej yog ob tug kws nrug puab moog soj lub tebchaws. Obtug nyuaj sab heev, obtug txhaj dlua rhe obtug ob lub tsho,
hab has rua cov pejxeem has tas, “Lub tebchaws kws peb moog soj lug yog ib lub kws zoo kawg nkaus le.
Yog tug TSWV txaus sab rua peb, nwg yeej yuav coj peb moog nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd, hab nwg yuav muab lub tebchaws kws aav rog hab zoo qoob pub rua peb.

Tsi xob ntxeev sab rua tug TSWV, hab tsi xob ntshai cov tuabneeg kws nyob tid. Peb yuav tua yeej puab yoojyim kawg le. Tug TSWV tuaj peb tog hab ua rua tej vaajtswv kws tsomkwm puab swb lawm; mas tsi xob ntshai hlo le.”
Cov pejxeem tuavhuv yuav muab pobzeb ntaus kuas obtug tuag, tabsis taamsim ntawd tug TSWV tug tshwjchim txawm ci ntsaa ab tshwm plawg sau tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib tuaj rua cov Yixalayees pum.

Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Cov tuabneeg nuav tseem yuav tso kuv tseg ntev npaum le caag hab? Kuv tub ua tej txujci tseemceeb ntau yaam rua puab pum lawm. Puab tseem yuav tsi ca sab rua kuv moog txug thaus twg?
Kuv yuav tso kaab mob phem lug rua puab kuas puab puamtsuaj taag, tabsis kuv yuav tsaa koj hab koj cov xeebntxwv ua tsaav tuabneeg kws fuamvaam coob hab muaj zug tshaaj puab.”
Tabsis Mauxes has rua tug TSWV has tas, “Tug TSWV, tub yog koj lub fwjchim coj cov tuabneeg nuav tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug ntaag. Thaus cov tuabneeg Iziv nov tej kws koj ua rua koj tsaav tuabneeg,

puab yuav pav tej ntawd rua cov tuabneeg kws nyob puagncig cheebtsaam nuav noog. Tej tuabneeg yeej nov ntsoov has tas, koj kws yog tug TSWV nrug nraim peb nyob, thaus koj tauv fuab nreg ncaaj sau peb, peb pum koj tim ntsej tim muag, hab koj yog tug coj peb kev, nruab nub koj nyob huv tauv fuab, mo ntuj koj nyob huv tug nplaim tawg.
Nwgnuav yog koj tua taagnrho koj tsaav tuabneeg povtseg, tej tebchaws kws nov koj lub koob meej yuav thuam has tas,
‘Koj muab koj tsaav tuabneeg tua tuag taag rua ntawm taj mojsaab qhua nuav tub yog vim koj tsi muaj peevxwm coj tau puab moog txug huv lub tebchaws kws koj coglug tseg yuav muab rua puab nyob.’
Yog le ntawd tug TSWV, nwgnuav thov koj qha koj lub fwjchim rua peb hab ua lawv le thaus koj tau coglug tseg has tas,

‘Kuv yog tug TSWV tug kws tsi chim sai, kuv muaj txujkev hlub luj kawg nkaus hab zaam txim rua tug kws ua txhum hab ntxeev sab rua kuv. Tabsis kuv yuav rau txim rua puab tej xeebntxwv moog txug peb plaub tam tuabneeg, vim puab nam puab txiv tej kev txhum.’

Nwgnuav tug TSWV, lawv le koj txujkev hlub luj kawg nkaus kws tsi hloov le, kuv thov koj zaam txim rua cov tuabneeg nuav, ib yaam le koj ibtxwm zaam txim rua puab txij thaus koj coj puab tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug txug naj nub nua.”
Tug TSWV teb has tas, “Kuv yuav zaam txim rua puab lawv le koj tej lug thov.
Kuv yog tug kws muaj sa nyob, hab kuv lub fwjchim tseem tswj lub nplajteb nuav, yog le ntawd kuv txhaj coglug rua koj has tas,

kuv tsi pub cov tuabneeg nuav ib tug twg moog nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd le. Puab puavleej pum kuv tug tshwjchim kws ci ntsaa ab hab tej txujci kws kuv ua nraag tebchaws Iziv hab tom taj mojsaab qhua lawm, tabsis puab sim kuv sab txug kaum zag saib kuv puas ua sab ntev, hab puab tseem tsi kaam noog kuv lug qeeg hab.
Puab yuav tsi tau moog pum lub tebchaws kws kuv tau coglug rua puab cov yawmkoob lawm. Cov tuabneeg kws ntxeev sab rua kuv tsi muaj ib tug yuav tau moog nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd le.

Tabsis, vim kuv tug tubkhai Kalej tsi xaav le lwm tug hab nwg muab lub sab npuab kuv heev, kuv yuav coj nwg moog nyob huv lub tebchaws kws nwg moog soj ntawd, hab nwg cov xeebntxwv yuav tau lub tebchaws ntawd ua puab tug,
yog tej haav kws taamsim nuav cov Amalej hab cov Kana-aas nyob ntaag. Pigkig ca le tig rov qaab hab sawv kev moog rua tom taj mojsaab qhua taug txujkev kws moog rua tom Havtxwv Akanpas.”
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes hab Aloos has tas,
“Cov tuabneeg sab phem nuav, puab tseem yuav ywg kuv moog txug thaus twg hab? Kuv dlhuav cov tuabneeg nuav tej lug ywg heev lawm!
Nwgnuav meb ca le muab cov lug nuav teb rua puab has tas: ‘Kuv coglug has tas, kuv yog tug kws muaj sa nyob, kuv yuav ua rua mej ib yaam le mej tau ywg ntawd. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has tej lug nuav.
Mej yuav tuag pawg lug rua huv lub taj mojsaab qhua nuav. Vim mej tau ywg kuv heev, mas cov kws noobnyoog neeg nkaum xyoo rov sau yuav tsi muaj ib tug tau moog nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd le.
Txawm yog kuv tub coglug tseg lawm has tas, kuv yuav coj mej moog nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd los kuv yuav tsi pub mej ib tug twg moog nyob le, kuv tsuas pub Kalej hab Yausuas obtug moog nyob xwb.
Mej pheej has tas nyob tsaam luas nteg mej tej mivnyuas, tabsis kuv yuav coj puab moog rua huv lub tebchaws kws mej tsi kaam moog hab lub tebchaws ntawd yuav yog puab tej vaaj tse nyob.
Mej yuav tuag taag rua huv lub taj mojsaab qhua nuav.
Mej tej mivnyuas yuav ncig moog ncig lug tiv kev txomnyem plaub caug xyoo rua ntawm taj suabpuam nuav moog txug nub kws mej tuag taag, vim mej tsi muab sab npuab kuv.

Mej yuav tau ris mej lub txim tiv kev txomnyem plaub caug xyoo, ib xyoos twg yog ib nub ntawm plaub caug nub kws mej moog soj lub tebchaws. Mej txhaj yuav paub has tas txujkev txomnyem kws kuv ca mej raug zoo le caag tag.

Kuv qha tseeb rua mej has tas, kuv yuav ua le nuav rua mej cov kws yog tuabneeg sab phem kws pheej sis sau tsheej paab tuaj tawmtsaam kuv. Ntawm nuav lauj yog lub taj suabpuam kws mej yuav tuag taag rua huv. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has tej lug nuav.’ ”
Tub yog cov tuabneeg kws Mauxes tau tso moog soj lub tebchaws ntawd, coj tej lug dlaag lug pav qha rua cov Yixalayees, puab txhaj ywg tug TSWV.
Cov tuabneeg nuav tau ris lub txim kws puab dlaag ntawd, tug TSWV txhaj tso tej kaab mob kws phem heev lug rua puab, puab txhaj tuag taag lawm.
Kaum ob tug txivneej kws moog soj lub tebchaws ntawd, tsuas tshuav Yausuas hab Kalej txhaj tsi tuag xwb, dlua le cov puavleej tuag taag huv tuabsi lawm.
Thaus Mauxes qha tej lug kws tug TSWV has nuav rua cov Yixalayees taag lawm, puab nyuaj sab hab tu sab kawg le.

Taagkig sawv ntxuv cov Yixalayees txawm pib moog txeeb sau tej ncov roob, mas puab has tas, “Nwgnuav peb txaus sab yuav moog nyob qhov chaw kws tug TSWV qha peb. Peb leeg tej kev txhum kws peb tau ua.”
Tabsis Mauxes has tas, “Vim le caag mej txhaj tsi noog tug TSWV lug? Mej yuav moog tua tsi yeej ib zag le!
Mej tsi xob moog. Tug TSWV tub tsi nrug mej nyob lawm, mej cov yeebncuab yuav tua yeej mej.
Thaus mej moog ntsib cov Amalej hab cov Kana-aas, mej yuav raug tua tuag taag rua huv tshaav rog; vim mej tau tig rov qaab tsi kaam nrug tug TSWV, nwg txhaj tsi nrug mej nyob lawm.”
Txawm yog Mauxes hab cov tuabneeg kws kwv lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg, tsi tawm huv yeej moog los puab ca le nce moog rua peg tej roob le lawm.
Cov Amalej hab cov Kana-aas kws nyob peg txhaj tua yeej puab, hab lawv puab dleb heev moog txug ndlua nraag lub nroog Haulamas.
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas,
“Koj qha tej kevcai nuav rua cov Yixalayees, thaus mej moog txug huv lub tebchaws kws kuv muab pub rua mej lawm,

mej caab ib tug txiv nyuj, ib tug laug yaaj, ib tug thaav yaaj lossis ib tug laug tshis moog tua hlawv fij rua tug TSWV, fij theej txhoj lossis fij lawv le mej tau coglug lawm lossis fij ntawm lub sab dlawb paug lossis fij ua rooj noj rooj haus lawv le teem tseg; tej paa khoom fij ntawd yuav tsw qaab ntxag txaus tug TSWV sab.
Yog leejtwg coj tsaj moog fij rua tug TSWV, nwg yuavtsum nqaa ob choj moov nplej kws ntse xyaw ob khob roj txiv ntoo, hab ob khob cawv txiv maab, coj moog ua khoom fij rua tug TSWV.
Thaus muab tug laug yaaj fij, mas yuavtsum muab plaub choj moov nplej kws ntse xyaw peb khob roj txiv ntoo coj moog fij,
hab muab peb khob cawv txiv maab moog fij nrug tej paa khoom fij nuav yuav tsw qaab ntxag txaus tug TSWV sab.
Thaus muab tug txiv nyuj tua hlawv fij rua tug TSWV lossis fij lawv le mej tau coglug tseg lossis fij ua kev sis raug zoo,
yuavtsum muab rau choj moov nplej ntse xyaw plaub khob roj txiv ntoo,
hab muab plaub khob cawv txiv maab coj moog fij nrug. Tej paa khoom fij nuav yuav tsw qaab ntxag txaus tug TSWV sab.
“Yuavtsum muab le ntawd moog fij nrug txhua tug txiv nyuj, txhua tug laug yaaj lossis txhua tug laug tshis.
Thaus kws mej coj tsaj moog fij tshaaj ib tug rov sau lawm, yuavtsum ntxiv tej khoom kws fij nrug ntawd kuas ntau sis npaug zog lawv le tej feem ntawd.
Txhua xeem Yixalayees yuavtsum ua le nuav thaus nwg coj khoom moog fij, kuas tej paa tsw qaab ntxag txaus tug TSWV sab.

Hab cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws kws nrug mej nyob, tsi has nyob ib ntus xwb lossis nyob moog le, txhua zag kws coj tej khoom moog fij kuas tsw qaab ntxag rua tug TSWV, nwg yuavtsum ua kuas lawv le txuj kevcai kws mej ua.
Tsuas muaj tuab txuj kaab ke nuav  rua mej hab rua cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws kws nrug mej nyob ntawd coj moog ibtxhis le xwb. Mej ua le caag kuas puab ua le ntawd pub rua tug TSWV;
muab tuab txuj kevcai hab kev tswjfwm rua mej hab puab ib yaam nkaus.”
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas,
“Koj muab tej kevcai nuav qha rua cov Yixalayees coj thaus puab moog nyob huv lub tebchaws kws kuv muab rua puab.
Thaus puab ua tau tej qoobloo lug noj, puab yuavtsum muab ibtxha fij rua tug TSWV.

Thaus mej sau tau nplej tshab, mej muab thawj cov moov nplej lug puab ua thawj lub ncuav fij tshwjxeeb rua tug TSWV. Qhov nuav mej coj moog fij tshwjxeeb ib yaam le tej nplej tshab kws mej nyavnyuas muab tau lug.
Mej yuavtsum muab tej ncuav kws mej cub sav lawm moog fij rua tug TSWV, hab fij le nuav moog ibtxhis.”
“Tabsis yog mej yuam kev ua txhum tej kevcai kws tug TSWV muab cob rua Mauxes,
yog tej kevcai tswjfwm mej ib tam dlhau ib tam, txij nub kws tug TSWV muab cob rua Mauxes kuas qha rua mej,

yog qhov txhum ntawd tsi yog txhobtxwm ua, vim tsi paub xwb, ces cov pejxeem yuavtsum caab ib tug txiv nyuj moog tua hlawv fij nrug cov moov nplej hab cawv txiv maab, kuas tej paa tsw qaab ntxag txaus tug TSWV sab, hab caab ib tug laug tshis moog tua fij theej txhoj.

Tug povthawj yuavtsum ua kevcai ntxuav rua cov pejxeem suavdlawg, tug TSWV txhaj yuav zaam puab lub txim, vim tsi yog puab txhobtxwm ua, hab puab nqaa puab tej khoom fij dlaws txim moog ua zaub mov fij rua tug TSWV.
Hab tug TSWV yuav zaam txim rua cov Yixalayees hab cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws kws nrug puab nyob, vim puab txhua tug puavleej ua txhum.
“Yog muaj leejtwg ua txhum kws tsi yog txhobtxwm ua, nwg yuavtsum caab ib tug nwm tshis kws noobnyoog ib xyoos moog tua fij dlaws txim.
