Tug povthawj ua kevcai ntxuav tug tuabneeg kws tsi yog txhobtxwm ua txhum ntawd lub txim taabmeeg tug TSWV ntawm lub thaaj, tug TSWV txhaj yuav zaam nwg lub txim.
Muab tuab txuj kevcai nuav rua txhua tug kws tsi yog txhobtxwm ua txhum, tsi has cov Yixalayees lossis cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws.
“Yog leejtwg tub paub lawm, tabsis nwg txhobtxwm ua txhum kws yog saib tsi taug tug TSWV, tsi has cov Yixalayees lossis cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws, yuavtsum muab nwg tua povtseg.
Rua qhov nwg tsi noog tug TSWV tej lug hab txhobtxwm rhuav tug TSWV tej lug saamfwm. Nwg yuav tau ris lub txim tuag ntawd.”
Thaus cov Yixalayees tseem nyob nraag taj suabpuam, muaj ib zag puab pum ib tug tuabneeg moog khaws tawg nub Xanpataus.
Cov tuabneeg kws pum tug moog khaws tawg ntawd, puab coj nwg moog cuag Mauxes, Aloos hab cov Yixalayees suavdlawg,
puab kaav nwg nruj heev, vim puab tseem tsi tau paub has tas yuav ua le caag rua nwg.
Ces tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Yuavtsum muab tug tuabneeg nuav tua povtseg; cov pejxeem ca le coj nwg moog rua nrau ntug yeej hab muab pobzeb ntaus kuas nwg tuag.”
Yog le ntawd taagnrho cov pejxeem suavdlawg txhaj coj tug ntawd tawm moog rua saab nrau ntug yeej hab muab pobzeb ntaus nwg tuag lawv le tug TSWV tau saamfwm.
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas,

“Koj has rua cov Yixalayees has tas, ‘Mej ntxhoo ib cov paaj lwg kaab dlai rua ntawm mej cov tsho ntev, tej kaum tsho, hab muab ib txuj xuv xav lug xaws rua txhua lub kaum. Mej yuavtsum ua le nuav moog ibtxhis le.

Cov lwg kaab ntawd yuav ua lub cim rua mej ncu ntsoov. Thaus mej pum cov lwg kaab ntawd yuav ua rua mej ncu ntsoov kuv tej lug saamfwm hab ua lawv le kuv tej lug; mej txhaj yuav tsi tsiv ntawm kuv hab tsi moog ua lawv le mej lub sab nyam.
Cov lwg kaab ntawd yuav ua ib qho rua mej ncu ntsoov ua lawv le kuv tej lug saamfwm, hab mej yog kuv tug lawm tag.
Kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv; kuv coj mej tsiv nraag tebchaws Iziv lug kuas kuv tau ua mej tug Vaajtswv. Kuv yog tug TSWV.’”

Ixahas tug tub Kaulas kws yog xeem Levis hab yog cuab Kauhas, nwg tau ntxeev sab rua Mauxes kws yog tug thawjcoj. Kaulas koom sab nrug Eli-as tug tub Dathaas, Anpilaas hab Pelethes tug tub kws yog xeem Lunpees, hab ob puas tsib caug leej Yixalayees kws cov pejxeem suavdlawg tau xaiv lug ua cov thawjcoj.

Puab tuaj sis sau tim ntsej tim muag rua ntawm Mauxes hab Aloos, hab has rua obtug tas, “Meb tau ua dlhau kevcai lawm! Taagnrho cov pejxeem suavdlawg puavleej yog tug TSWV tug, hab tug TSWV yeej nrug peb suavdlawg nyob huv tuabsi. Vim le caag meb tsaav meb lub fwjchim sab tshaaj tug TSWV tsaav tuabneeg lawm hab?”
Thaus Mauxes nov tej lug ntawd, nwg txawm tso cev dlaa rua huv aav hab thov tug TSWV.

Mauxes has rua Kaulas hab nwg cov phoojywg tas, “Pigkig sawv ntxuv tug TSWV maam qha saib peb leejtwg yog tug TSWV tug hab peb leejtwg yog tug kws tug TSWV xaiv; nwg yuav ca tug kws yog nwg tug, hab tug kws nwg xaiv moog cuag nwg rua ntawm lub thaaj.
Kaulas, koj hab taagnrho koj cov phoojywg ua le nuav: pigkig mej ca le moog muab cov laujkaub

hab muab ncaig tawg hab moov tshuaj tsw qaab tso rua huv cov laujkaub coj moog tso taabmeeg tug TSWV. Tug tuabneeg kws tug TSWV xaiv, nwg yuav yog tug dlawbhuv. Mej cov Levis ko, yog cov kws ua dlhau cai ntaag!”
Mauxes has rua Kaulas ntxiv has tas, “Mej cov Levis ko, ca le ua tuab zoo noog!

Mej xaav has tas, qhov kws cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv tau tsaa mej lug ua ib paab kws nyob ib caag ntawm cov pejxeem, kuas mej moog cuag tau nwg, ua mej teg num nyob rua huv tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub, hab saib cov pejxeem suavdlawg hab ua cov kws ua num rua puab, tseem tsi tau txaus mej sab hab los?
Nwg tsaa mej hab cov Levis lug ua teg num nuav, tabsis nwgnuav mej tseem xaav nrhav kev lug ua tug povthawj hab!
Thaus koj ywg Aloos, tub yog koj hab koj cov phoojywg ntxeev sab tawmtsaam tug TSWV ntaag.”
Mauxes txawm khaiv tuabneeg moog hu Dathaas hab Anpilaas obtug, tabsis obtug teb has tas, “Peb yuav tsi tuaj!

Qhov kws koj coj peb tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv kws aav rog hab zoo qoob lug tuag taag rua huv taj suabpuam nuav tseem tsi tau txaus koj sab hab los? Ua le caag koj tseem yuav muab koj tsaa ua tug tswv kaav taagnrho peb hab?

Qhov tseemceeb, koj tub tsi tau coj peb moog rua huv lub tebchaws kws aav rog hab zoo qoob lossis pub laj teb rua peb hab pub kuas muaj vaaj txiv maab lug ua peb tug, hab nwgnuav koj taabtom nrhav kev dlaag ntxag peb. Peb yuav tsi tuaj cuag koj!”

Mauxes chim heev, nwg has rua tug TSWV has tas, “Tsi xob txais tej khoom kws cov tuabneeg nuav coj tuaj fij rua koj. Kuv yeej tsi tau ua phem rua puab ib leeg tug twg; txawm yog puab tej neeg luav los kuv tub tsi tau txeeb ib tug le.”
Mauxes has rua Kaulas has tas, “Pigkig koj yuavtsum coj koj ob puas tsib caug leej ntawd tuaj rua huv lub Tsevntaub kws yog tug TSWV qhov chaw sis ntsib; Aloos los nwg yuavtsum tuaj nyob rua huv hab.
Mej txhua tug nyag yuavtsum nqaa nyag lub laujkaub hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab tuaj, muab moov tshuaj tsw qaab tso rua huv lub laujkaub, hab coj moog fij rua ntawm lub thaaj.”

Yog le ntawd, txhua tug txivneej nyag txhaj nqaa nyag lub laujkaub thee, muab cov thee kws cig ntsaa thuav hab muab moov tshuaj tsw qaab tso rua huv, puab tuaj sawv nrug Mauxes hab Aloos obtug ua ke rua ntawm tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib lub qhovrooj.

Ces Kaulas txawm coj taagnrho cov pejxeem suavdlawg tuaj sawv tim ntsej tim muag Mauxes hab Aloos ntawm tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub lub qhovrooj. Taamsim ntawd tug TSWV tug tshwjchim ci ntsaa ab tshwm lug rua suavdlawg pum,
ces tug TSWV has rua Mauxes hab Aloos has tas,
“Meb ca le txaav tawm ntawm cov tuabneeg nuav moog, kuv yuav ua kuas puab puamtsuaj taamsim nuav ntaag.”

Tabsis Mauxes hab Aloos obtug txhus caug ndlua, nyo hau ntshis obtug ob lub ntsejmuag ti nkaus huv aav hab thov has tas, “Vaajtswv, koj yog tug tswj tuabneeg txujsa. Thaus ib tug ua txhum, koj txawm chim rua suavdlawg taagnrho los?”
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas,
“Ca le has rua cov pejxeem kuas puab txaav ntawm Kaulas, Dathaas, hab Anpilaas puab cov tsevntaub taamsim nuav moog.”
Ces Mauxes hab cov Yixalayees tej thawjcoj, txhaj moog rua tom Dathaas hab Anpilaas obtug ob lub tsev.
Mauxes has rua cov tuabneeg ntawd tas, “Mej ca le txaav kuas dleb ntawm peb tug tuabneeg sab phem nuav lub tsev moog, hab tsi xob cev teg kov ib yaam dlaabtsi kws yog puab tug le.”

Yog le ntawd puab txhaj tsiv tawm ntawm Kaulas, Dathaas hab Anpilaas puab tsev moog lawm. Dathaas hab Anpilaas tseem taabtom tawm tuaj sawv ntawm obtug ob lub qhovrooj, nrug obtug ob tug quaspuj hab cov mivnyuas nyob.
Mauxes has rua cov pejxeem tas, “Mej yuavtsum paub has tas, tug TSWV yog tug khaiv kuv tuaj ua txhua yaam nuav, tsi yog kuv laam tuaj ua lawv le kuv lub sab nyam xwb.
Yog cov tuabneeg nuav tuag le luas zeej tsoom tuag, ces tsi yog Vaajtswv rau txim rua puab, hab tsi yog tug TSWV tso kuv tuaj ua nwg teg num le.

Tabsis yog tug TSWV ua tej yaam kws tsi tau nov dlua, hab aav ca le qheb hlo muab puab nqog kag nrug txhua yaam kws yog puab tug, kuas puab ca le nqeg caj rua huv tubtuag teb, mej txhaj yuav paub has tas, cov tuabneeg nuav yog cov kws muab tug TSWV tso tseg lawm.”
Thaus Mauxes has cov lug ntawd taagnrho, ces thaaj aav kws nyob ntawm qhov chaw kws Dathaas hab Anpilaas obtug sawv, txawm tu nrho qheb hlo
hab nqog kag obtug hab obtug tsev tuabneeg, nqog taagnrho Kaulas cov phoojywg kws koom sab nrug nwg hab puab tej cuabtxhaj cuabtaam nrug puab huv tuabsi lawm.
Yog le ntawd, puab txhaj nqeg caj sa kais moog rua huv tubtuag teb, nrug puab tej cuabtxhaj cuabtaam. Aav nqawm nkaus npug puab, puab txhaj puamtsuaj pluj ndlais lawm.
Thaus puab quaj qw zum zawg, cov Yixalayees kws nyob ibncig ntawd puab puavleej tsiv tawm hab qw has tas, “Ca le tsiv! Nyob tsaam aav nqog peb lawm hab!”
Ces tug TSWV tso suavtawg lug kub ob puas tsib caug leej kws taabtom hlawv puab tej moov tshuaj tsw qaab ntawd tuag taag huv tuabsi lawm hab.
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas,

“Koj has rua Aloos tug tub Ele-axas kws yog tug povthawj kuas nwg moog muab cov laujkaub tooj hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab ntawm cov tuabneeg kws kub nyab tuag ntawd tshem, hab muab cov thee huv cov laujkaub ntawd laub rua lwm qhov, rua qhov cov laujkaub ntawd dlawbhuv.

Cov laujkaub ntawd dlawbhuv rua thaus coj moog fij rua ntawm tug TSWV lub thaaj. Ca le moog muab cov laujkaub ntawm cov tuabneeg tuag kws vim puab ua txhum ntawd, lug ntaus ua tej dlaim nyag nyag coj moog npug lub thaaj. Dlaim tooj ntawd yuav ua lub cim rua cov Yixalayees.”
Ces tug povthawj Ele-axas txhaj moog muab cov laujkaub ntawd lug hab muab ntaus ua tej dlaim nyag nyag hab muab haam ua ib dlaim luj luj moog npug lub thaaj.

Qhov nuav ua lub cim qha rua cov Yixalayees paub has tas, yog leejtwg tsi yog Aloos cov xeebntxwv tsi xob moog hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab rua tug TSWV ntawm lub thaaj. Nyob tsaam nwg yuav raug kev puamtsuaj le Kaulas hab cov tuabneeg kws koom nrug nwg ua ib lub sab. Tej lug nuav ua lawv le tug TSWV tau saamfwm rua Mauxes kuas has rua Ele-axas ntaag.
Nub tom qaab cov pejxeem rov ywg Mauxes hab Aloos obtug dlua has tas, “Meb tau tua tug TSWV cov tuabneeg coob leej lawm.”

Tom qaab kws puab ywg Mauxes hab Aloos le ntawd taag, Mauxes hab Aloos txawm tig moog rua tom tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib hab pum ib tauv fuab lug laum nkaum lub tsevntaub, tug TSWV tug tshwjchim ci ntsaa ab tshwm plawg lug.
Ces Mauxes hab Aloos obtug txawm txaav moog sawv ntawm tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib lub qhovrooj.
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas,

“Koj txaav kuas dleb ntawm pawg tuabneeg nuav, kuv yuav muab puab ua kuas puamtsuaj taag rua ntawm qhov chaw kws puab sawv nuav!” Obtug ob leeg puavleej txhus caug ndlua nyo hau ntshis ti nkaus huv aav,

hab Mauxes has rua Aloos has tas, “Ca le muab koj lub laujkaub thee lug, muab cov ncaig sau lub thaaj tso rua huv, hab muab moov tshuaj tsw qaab tso rua sau cov ncaig. Koj ca le ceev nrooj coj moog yom ua kevcai ntxuav dlaws cov pejxeem lub txim. Tug TSWV txujkev chim hab tej sub tawg sub ntshaa tub pib tawm tuaj lawm!”

Aloos noog Mauxes lug, nwg txhaj muab hlo lub laujkaub thee hab nqaa ceev nrooj moog rua huv plawv pawg tuabneeg kws tuaj sis sau ntawd. Thaus Aloos pum tej kev tuag tub pib lawm, nwg maam muab moov tshuaj tsw qaab tso rua huv cov ncaig tawg moog ua kevcai ntxuav dlaws cov tuabneeg ntawd lub txim.
Qhov nuav txhaj tswj tau txujkev tuag, Aloos sawv nreg nreeg huv nruab nraab ntawm cov tuabneeg caj hab cov tuabneeg tuag.
Cov tuabneeg tuag muaj kaum plaub txheeb xyaa pua leej, tub tsi tau suav cov tuabneeg ntxeev sab kws tuag nrug Kaulas ua ke.
Thaus txujkev tuag dlhau lawm, Aloos rov moog cuag Mauxes rua tom tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib lub qhovrooj.
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas,
“Koj has rua cov Yixalayees cov thawjcoj ntawm txhua xeem, kuas nyag nqaa nyag tug paas nreg tuaj, taagnrho yog kaum ob tug. Sau puab txhua tug npe rua ntawm nyag tug paas,
hab sau Aloos npe rua ntawm cov Levis tug paas. Tsuas pub ib tug paas rua ib xeem tug thawjcoj xwb.

Koj muab cov paas nreg ntawd, coj moog tso rua huv tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib, hab muab coj moog tso rua tom hauv ntej lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg kws yog qhov chaw kuv ntsib koj.
Ces tug tuabneeg kws kuv xaiv lawm tug paas nreg yuav hlaav ntsuag. Qhov kws kuv ua le nuav, yog ua kuas cov Yixalayees tej suab kws ywg koj ntsag tsi muaj ntxiv lawm.”

Yog le ntawd, Mauxes txhaj has rua cov Yixalayees, hab puab txhua tug thawjcoj nyag nqaa nyag tug paas nreg tuaj, ib xeem ib tug, taagnrho yog kaum ob tug, hab muab Aloos tug paas nreg coj moog tso nrug cov ntawd hab.
Ces Mauxes muab taagnrho cov paas nreg ntawd coj moog tso rua huv lub Tsevntaub ntawm tug TSWV lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg hauv ntej.
Taagkig tom qaab, thaus Mauxes moog huv lub Tsevntaub, nwg pum Aloos tug paas nreg kws yog xeem Levis tug, hlaav ntsuag, hlaav nplooj, tawg paaj hab txi txiv!

Mauxes muab cov paas nreg ntawd nqaa moog qha rua cov Yixalayees. Puab pum has tas, yeej muaj tej xwmtxheej nuav tshwmsim tag, yog le ntawd, cov thawjcoj nyag txhaj nqaa nyag tug paas nreg rov moog lawm.

Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Koj muab Aloos tug paas rov moog tso rua ntawm lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg hauv ntej. Tug paas ntawd yuav ua lub cim rua cov Yixalayees kws ntxeev sab, qhov nuav yuav ua kuas puab tseg tsi xob ywg kuv, puab txhaj tsi tuag.”
Mauxes ua lawv le tug TSWV tau has rua nwg.
Cov Yixalayees has rua Mauxes has tas, “Zag nuav peb yuav tuag taag le lauj!
Yog has tas, leejtwg txaav moog ze tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub yuav raug tua tuag. Ces peb suavdlawg txawm yuav tuag taag tag los?”

Tug TSWV has rua Aloos has tas, “Koj, koj cov tub hab cov Levis yuavtsum ris lub txim kws ua txhum rua lub Tsevntaub kws yog qhov chaw nrug kuv sis ntsib; tabsis tsuas yog koj hab koj cov tub txhaj tau ris lub txim kws ua txhum rua cov povthawj xwb.
Coj koj cov kwvtij kws yog xeem Levis tuaj nrug koj ua num hab paab koj thaus koj cov tub taabtom ua num nyob ntawm lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib.

Puab yuav ua tej num kws koj muab cob rua puab ua, hab puab yuav ua tej num huv lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib, tabsis tsi pub puab txaav moog ze tej khoom dlawbhuv hab Chaav Dlawbhuv lossis lub thaaj. Yog puab txaav moog ze, mas koj hab puab yuav raug tua tuag.
Puab yuav nrug koj ua num hab puab ua taagnrho tej num huv lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib, tabsis tsi pub tug kws tsi tsimnyog tuaj nrug mej ua.
Koj hab koj cov tub xwb, txhaj yog cov kws muaj feem moog ua num huv Chaav Dlawbhuv hab ntawm lub thaaj, kuas kuv txhaj tsi chim rua cov Yixalayees ntxiv lawm.
Kuv yog tug kws xaiv koj cov kwvtij Levis tawm huv cov Yixalayees lug rua koj. Tub muab puab fij rua tug TSWV lawm, kuas puab txhaj paab tau koj ua tau tej num huv lub Tsevntaub.

Tabsis tsuas yog koj hab koj cov tub kws yog povthawj txhaj ua tau txhua yaam num ntawd lub thaaj hab huv Chaav Dlawbhuv xwb. Txhua yaam nuav puavleej yog mej lub luag num, lub meejmom povthawj yog kuv muab rua mej. Txhua tug kws tsi tsimnyog hab laam txaav moog ze tej khoom dlawbhuv yuav raug tua tuag.”

Tug TSWV has rua Aloos has tas, “Koj ncu ntsoov txhua yaam khoom kws muab fij tshwjxeeb rua kuv kws tsi yog yaam muab hlawv theej txhoj, kuv yuav muab huv tuabsi rua koj. Kuv muab tej khoom nuav pub rua koj hab koj cov xeebntxwv, yog ib feem kws yuavtsum muab faib rua koj moog ibtxhis le.

Tej khoom dlawbhuv kws tsi coj moog hlawv fij rua sau lub thaaj kws yog: tej moov nplej, tej khoom fij dlaws txim hab tej khoom fij ntxuav kev txhum. Txhua yaam khoom dlawbhuv kws muab fij rua kuv puavleej yog koj hab koj cov tub tug.
Mej yuavtsum noj tej khoom nuav huv chaav dlawbhuv, hab tsuas pub cov txivneej noj xwb; rua qhov yog tej khoom dlawbhuv rua mej.

“Txhua yaam kws cov Yixalayees coj tuaj yom fij rua kuv los puavleej muab rua mej huv tuabsi. Kuv muab tej khoom ntawd rua koj, koj cov tub hab koj cov ntxhais moog ibtxhis. Koj tsev tuabneeg txhua tug kws yog tuabneeg huv lawm ces noj tau tej ntawd.
“Thawj phaum qoobloo zoo tshaaj plawg kws cov Yixalayees coj tuaj fij rua kuv kws yog tej roj txiv ntoo, tej cawv txiv maab hab tej nplej, kuv muab huv tuabsi rua koj.
Tej nuav puavleej yog mej tug. Koj tsev tuabneeg txhua tug kws yog tug tuabneeg huv lawm noj tau tej khoom ntawd.
“Txhua yaam kws cov Yixalayees coj tuaj fij rua kuv puavleej yog koj tug.

“Tsi has tuabneeg lossis tsaj txhu, thawj tug kws cov Yixalayees coj tuaj fij rua kuv puavleej yog mej tug. Tabsis tej nyaj kws luas coj tuaj txhwv thawj tug tub hlub hab tej nyaj kws luas coj tuaj txhwv tej tsaj kws tsi huv thawj tug mivnyuas kws yog tug txiv rov qaab, mej yuavtsum khaws tej nyaj ntawd ca.
Yuavtsum txhwv tej mivnyuas kws noobnyoog ib hlis rov qaab, tug nqe yog tsib dlaim nyaj, lawv le numtswv txuj cai kom tseg.

Tabsis thawj tug mivnyuas nyuj, mivnyuas yaaj, hab mivnyuas tshis kws yog tug txiv tsi xob txhwv rov qaab; cov ntawd yeej yog kuv tug hab yog cov kws muab tua theej txhoj. Muab cov ntshaav laub ywg lub thaaj hab muab cov roj hlawv ua khoom fij, kuas tej paa tsw qaab ntxag txaus kuv sab.
Tej nqaj puavleej yog koj tug, ib yaam le lub hauv nrob hab cegqaab saab xis kws muab yom fij.

“Taagnrho tej khoom dlawbhuv kws cov Yixalayees coj tuaj fij rua kuv, kuv muab huv tuabsi rua koj, koj cov tub hab koj cov ntxhais moog ibtxhis le. Kuv yuav tsi rhuav tej lug cog tseg rua koj hab koj cov xeebntxwv le.”

Tug TSWV has rua Aloos has tas, “Koj yuav tsi tau txais ib qho aav ua koj tug, hab yuav tsi faib lub tebchaws Yixalayees ib qhov rua koj le. Kuv yog tug TSWV, txhua yaam kws yog kuv tug puavleej yog koj le.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Ib feem kaum kws cov Yixalayees coj tuaj fij rua kuv, kuv yuav muab taagnrho rua cov Levis. Tej nuav yog muab ua nqe zug rua puab tu kuv lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib.
Txij nuav moog tsi pub cov Yixalayees tuaj ze tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib lawm, nyob tsaam ua rua puab raug lub txim tuag.

Txij nuav moog tsuas ca cov Levis tuaj tu lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib hab ua taagnrho tej num huv lub tsevntaub lawm xwb. Qhov nuav ua ib txuj kevcai rua koj cov xeebntxwv moog le. Cov Levis yuav tsi muaj teej tug nyob huv lub tebchaws Yixalayees,

rua qhov tej ib feem kaum kws cov Yixalayees coj tuaj fij rua kuv ntawd, kuv tub muab rua cov Levis lawm. Vim le nuav kuv txhaj has rua puab tas, puab yuav tsi muaj aav nyob huv lub tebchaws Yixalayees.”
Tug TSWV saamfwm rua Mauxes

kuas has rua cov Levis has tas: “Thaus mej tau txais cov Yixalayees tej ib feem kaum kws tug TSWV muab rua mej ua mej tug, mej yuavtsum muab ib feem kaum ntawm cov khoom kws yog mej tug coj moog fij tshwjxeeb rua tug TSWV.
Mej tej khoom fij tshwjxeeb nuav yuav zoo ib yaam le cov tuabneeg ua teb tej nplej tshab hab tej cawv txiv maab tshab kws puab coj tuaj fij ntaag.

Mej yuavtsum ua le nuav txhaj yog mej muab tej ib feem kaum kws mej tau ntawm cov Yixalayees lug moog fij pub tshwjxeeb ua tug TSWV tug. Cov khoom kws fij tshwjxeeb rua tug TSWV, ca le muab rua Aloos kws yog tug povthawj.
Mej yuavtsum muab tej kws zoo tshaaj plawg xwb.
Thaus mej muab tej kws zoo coj moog fij lawm, mej yuavtsum khaws tej kws seem ca, ib yaam le cov tuabneeg ua teb kws muab ibtxha coj moog fij hab khaws tej kws seem tseg.
Mej hab mej tsev tuabneeg ca le nqaa tej kws seem moog noj los tau, rua qhov tub muab tej ntawd ua nqe zug rua mej tu lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib lawm.

Mej noj tej ntawd los mej yuav tsi txhum, yog mej tub tshwj tej kws zoo coj moog fij rua tug TSWV lawm. Tabsis mej yuavtsum ua tuab zoo saib tsi xob noj tej khoom fij dlawbhuv kws cov Yixalayees coj tuaj fij ua ntej kws mej tsi tau tshwj tej kws zoo fij rua kuv; yog mej txhobtxwm noj, mej yuav raug tua tuag.”
Tug TSWV saamfwm rua Mauxes hab Aloos obtug has tas,
“Meb muab tej kevcai nuav qha rua cov Yixalayees. Caab ib tug xyuas nyuj lab kws tsi muaj ib qhov phem le, hab tsi tau siv ua num le,
moog rua tug povthawj Ele-axas. Caab tug xyuas nyuj ntawd moog rua saab nrau ntug yeej hab muab tug xyuas nyuj tua taabmeeg  Ele-axas.
Ces Ele-axas yuavtsum muab nwg tug ntivteg moog tub cov ntshaav coj moog nchus xyaa zag rua ntawm hauv ntej tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib.
Taagnrho tug tsaj ntawd lub cev, dlaim tawv, cov nqaj, cov ntshaav hab cov quav, yuavtsum muab hlawv taabmeeg tug povthawj.
Tug povthawj muab ib dlaim ntoo cab, ib re nplooj hixauv hab muab ib ntshuas xuv lab coj moog pov rua huv lub qhovcub kws hlawv tug xyuas nyuj ntawd.
Tom qaab ntawd, tug povthawj muab nwg cev rig tsho hle ntxhua hab muab dlej ntxuav thoob plawg nwg ib ce, nwg maam rov moog rua huv lub yeej; tabsis nwg tseem tsi huv moog txug thaus tsaus ntuj.
Tug tuabneeg kws hlawv tug xyuas nyuj ntawd, nwg yuavtsum hle nwg cev rig tsho ntxhua hab muab dlej ntxuav thoob plawg nwg ib ce, hab nwg tseem tsi huv moog txug thaus tsaus ntuj ib yaam nkaus.

Ces tug tuabneeg kws huv lawm moog yawm cov tshauv kws yog tug xyuas nyuj ntawd coj moog tso rua ntawm qhov chaw huv saab nrau ntug yeej, yog qhov chaw kws cov Yixalayees muab dlej ua kevcai ntxuav cov tuabneeg tsi huv lub txim povtseg.

Tug tuabneeg kws yawm cov tshauv ntawd yuavtsum hle nwg cev rig tsho ntxhua, tabsis nwg tseem tsi huv moog txug thaus tsaus ntuj. Cov Yixalayees hab cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws kws nrug puab nyob, yuav tau coj txuj kevcai nuav moog ibtxhis le.”
Yog leejtwg moog chwv tej tuabneeg tuag, mas nwg yog tuabneeg tsi huv xyaa nub.

Nub peb hab nub xyaa, nwg yuavtsum muab dlej lug ua kevcai ntxuav nwg, nwg txhaj le rov ua tuabneeg huv. Tabsis yog nwg tsi ua kevcai ntxuav ob zag kws yog nub peb hab nub xyaa, ces nwg yog tuabneeg tsi huv moog le lawm.

Yog leejtwg moog chwv tej tuabneeg tuag, nwg tsi ua kevcai ntxuav, ces tug ntawd yog tuabneeg tsi huv, rua qhov tsi tau muab cov dlej kws ntxuav kuas huv lug nchus rua nwg. Nyob tsaam nwg ua rua tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub tsi huv, mas yuavtsum muab nwg cais tawm ntawm Vaajtswv tsaav tuabneeg.

Yog muaj ib tug tuabneeg twg tuag rua huv lub tsev twg, txhua tug kws nyob huv lub tsev ntawd lossis tej tuabneeg kws tuaj ncaaj rua lub sijhawm kws tug tuabneeg ntawd tuag, mas puab yuav yog tuabneeg tsi huv xyaa nub.
Txhua lub hub hab txhua lub taub rau dlej kws tsi muaj hau  khwb kws nyob huv lub tsev ntawd los puavleej tsi huv ib yaam nkaus.

Yog leejtwg moog tuav tug tuabneeg kws raug luas tua tuag lossis tuag rua tom tej tshaav puam lossis yog leejtwg laam moog kov tej pobtxhaa tuabneeg tuag lossis lub ntxaa, mas tug ntawd yog tuabneeg tsi huv xyaa nub.
Ua kevcai ntxuav cov tuabneeg tsi huv, muab tug xyuas nyuj lab kws coj moog hlawv dlaws txim cov tshauv tso rua huv lub laujkaub, hab cug cov dlej tshab lug laub rua.

Ca tug tuabneeg kws ua kevcai ntxuav huv lawm, muab ib re nplooj hixauv raus rua huv cov dlej, hab muab nchus rua lub tsev, txhua yaam kws nyob huv lub tsev, hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub tsev. Dlua le ntawd ca nwg muab cov dlej nchus rua tug tuabneeg kws moog kov tej pobtxhaa tuabneeg tuag lossis tug tuabneeg tuag lossis lub ntxaa hab.

Tug tuabneeg huv yuav muab dlej nchus rua tug tuabneeg tsi huv nub peb hab nub xyaa. Nub xyaa nwg yuavtsum ua kevcai ntxuav tug tuabneeg tsi huv, tug tuabneeg tsi huv kws ua kevcai ntxuav kuas huv ntawd yuavtsum hle nwg cev rig tsho moog ntxhua hab muab dlej ntxuav nwg lub cev, thaus nub poob qho nwg txhaj le yuav huv.

Txhua tug tuabneeg kws tsi huv hab tsi tau ua kevcai ntxuav, nwg yog tuabneeg tsi huv, rua qhov tsi tau muab cov dlej kws ntxuav kuas huv nchus rua nwg lub cev. Nyob tsaam nwg ua rua tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub tsi huv, mas yuavtsum muab nwg cais tawm ntawm Vaajtswv tsaav tuabneeg.

Mej yuavtsum coj txuj kevcai nuav moog ibtxhis. Tug tuabneeg kws muab dlej nchus ua kevcai ntxuav rua lwm tug, yuavtsum hle nwg cev rig tsho moog ntxhua; txhua tug kws kov cov dlej ntawd, nwg tsi huv moog txug thaus tsaus ntuj.
Txhua yaam kws tug tuabneeg tsi huv moog tuav lawm, yaam ntawd yuav tsi huv, hab txhua tug kws moog tuav tej ntawd yuav tsi huv moog txug thaus tsaus ntuj.
Thaus lub ib hlis ntuj cov Yixalayees lug txug rua ntawm taj suabpuam Xees, puab txhaj tsuam chaw su rua ntawm Kades. Milias tuag, hab puab muab nwg log rua ntawm qhov chaw ntawd.
Nyob qhov ntawd tsi muaj dlej haus, cov pejxeem txhaj le sau nthwv tuaj cuag Mauxes hab Aloos.
Puab ywg obtug has tas: “Yog peb ntxuv tuag nrug peb tej tuabneeg kws tuag rua ntawm tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub ntshai yuav zoo dlua.
Vim le caag meb coj peb lug nyob ntawm taj suabpuam nuav. Meb xaav ua kuas peb hab peb tej tsaj txhu tuag taag huv tuabsi rua ntawm nuav los?

Vim le caag meb coj peb tsiv nraag tebchaws Iziv lug nyob rua qhov chaw phem npaum le nuav, ib yaam nroj tsuag los tub tuaj tsi taug le? Cog tsi tau nplej, cog tsi tau txiv ncuav pas, cog tsi tau txiv maab hab cog tsi tau txiv ntsab pobkws le. Nyob ntawm nuav dlej haus los tub tsi muaj.”

Mauxes hab Aloos txawm tawm huv cov pejxeem moog sawv rua ntawm lub qhovrooj Tsevntaub sis ntsib. Obtug txhus caug nyo ua ntsejmuag ti nkaus huv aav, hab tug TSWV tug tshwjchim ci ntsaa ab lug rua obtug pum.
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas,

“Muab tug paas nreg kws nyob ntawm lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg hauv ntej lug, ces Aloos meb hu cov pejxeem tuaj txoos ua ke. Koj has rua lub pobzeb tod taabmeeg rua puab saib ntsoov, ces dlej yuav txhawv huv lug. Koj ua le nuav dlej txhaj tawm huv pobzeb lug rua cov pejxeem haus, kuas puab hab puab tej tsaj txhu txhaj tau dlej haus.
Mauxes txhaj moog muab tug paas nreg lawv le tug TSWV tau has rua nwg.”

Ces Mauxes hab Aloos obtug txhaj hu taagnrho cov pejxeem tuaj txoos ua ke rua ntawm lub pobzeb hauv ntej, Mauxes has tas, “Mej cov kws yog tuabneeg ntxeev sab, mej ca le ua tuab zoo noog! Mej tseem ca wb ua kuas dlej txhawv huv lub pobzeb nuav lug rua mej haus hab los?”
Mauxes txhaj tsaa hlo tug paas nreg ntaus lub pobzeb ob paas, hab dlej txhawv paim yog huv lug, cov pejxeem hab tej tsaj txhu txhaj tau haus.

Tabsis tug TSWV has rua Mauxes hab Aloos has tas, “Vim meb tsi ca sab rua kuv, meb txhaj tsi ua kuv lub fwjchim rua cov Yixalayees pum, yog le ntawd, meb yuav tsi tau coj puab moog nyob huv lub tebchaws kws kuv coglug yuav muab rua puab.”
Tej xwm nuav tshwm muaj rua huv Melinpas,  qhov chaw kws cov Yixalayees ywg tug TSWV hab qhov chaw kws nwg qha rua puab has tas, nwg yog tug dlawbhuv.

Mauxes khaiv tuabneeg tawm huv Kades moog thov cov Edoos tug vaajntxwv. Puab thov has tas, “Tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees kws yog koj cov kwvtij has le nuav rua koj. Koj yeej paub tej kev txomnyem kws peb raug lawm,
vim le caag peb cov yawmkoob txhaj tsiv moog nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv, peb nyob nraag tau ntau xyoo. Cov tuabneeg Iziv quab yuam peb cov yawmkoob hab peb,

peb tau quaj thov tug TSWV paab peb. Nwg nov peb tej lug thov hab nwg tso ib tug timtswv coj peb kev tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug. Nwgnuav peb lug nyob rua huv lub nroog Kades kws npuas nkaus koj lub tebchaws.

Thov koj pub peb hlaa koj lub tebchaws moog. Peb yuav caab peb tej tsaj taug kev ncaaj nraim tsi su qhov twg, peb hab peb tej tsaj yuav tsi moog tsuj huv koj tej teb lossis tej vaaj txiv maab, hab yuav tsi cug dlej ntawm koj tej qhovdlej haus. Peb yuav taug txujkev luj  ncaaj nraim tsi tig saib qhov twg le moog txug thaus kws peb hlaa dlhau koj lub tebchaws.”
Tabsis cov Edoos teb has tas, “Peb tsi pub mej hlaa peb lub tebchaws le! Yog mej tseem hlaa, mas peb yuav tuaj tua mej taamsim ntawd ntaag.”

Cov Yixalayees has tas, “Peb yuav taug txujkev luj ncaaj nraim xwb, yog peb lossis peb tej tsaj haus mej tej dlej, peb yuav them tej nqe dlej huv tuabsi rua mej, peb tsuas thov taug txujkev dlhau moog xwb.”
Cov Edoos rov has dlua tas, “Peb txwv tu nrho tsi pub mej lug moog le!” Hab puab txawm txhij cov tubrog kws sab tawv heev tawm tuaj tua cov Yixalayees.
Vim cov Edoos tsi pub cov Yixalayees hlaa puab lub tebchaws lug moog, cov Yixalayees txhaj ua sab tig rov qaab hab taug dlua lwm txujkev moog lawm.
Taagnrho cov Yixalayees sawv kev tawm huv Kades lug txug rua ntawm lub Roob Haules kws yog
ntawm nrimteb tebchaws Edoos. Nyob qhov ntawd tug TSWV has rua Mauxes hab Aloos has tas,
“Aloos yuav tsi tau moog nyob huv lub tebchaws kws kuv muab rua cov Yixalayees nyob; nwg yuav tuag ua ntej, rua qhov meb ob leeg tau ntxeev sab rua kuv tej lug saamfwm thaus nyob nraag Melinpas.
Koj ca le coj Aloos hab nwg tug tub Ele-axas moog rua sau Roob Haules.
Muab Aloos cov rig tsho ntev hle hab muab rua Ele-axas naav, rua qhov Aloos yuav tuag rua sau.”
Mauxes txawm ua le tug TSWV has. Puab txhaj nce moog rua sau Roob Haules taabmeeg cov pejxeem suavdlawg,
Mauxes muab Aloos cov tsho tseeb ntev hle rua Ele-axas naav. Aloos txhaj tuag rua sau lub roob ntawd, ces Mauxes hab Ele-axas obtug txawm nqeg rov lug.
Thaus cov pejxeem paub has tas Aloos tuag lawm, puab suavdlawg quaj nyav nwg tau peb caug nub.

Thaus cov Kana-aas tug vaajntxwv kws kaav lub nroog Aladis huv tebchaws Kana-aas saab qaabteb nov has tas, cov Yixalayees taabtom taug txujkev Athalis lug lawm, nwg txawm txhij tubrog moog tua puab hab nteg tau cov Yixalayees qee leej coj moog ua qhev.

Ces cov Yixalayees txhaj coglug rua tug TSWV has tas, “Yog koj pub peb tua yeej cov tuabneeg nuav, peb yuav muab puab hab puab tej nroog fij  hlo rua koj, hab peb yuav muab puab ua kuas puamtsuaj taag huv tuabsi.”

Tug TSWV nov puab tej lug thov, hab nwg paab puab tua yeej cov Kana-aas. Vim le nuav cov Yixalayees txhaj muab cov Kana-aas hab puab tej nroog ua puamtsuaj taag, hab muab qhov chaw ntawd tis npe hu ua Haulemas.

Cov Yixalayees sawv kev ntawm lub Roob Haules moog rua nraag Havtxwv Akanpas, puab yuav zos kev ncig lub tebchaws Edoos. Tabsis thaus puab tseem taabtom taug kev moog ntawd, puab ua tsi taug sab ntev nyaj kev txomnyem,

puab txawm tshev Vaajtswv hab Mauxes. Puab ywg has tas, “Vim le caag meb txhaj coj peb tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug kuas peb tuag taag rua huv taj suabpuam, qhov chaw kws tsi muaj mov noj hab tsi muaj dlej haus nuav? Peb noj tsi taug tej zaub mov zoo le nuav lawm!”
Ces tug TSWV txhaj tso cov naab muaj taug lug rua huv cov Yixalayees, cov Yixalayees coob leej txhaj raug naab tum tuag lawm.

Cov pejxeem txhaj tuaj cuag Mauxes hab has tas, “Thaus peb tshev tug TSWV hab tshev koj, tub yog peb ua txhum ntaag. Nwgnuav thov koj thov tug TSWV muab cov naab nuav tshem tawm moog.” Yog le ntawd, Mauxes txhaj thov tug TSWV paab cov pejxeem.
Tug TSWV kuas Mauxes muab tooj nchuav ua ib tug naab hab muab moog ntsa rua ntawm ib tug ncej, yog naab tum leejtwg, kuas tug ntawd tsaa qhovmuag saib tug naab tooj ntawd nwg txhaj tsi tuag.
Mauxes txawm nchuav tau ib tug naab tooj hab muab ntsa rua sau ib tug ncej. Thaus naab tum leejtwg, yog nwg tsaa qhovmuag saib tug naab tooj ntawd, nwg txawm tsi tuag.
Cov Yixalayees moog tsuam yeej rua ntawm Aunpaus.
Ces puab sawv kev ntawm Aunpaus moog tsuam yeej rua ntawm Anpalees kws nyob huv lub taj suabpuam ntawm tebchaws Mau-am saab nubtuaj.
Puab sawv kev ntawm qhov chaw ntawd moog tsuam yeej rua huv lub Haav Zeles.

Puab sawv kev qhov ntawd hab moog tsuam yeej rua ntawm tug Dlej Alenoos saab qaumteb, ntawm lub taj suabpuam kws moog tshuam rua tebchaws Amaules. (Tug dlej Alenoos, yog tug nrim rua lub tebchaws Mau-am hab lub tebchaws Amaules.)
Tub yog le nuav, phoo ntawv kws teev tug TSWV tej kev ua rog txhaj le has txug: “…lub zog Vahes kws nyob huv cheebtsaam Xufas, huv tej haav ntawm tug dlej Alenoos,
hab tej kwj haa kws nqeg moog rua nraag lub zog Ales hab ndlwg moog tshuam rua nraag nrimteb Mau-am.”
Puab sawv kev qhov ntawd moog txug rua ntawm ib qhov chaw hu ua tej Qhov Tshij, yog qhov chaw kws tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Coj cov pejxeem tuaj ua ke, hab kuv yuav muab dlej rua puab haus.”
Lub sijhawm ntawd, cov Yixalayees zoo sab heev hab hu zaaj nkauj nuav: “Tej qhov tshij, mej ca le txhawv dlej laub lug tawm lug; Hab peb yuav zoo sab hu nkauj tog cov dlej ntawd.

Lub qhov tshij nuav yog cov numtswv hab cov pejxeem tej thawjcoj khawb, yog siv vaajntxwv tug cwj hab puab tej paas nreg khawb ntaag.” Ces puab txhaj sawv kev ntawm taj suabpuam moog rua ntawm Matanas,
hab sawv kev ntawm Matanas moog rua ntawm Nahaliyees, hab sawv kev ntawm Nahaliyees moog rua ntawm Npamaus,
hab sawv kev ntawm Npamaus moog rua ntawm lub haav kws nyob huv tebchaws Mau-am. Qhov chaw ntawd nyob sau lub ncov Roob Pinkas, xyuam yaaj lug saib ntsoov rua tim taj suabpuam.
Cov Yixalayees tso tuabneeg moog thov cov Amaules tug vaajntxwv Xihoos has tas:

“Thov pub peb hlaa mej lub tebchaws moog. Peb hab peb tej tsaj yuav tsi plos moog tsuj huv mej tej teb lossis mej tej vaaj txiv maab, hab peb yuav tsi haus tej dlej huv mej tej qhov tshij; peb yuav taug txujkev luj  ncaaj nraim moog kuas dlhau plawg mej cheebtsaam aav.”
Tabsis Xihoos tsi pub cov Yixalayees hlaa nwg lub tebchaws moog. Nwg txhaj txhij nwg cov tubrog moog rua ntawm Yahas kws nyob tom taj suabpuam hab moog puav tua cov Yixalayees.

Tabsis cov Yixalayees tua cov yeebncuab tuag coob heev rua huv tshaav rog hab txeeb tau puab lub tebchaws txij kag ntawm tug Dlej Alenoos saab qaumteb moog txug ndlua rua tim Yanpaus, hab dlhau plawg moog rua tim tebchaws Amoos, rua qhov cov tubrog Amoos kws zuv ntawm nrimteb sab tawv hab zuv nruj heev.

Yog le ntawd cov Yixalayees txhaj txeeb tau taagnrho cov Amaules tej nroog, hab tseem txeeb tau lub tuamceeb nroog Hesenpoos hab tej nroog miv kws nyob ibncig ntawd huv tuabsi. Puab txhaj moog nyob puv nkaus rua huv tej nroog ntawd.

Hesenpoos yog lub tuamceeb nroog kws yog cov Amaules tug vaajntxwv Xihoos nyob ntaag, hab nwg yog tug kws ntxeev sab ua rog tawmtsaam cov Mau-am tug vaajntxwv qub thaus u hab txeeb tau taagnrho Mau-am lub tebchaws moog txug ndlua ntawm tug Dlej Alenoos.
Tub yog vim le ntawd, cov hu nkauj txhaj le hu zaaj nkauj nuav: “Ca le lug rua huv lub nroog Hesenpoos kws yog vaajntxwv Xihoos lub nroog! Peb xaav pum lub nroog ntawd rov txhim khu dlua tshab.
Xihoos cov tubrog tawm huv lub nroog Hesenpoos tuaj moog ib yaam le cov nplaim tawg; mas nwg rhuav lub nroog Ales huv lub tebchaws Mau-am hab nqog taagnrho  tej hauv roob peg Alenoos.

Cov Mau-am, mej yuav raug txomnyem lauj! Mej pe tug mlom Khemaus kws taabtom coj kev puamtsuaj lug! Mej tug vaajtswv yuav coj cov txivneej moog poob kev txomnyem, hab cov quaspuj yuav raug cov Amaules tug vaajntxwv Xihoos nteg coj moog.

Tabsis taamsim nuav peb tub muab puab cov xeebntxwv tua puamtsuaj taag, Txij ndlua tom Hesenpoos lug txug ndlua ntawm Dinpoos, hab pib kag tom Nasees moog ti nkaus rua tim Naufas kws ze rua ntawm Medenpas.”
Yog le ntawd, cov Yixalayees txhaj le moog nyob puv nkaus rua huv tebchaws Amaules,

Mauxes tso tuabneeg moog soj hab tua lub nroog Yaxes. Cov Yixalayees txeeb tau lub nroog ntawd nrug tej zog kws nyob ibncig, hab muab cov Amaules kws nyob huv tej zog ntawd lawv tawm tsiv huv tuabsi lawm.
Cov Yixalayees tig rov lug hab taug kev moog rua tom lub zog Npasaas. Tug vaajntxwv kws kaav lub tebchaws Npasaas txhaj txhij nwg cov tubrog nrug nwg moog tua cov Yixalayees rua tom Edele-is.

Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Mej tsi xob ntshai Aunkas. Kuv yuav pub kuas mej tua yeej nwg, yeej taagnrho nwg cov tuabneeg hab nwg lub tebchaws huv tuabsi. Mej yuav ua rua nwg ib yaam le mej ua rua Xihoos kws yog tug vaajntxwv kaav lub nroog Hesenpoos hab ntaag.”
Yog le ntawd, cov Yixalayees txhaj muab Aunkas, nwg cov tub hab taagnrho nwg cov tuabneeg tua tuag taag tsi tshuav ib tug seem le, hab cov Yixalayees tau lug nyob nwg lub tebchaws.
Cov Yixalayees tsuam yeej su rua huv lub taj nraag Mau-am ntawm tug Dlej Yauladees saab nubtuaj ncaaj lub nroog Yelikaus.
Thaus Xinpaules tug tub Npalaj kws yog cov Mau-am tug vaajntxwv, nov tej kws cov Yixalayees tau ua rua cov Amaules hab cov Yixalayees muaj coob npaum le caag,
txhaj ua rua nwg hab taagnrho nwg cov tuabneeg ntshai heev.

Cov Mau-am has rua cov Midias tej thawjcoj has tas, “Tsi ntev nuav paab tuabneeg ntawd yuav ua rua txhua tsaav yaam kws nyob puagncig peb kuas puamtsuaj taag ib yaam le nyuj noj tej nyom huv tshaav zaub ntaag.” Yog le ntawd vaajntxwv Npalaj

txhaj tso tuabneeg moog has rua Npe-aus tug tub Npala-aas huv lub nroog Npethaus kws nyob ze tug Dlej Efalates huv tebchaws Amavis. Puab coj Npalaj tej lug moog has rua nwg le nuav: “Kuv xaav kuas koj paub tsaav tuabneeg kws tsiv nraag tebchaws Iziv lug, puab sis faib moog nyob txhua nrho qhov txhua chaw lawm, nyob tsaam puab ca le lug txeeb peb lub tebchaws nyob hab.

Cov tuabneeg ntawd muaj coob tshaaj peb lawm, koj ca le tuaj paab kuv foom tsi zoo rua puab. Tej zag peb yuav tua yeej puab hab lawv tau puab tawm huv lub tebchaws nuav moog. Kuv paub has tas thaus koj foom koob moov, cov tuabneeg yeej tau txais koob moov, hab thaus koj foom tsi zoo, puab yeej raug kev txomnyem.”
Cov Mau-am hab cov Midias tej thawjcoj txawm muab nyaj tuaj them tej lug foom tsi zoo ntawd, hab moog cuag Npala-aas, puab pav Npalaj tej lug rua Npala-aas noog.

Npala-aas has tas, “Mej ca le pw ib mos ntawm nuav tsaiv, pigkig kuv maam le qha rua mej paub tej kws tug TSWV has rua kuv.” Yog le ntawd, cov Mau-am tej thawjcoj txhaj nrug Npala-aas nyob tau ib mos.
Vaajtswv lug nug Npala-aas has tas, “Cov tuabneeg kws tuaj su huv koj tsev, puab yog leejtwg?”
Npala-aas teb has tas, “Vaajntxwv Npalaj kws kaav tebchaws Mau-am tso cov tuabneeg nuav tuaj qha rua kuv

txug cov tuabneeg kws lug nraag tebchaws Iziv lug. Puab tub moog nyob txhua qhov chaw huv tebchaws nuav lawm. Mas nwg xaav kuas kuv paab nwg foom tsi zoo rua puab, nwg txhaj muaj peevxwm tua yeej hab lawv tau puab tsiv tawm moog.”
Vaajtswv has rua Npala-aas has tas, “Koj tsi xob nrug cov tuabneeg nuav moog, hab tsi xob foom tsi zoo rua cov Yixalayees ib lus le, rua qhov puab yog cov kws kuv tub foom koob moov rua lawm.”
Taagkig sawv ntxuv Npala-aas txhaj moog cuag cov tuabneeg kws Npalaj khaiv tuaj hab has rua puab tas, “Mej ca le rov qaab moog tsev; rua qhov tug TSWV tsi pub kuv nrug mej moog.”
Puab txawm rov lug cuag Npalaj hab pav qha rua nwg has tas, “Npala-aas tsi kaam nrug peb tuaj.”
Ces Npalaj khaiv ntau tug thawjcoj kws muaj meejmom tshaaj cov kws xub moog lawm rov moog dlua.
Puab moog cuag Npala-aas hab muab Npalaj tej lug has rua Npala-aas has tas: “Koj tsi xob yig, koj ca le tuaj lawv le kuv thov koj!
Kuv yuav muab nqe zug rua koj kuas koj npluanuj hab kuv yuav ua txhua yaam lawv le koj has. Thov koj ca le tuaj paab kuv foom tsi zoo rua cov tuabneeg ntawd.”
Tabsis Npala-aas teb has tas, “Txawm yog vaajntxwv Npalaj muab taagnrho tej nyaj hab kub huv nwg lub loog rua kuv los kuv yuav tsi kaam hlaa tug TSWV kws yog kuv tug Vaajtswv ib lu lug le.
Mej ca le su ntawm nuav ib mos ib yaam le paab kws tuaj cuag kuv thawj zag, tog saib tug TSWV puas yuav muaj dlua lwm lu lug qha rua kuv.”
Mo ntawd Vaajtswv lug has rua Npala-aas has tas, “Yog cov tuabneeg nuav thov kuas koj nrug puab moog, koj ca le npaaj nrug puab moog, tabsis koj ncu ntsoov ua lawv le tej kws kuv has rua koj xwb.”
Yog le ntawd, taagkig kaaj ntug Npala-aas txhaj tu nraa hab pem eeb rua sau tug neeg luav nrausqaum hab nrug cov Mau-am tej thawjcoj moog lawm.

Thaus kws Npala-aas sawv kev moog ntawd Vaajtswv chim heev, ces thaus Npala-aas taabtom caij nwg tug neeg luav taug kev moog, hab coj nwg ob tug tubkhai ua nwg luag moog, tug TSWV ib tug timtswv txawm lug sawv huv plawv kev thaiv Npala-aas kev.

Thaus tug neeg luav pum tug timtswv sawv nreg nreeg huv plawv kev hab tuav rawv ib raab ntaaj, tug neeg luav txawm lem loo tsiv moog rua nraag laj. Npala-aas nplawm tug neeg luav kuas rov lug taug kev.
Ces tug timtswv txawm moog sawv huv txujkev kws nyob ntawm lub vaaj txiv maab kws muaj ob dlaim txag zeb thaiv ob saab ntug kev.

Thaus tug neeg luav pum tug timtswv ntawd, tug neeg luav phoom yog moog tsoo tim dlaim txag zeb muab Npala-aas txhais kutaw nas kag rua ntawm dlaim txag zeb. Npala-aas txhaj rov nplawm tug neeg luav ib zag ntxiv.
Tug timtswv rov moog thaiv tom hauv ntej ib zag ntxiv; nwg moog sawv ntawm ntu kev kws ti heev tsi muaj kev zos moog rua saab twg le.
Zag nuav, thaus tug neeg luav pum tug timtswv, tug neeg luav txhaj txhus caug ndlua rua huv aav. Npala-aas npautawg heev hab nwg muab nwg tug paas nreg nplawm tug neeg luav.
Ces Tug TSWV txhaj ua rua tug neeg luav txawj has lug, tug neeg luav txhaj has rua Npala-aas has tas, “Kuv ua txhum koj dlaabtsi? Vim le caag koj txhaj ntaus kuv peb zag le nuav?”
Npala-aas teb has tas, “Rua qhov koj txhobtxwm ua limham rua kuv! Yog kuv muaj ntaaj, ces kuv tub muab koj tua povtseg lawm.”

Tug neeg luav teb has tas, “Kuv tsi yog tug neeg luav kws koj ibtxwm caij lug lawm los? Yaav taag lug kuv puas tau ua le nuav rua koj?” Npala-aas teb has tas, “Koj yeej tsi tau ua le nuav rua kuv ib zag le!”
Taamsim ntawd tug TSWV ua rua Npala-aas pum tug timtswv tuav rawv ib raab ntaaj sawv ntawd, Npala-aas nyo ntshis pe ua nwg lub ntsejmuag ti nkaus huv aav.
Tug timtswv nug has tas, “Vim le caag koj txhaj ntaus koj tug neeg luav peb zag le nuav? Kuv lug nuav yog kuv lug thaiv koj kev ntaag, rua qhov koj tsi tsimnyog taug txujkev nuav moog.
Tabsis tug neeg luav pum kuv hab nwg lem zos kev peb zag. Yog nwg tsi ua le ntawd, kuv tub muab koj tua hab tso tug neeg luav moog lawm.”
Npala-aas has tas, “Kuv ua txhum lawm. Kuv tsi paub has tas, yog koj thaiv kuv kev tsi pub kuv moog; tabsis yog koj xaav has tas qhov kws kuv moog nuav txhum lawm, kuv yuav rov qaab moog tsev.”
Tug timtswv teb has tas, “Koj ca le nrug cov tuabneeg nuav moog, tabsis koj yuavtsum has tej lug kws kuv kuas koj has xwb.” Yog le ntawd, Npala-aas txhaj nrug puab moog lawm.
Thaus Npalaj nov has tas Npala-aas tuaj lawm, Npalaj txhaj moog tog Npala-aas peg lub nroog Ales kws nyob ntawm ntug Dlej Alenoos kws ze nrimteb Mau-am.
Npalaj nug Npala-aas has tas, “Ua caag thawj zag kws kuv tso tuabneeg tuaj hu koj, koj tsi kaam tuaj? Koj xaav has tas nyob tsaam kuv tsi muab nqe zug txaus rua koj nua los?”
Npala-aas teb has tas, “Kuv tub tuaj txug lawm ne? Tabsis taamsim nuav, kuv muaj fwjchim ua tau dlaabtsi? Kuv tsuas muaj cuabkaav has tau le Vaajtswv kuas kuv has xwb.”
Npala-aas nrug Npalaj moog tom lub nroog Huxaus,
Npalaj muab nyuj muab yaaj lug tua hab muab nqaj rua Npala-aas hab cov numtswv kws nrug nwg nyob ua ke ntawd noj.
Taagkig sawv ntxuv Npalaj coj Npala-aas moog rua peg Npamaus Npa-aas, thaus obtug moog txug peg, Npala-aas pum cov Yixalayees ibtxha.
Npala-aas has tas, “Koj ca le teeb xyaa lub thaaj rua kuv, hab muab xyaa tug txiv nyuj hab xyaa tug laug yaaj rua kuv.”
Npalaj ua lawv le Npala-aas has, ib lub thaaj twg tua ib tug nyuj hab ib tug laug yaaj hlawv fij rua sau.

Ces Npala-aas has rua Npalaj has tas, “Thaus kuv moog saib, saib tug TSWV lug has dlaabtsi rua kuv lossis tsi has, koj ca le moog sawv ntawm qhov chaw kws hlawv koj tej khoom fij. Txhua yaam kws tug TSWV has rua kuv, kuv yuav qha rua koj.” Yog le ntawd, Npala-aas txhaj nce moog rua sau ib lub ncov roob,
hab Vaajtswv lug cuag Npala-aas. Npala-aas has rua Vaajtswv has tas, “Kuv teeb xyaa lub thaaj hab tua nyuj tua yaaj fij tso rua sau xyaa lub thaaj ntawd ib lub ib tug nyuj hab ib tug yaaj.”
Tug TSWV qha tej lug kws yuav has rua Npala-aas hab kuas nwg coj tej lug ntawd rov lug has rua Npalaj.
Npala-aas rov lug, nwg lug pum Npalaj hab cov Mau-am tej thawjcoj sawv ntawm qhov chaw kws hlawv tej khoom fij ntawd.

Ces Npala-aas cevlug has tas, “Cov Mau-am tug vaajntxwv Npalaj tog kuv peg tebchaws Xilias kws nyob peg cov roob saab nubtuaj tuaj. Nwg has tas, ‘Koj tuaj paab kuv foom tsi zoo rua Yakhauj kws yog Yixalayees.’
Kuv yuav ua le caag foom tsi zoo rua cov tuabneeg kws Vaajtswv tsi foom phem rua puab lossis kuv yuav ua le caag thuam cov tuabneeg kws tug TSWV tsi thuam!

Kuv sawv sau hauv tsua kws sab xyuam yaaj lug kuv saib moog pum puab; kuv nyob sau ncov roob kuv saib ntsoov puab. Puab yog ib tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob ib caag; puab tsi suav has tas puab nrug lwm tsaav tuabneeg koom ua ib paab.

Yixalayees cov xeebntxwv coob heev suav tsi txheeb le tej moov aav, coob kawg le tsi muaj leejtwg yuav suav txheeb. Thov kuas thaus taag kuv simneej kuv zoo le Vaajtswv tsaav tuabneeg ib tug; Thov ca kuv tuag thaajyeeb lug le tej tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg tuag.”
Npalaj has rua Npala-aas has tas, “Ua caag koj ua le ko rua kuv? Kuv coj koj tuaj, yog kuas koj tuaj foom tsi zoo rua kuv cov yeebncuab, tabsis koj tsua foom koob moov rua puab!”
Npala-aas teb has tas, “Kuv tsuas muaj cuabkaav has tau tej lug kws tug TSWV qheb kuv lub qhovncauj has xwb.”
Tom qaab ntawd Npalaj rov has dlua rua Npala-aas has tas, “Koj ca le nrug kuv moog rua lwm qhov chaw koj yuav pum cov Yixalayees ibtxha hab. Koj ca le foom tsi zoo rua puab.”

Npalaj coj Npala-aas moog rua peg Xaufees thaaj teb kws nyob sau Roob Pinkas. Thaus moog txug sau, Npalaj teeb tau xyaa lub thaaj hab ib lub thaaj twg tua ib tug txiv nyuj hab ib tug laug yaaj hlawv fij rua sau.
Npala-aas has rua Npalaj has tas, “Koj ca le moog sawv ntawm koj tej khoom fij kws hlawv ntawd, kuv yuav moog cuag Vaajtswv lawm tid.”
Tug TSWV lug cuag Npala-aas hab qha tej lug kws yuav has rua Npala-aas kuas coj rov lug has rua Npalaj.
Npala-aas rov lug pum Npalaj tseem sawv nrug cov Mau-am tej thawjcoj ntawm qhov chaw kws hlawv nwg cov khoom fij ntawd. Npalaj nug saib tug TSWV has le caag,
Npala-aas cevlug has tas: “Xipaules tug tub Npalaj, koj ca le lug ntawm nuav hab noog tej lug kws kuv has,
Vaajtswv tsi zoo le tej tuabneeg kws pheej has lug dlaag. Nwg tsi yog tug kws pheej yuav hloov sab. Nwg coglug le caag, nwg yeej ua le ntawd; nwg has le caag, yeej muaj le nwg has.
Vaajtswv tsaa kuv ua tug foom koob moov hab thaus Vaajtswv foom koob moov rua leejtwg lawm, kuv tsi muaj cuabkaav thim tej lug ntawd rov qaab.

Kuv tub pum ua ntej lawm has tas cov Yixalayees lub neej yaav tom ntej yuav tsi raug kev txomnyem ib zag le. Tug TSWV kws yog puab tug Vaajtswv nrug nraim puab; Hab puab has nrov nrov tas nwg yog puab tug vaajntxwv.
Vaajtswv coj puab nraag tebchaws Iziv lug; Nwg paab puab ntaus rog ib yaam le tug phaws nyuj qus.

Tej tuabneeg kws txawj ua yeegsiv hab txawj ua khawvkoob, tsi muaj cuabkaav tawmtsaam tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees. Nwgnuav tej tuabneeg yuav has txug cov Yixalayees has tas, ‘Ca le saib tej kws tug TSWV ua rua cov Yixalayees!’

Tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees zoo ib yaam le tug tsuv ntxhuav kws muaj zug heev: nwg yeej tsi su moog txug thaus nwg muab tej kws nwg tum tau haus ntshaav taag. Hab nwg yeej tsi pw moog txug thaus kws nwg muab noj taag.”
Ces Npalaj has rua Npala-aas has tas, “Yog koj tsi kaam foom tsi zoo rua cov Yixalayees, mas koj tsi xob foom koob moov rua puab hab.”
Npala-aas teb has tas, “Kuv tsi tau qha rua koj has tas, kuv tsuas ua tau tej kws tug TSWV kuas kuv ua xwb nua los?”
Npalaj has tas, “Koj ca le nrug kuv moog, kuv yuav coj koj moog rua lwm qhov chaw. Tej zag Vaajtswv yuav ca koj foom tsi zoo rua puab.”
Npalaj coj Npala-aas moog rua sau lub ncov Roob Pe-aus kws saib ntsoov pum rua tim taj suabpuam.
Npala-aas has rua Npalaj has tas, “Koj ca le teeb xyaa lub thaaj rua kuv hab muab xyaa tug txiv nyuj hab xyaa tug laug yaaj rua kuv.”
Npalaj ua lawv le Npala-aas has, ib lub thaaj twg tua ib tug txiv nyuj hab ib tug laug yaaj hlawv fij rua sau.

Zag nuav Npala-aas paub has tas, Vaajtswv xaav kuas nwg foom koob moov rua cov Yixalayees, yog le ntawd nwg txhaj tsi moog tsawv moov, ib yaam le nwg tau ua taag lug lawm. Nwg tig hlo xubndlag moog rua tim taj suabpuam,
hab pum cov Yixalayees tsaa tsevntaub nyob ib xeem quas ib xeem. Vaajtswv tug ntsujplig tshoov Npala-aas sab,
nwg txhaj cevlug has tas: “Tej lug tseemceeb nuav yog Npe-aus tug tub Npala-aas has, yog tug txivneej kws pum qhov tseeb tej lug.
Kuv yog tug nov Vaajtswv tej lug, kuv yog tug kws qhovmuag rua plav pum ntsoov tej kws Vaajtswv tug kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus ua rua kuv pum.
Cov Yixalayees tej tsevntaub zoo nkauj kawg le.

Zoo ib yaam le tej leej toovlaaj kws nplooj npug luas Lossis zoo ib yaam le tej vaaj zaub kws nyob lawv ntug dlej, zoo ib yaam le tsob ntoo tsw qaab kws tug TSWV cog tseg lossis zoo le tej ntoo cab kws tuaj ntawm ntug dlej.

Puab lub tebchaws yuav muaj dlej naag nplua mag hab puab yuav cog tej noob qoob rua thaaj teb kws aav noo zaws. Puab tug vaajntxwv muaj fwjchim heev dlua Vaajntxwv Ankas, hab nwg yuav kaav lub tebchaws nthuav moog dleb hab dlaav zuj zug.

Vaajtswv coj puab nraag tebchaws Iziv lug, Nwg paab puab tawmtsaam yeebncuab ib yaam le tug phaws nyuj qus. Puab rhuav cov yeebncuab, tsoo puab cov yeebncuab tej pobtxhaa muab yeebncuab tej xub nee luv taag.

Tsaav tuabneeg nuav zoo ib yaam le tug tsuv ntxhuav kws muaj zug heev; thaus nwg pw tsaug zug lawm, tsi muaj leejtwg tsaa tau nwg sawv. Tug kws foom koob moov rua cov Yixalayees, tug ntawd yuav tau koob moov, hab tug kws foom tsi zoo rua cov Yixalayees, tug ntawd yuav raug foom tsi zoo.”

Npalaj sawv tseeg nyem nrig npautawg vog hab has rua Npala-aas has tas, “Kuv coj koj tuaj ntawm nuav, yog coj tuaj foom tsi zoo rua kuv cov yeebncuab, tabsis koj tsi foom phem rua puab, koj ca le foom koob moov rua puab peb zag rua zag nuav lawm.
Koj ca le rov moog tsev taamsim nuav! Kuv yeej coglug muab nqe zug rua koj, tabsis tug TSWV txwv tsi pub koj yuav tej nqe zug nuav.”
Npala-aas teb has tas, “Kuv tub yeej has rua koj cov tuabneeg kws koj khaiv tuaj hu kuv lawm,

txawm yog koj yuav muab taagnrho tej nyaj tej kub huv koj lub txhaab nyaj rua kuv los kuv yeej tsi muaj cuabkaav ua ib yaam dlaabtsi le, yog tej ntawd yuav ua rua kuv hlaa tug TSWV tej lug. Kuv tsuas muaj cuabkaav has tej lug kws tug TSWV kuas kuv has xwb.”

Npala-aas has rua Npalaj has tas, “Nwgnuav kuv yuav rov moog cuag kuv tsaav tuabneeg, tabsis ua ntej kuv yuav sawv kev moog, kuv qha rua koj has txug tej kws yaav tom ntej cov Yixalayees yuav ua rua koj tsaav tuabneeg.”
Ces Npala-aas txhaj cevlug has tas, “Tej lug tseemceeb nuav yog Npe-aus tug tub Npala-aas has, tej lug nuav yog tug txivneej kws pum qhov tseeb has.

Kuv yog tug nov Vaajtswv tej lug, hab khaws nkaus Vaajtswv tug kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus lub tswvyim rua nruab sab. Kuv yog tug kws lub qhovmuag rua plav saib ntsoov tej kws Vaajtswv tug muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus ua rua kuv pum.

Kuv pum nwg, tabsis tsi yog taamsim nuav, kuv saib ntsoov nwg, tabsis tsi nyob ze, yuav muaj ib lub nubqub tshwm huv Yakhauj tuaj, yuav muaj ib tug cwj vaajntxwv tshwm huv cov Yixalayees lug. Nwg yuav tsoo cov Mau-am hauvplaj kuas ntsoog, hab yuav ntaus Xej cov tuabneeg kuas swb taagnrho.
Nwg yuav tua yeej cov Edoos hab txeeb tau nwg cov yeebncuab lub tebchaws lug ua nwg tug; ces cov Yixalayees yuav muaj yeej luj zuj zug.
Cov Yixalayees yuav sawv lug tswj teb kaav chaw; hab yuav tua cov tuabneeg kws seem huv tej nroog kuas tuag taag.”

Nyob huv Npala-aas zaaj ywgtoog, mas nwg pum cov Amalej, nwg txhaj cevlug has tas: “Cov Amalej yog tsaav tuabneeg kws muaj fwjchim luj dlua ndlais huv tuabsi, Tabsis thaus kawg tsaav tuabneeg nuav yuav raug kev puamtsuaj taag.”

Nyob huv Npala-aas zaaj ywgtoog, mas nwg pum cov Kenais, nwg txhaj cevlug has tas: “Mej tej chaw nyob ruaj khov kho tso sab lug ib yaam le tej zeg noog kws nyob sau tej hauv tsua kws sab tshaaj plawg,
Tabsis cov Kenais, mej yuav raug kev puamtsuaj, thaus cov Axilias tuaj nteg tau mej lawm.”
Npala-aas cevlug dlua has tas: “Tuag lauj, yog Vaajtswv ua tej nuav, leejtwg tseem yuav muaj sa nyob hab?
Cov tuabneeg kws tuaj txeeb yuav tsaav nkoj tim Xaipas tuaj; puab yuav tua yeej cov Axilias hab cov Enpes, tabsis thaus kawg, puab yuav tuag tu noob nrho.”
Ces Npala-aas txawm tu nraa hab sawv kev rov qaab moog tsev lawm, Npalaj los kuj sawv kev rov qaab lug tsev lawm hab.
Thaus cov Yixalayees tseem nyob ntawm lub Haav Akaxias, cov txivneej txawm moog ntxag cov Mau-am kws ibtxwm nyob ntawd tej ntxhais.
Cov quaspuj ntawd, caw cov txivneej nuav nrug puab moog ua kevcai fij khoom ntawm qhov chaw kws pe cov Mau-am tej vaajtswv. Cov Yixalayees moog noj tej zaub mov ntawd hab pe cov Mau-am tej vaajtswv
kws yog Pe-aus tug mlom Npa-aas. Yog le ntawd, tug TSWV txhaj chim heev rua cov Yixalayees
hab tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Coj taagnrho cov Yixalayees tej thawjcoj moog khi dlai zab tshaav ntuj taabmeeg tug TSWV,  ces kuv txhaj yuav tsi chim rua cov pejxeem.”
Mauxes txhaj has rua cov numtswv has tas, “Mej ca le muab txhua tug tuabneeg huv mej xeem kws moog pe Npa-aas sau roob Pe-aus tua povtseg.”

Muaj ib tug txivneej Yixalayees coj tau cov Midias ib tug ntxhais lug huv nwg tsev taabmeeg Mauxes hab cov pejxeem, thaus puab tseem taabtom quaj nyav ntsoog qeeg ntawm tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib lub qhovrooj.
Thaus Ele-axas tug tub Finehas kws yog Aloos tug xeebntxwv pum le ntawd, nwg sawv tseeg tso plhuav pawg tuabneeg ntawd tseg. Nwg moog nqaa tau ib raab muv

lawv tug txivneej hab tug quaspuj ntawd qaab moog rua huv lub tsevntaub, nwg muab muv nkaug obtug tshaab plawg tuag kag rua ntawd. Yog le ntawd, tej vijsub vijsw kws taabtom raug cov Yixalayees txhaj tseg kag taamsim ntawd,
tabsis cov tuabneeg kws raug tua tuag tub muaj neeg nkaum plaub txheeb leej lawm.
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas,

“Vim Ele-axas tug tub Finehas kws yog Aloos tug xeebntxwv tau ua tej nuav tav, kuv txhaj tsi chim rua cov Yixalayees lawm. Vim nwg khib le kuv kws yog nwg tug Vaajtswv khib, kuv txujkev chim txhaj tsi ua rua puab raug puamtsuaj.
Koj ca le moog qha rua nwg has tas, kuv yuav coglug tseg rua nwg moog taag nwg simneej le.

Mas nwg hab nwg cov xeebntxwv yuav tau ua cov povthawj moog ibtxhis lawv le kuv tau coglug tseg lawm, vim nwg nrug nwg tug Vaajtswv khib, hab nwg tau ua kuas muaj kev theej txhoj lug rua tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees.”
Tug txivneej Yixalayees kws raug tua tuag nrug tug quaspuj Midias ntawd hu ua Xeelis, nwg yog Xalus tug tub kws yog xeem Xime-oos tug thawjcoj ntaag.
Tug quaspuj ntawd hu ua Kauxenpis. Nwg yog Xules kws yog cov Midias tug thawjcoj tug ntxhais.
Ces tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas,
“Ca le moog ua rog rua cov Midias hab tua kuas puab puamtsuaj taag,
vim tej kev phem kev qas kws puab ua rua mej thaus puab dlaag ntxag mej ntawm Pe-aus, hab vim Kauxenpis tug kws raug tua tuag rua lub sijhawm kws taabtom muaj tej vijsub vijsw nyob ntawm Pe-aus.”
Tom qaab kws tej vijsub vijsw ntawd dlhau lawm, tug TSWV has rua Mauxes hab Aloos tug tub Ele-axas kws yog tug povthawj has tas,
“Meb ca le sau cov Yixalayees txhua tsev tuabneeg npe, suav taagnrho cov txivneej kws noobnyoog neeg nkaum xyoo rov sau kws ua taug tubrog.”

Mauxes hab Ele-axas obtug ua lawv le tug TSWV has, obtug txhaj hu taagnrho cov txivneej kws muaj noobnyoog le ntawd tuaj sis sau rua huv lub taj Mau-am ntawm ntug Dlej Yauladees kws nyob ncaaj lub nroog Yelikaus. Cov nuav yog cov Yixalayees kws tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug:
Xeem Lunpees (Lunpees yog Yakhauj tug tub hlub): yog cuab Hanauj, Palus,
Hexeloos hab Kalemis.
Suav taagnrho puab tej cuab kwvtij nuav cov txivneej muaj plaub caug peb txheeb xyaa pua peb caug leej.
Palus tug tub yog Ele-as;

hab Ele-as cov tub yog Nemuyees, Dathaas hab Anpilaas. (Cov pejxeem xaiv Dathaas hab Anpilaas ua puab ob tug thawjcoj. Obtug tawv nyom Mauxes hab Aloos, hab moog koom nrug Kaulas ntxeev sab tawmtsaam tug TSWV.

Ces aav ca le qheb hlo hab nqog obtug lawm, mas obtug txhaj tuag nrug Kaulas hab nwg cov phoojywg thaus kws suavtawg poob lug kub ob puas tsib caug leej txivneej tuag taag ntawd lawm; qhov ntawd txhaj ua ib qhov qha rua cov pejxeem suavdlawg.
Tabsis Kaulas cov tub tsi raug tua tuag ib tug le.)
Xeem Xime-oos: yog cuab Nemuyees, cuab Yamees, cuab Yakhees,
cuab Zelas hab cuab Sa-ules.
Suav taagnrho puab tej cuab kwvtij nuav cov txivneej muaj neeg nkaum ob txheeb ob puas leej.
Xeem Khas: yog cuab Xefoos, cuab Hankis, cuab Sunis,
cuab Auxenis, cuab Elis,
Alaudis hab Alelis.
Suav taagnrho puab tej cuab kwvtij nuav cov txivneej muaj plaub caug txheeb tsib puas leej.
Xeem Yudas: yog cuab Selas, cuab Peles cuab Zelas, cuab Hexeloos hab cuab Hamules. (Yudas ob tug tub kws hu ua Eles hab Aunas puavleej tuag rua tom tebchaws Kana-aas lawm.)
Suav taagnrho puab tej cuab kwvtij nuav cov txivneej muaj xyaa caum rau txheeb tsib puas leej.
Xeem Ixakhas: yog cuab Taulas, cuab Puahas,
cuab Yasus hab cuab Siloos.
Suav taagnrho puab tej cuab kwvtij nuav cov txivneej muaj rau caum plaub txheeb peb puas leej.
Xeem Xenpuloos: yog cuab Xeles, cuab Eloos hab cuab Yahelees.
Suav taagnrho puab tej cuab kwvtij nuav cov txivneej muaj rau caum txheeb tsib puas leej.
Yauxej muaj ob tug tub, Manaxes hab Efalayees obtug ncau moog ua ob xeem.
Xeem Manaxes. Manaxes tug tub Makiles yog Nkile-as txiv, hab Nkile-as yog puab tej cuab kwvtij nraag nuav tug yawmkoob:
Ixes, Heles,
Aliyees, Sekees,
Semidas hab Hefeles.
Hefeles tug tub Xelaufehas tsi muaj ib tug tub le, nwg muaj tsib tug ntxhais xwb; puab cov npe hu ua Malas, Nau-es, Haunkelas, Milekas hab Tilexas.
Suav taagnrho puab tej cuab vivncaug nuav cov txivneej muaj tsib caug ob txheeb xyaa pua leej.
Xeem Efalayees: yog cuab Suthelas, cuab Npekeles hab cuab Tahaas.
Cuab Elaas yog Suthelas caajceg.
Suav taagnrho puab tej cuab kwvtij nuav cov txivneej muaj peb caug ob txheeb tsib puas leej. Taagnrho tej cuab kwvtij kws has lug nuav puavleej yog Yauxej caajceg.
Xeem Npeenyamees: yog cuab Npelas, cuab Asenpes, cuab Ahilaas,
cuab Sefufas hab cuab Hufas.
Cuab Ales hab cuab Na-amaas yog Npelas caajceg.
Suav taagnrho puab tej cuab kwvtij nuav cov txivneej muaj plaub caug tsib txheeb rau pua leej.
Xeem Daas: yog cuab Husees,
suav taagnrho cuab kwvtij nuav cov txivneej muaj rau caum plaub txheeb plaub puas leej.
Xeem Aseles: yog cuab Imenas, cuab Esavis hab cuab Npeliyas.
Cuab Henpeles hab cuab Makhiyees, yog Npeliyas caajceg.
Aseles muaj ib tug ntxhais xwb, nwg lub npe hu ua Xelas.
Suav taagnrho puab tej cuab kwvtij nuav cov txivneej muaj tsib caug peb txheeb plaub puas leej.
Xeem Nathalis: yog cuab Yaxees, cuab Nkunis,
cuab Yexes hab cuab Silees.
Suav taagnrho puab tej cuab kwvtij nuav cov txivneej muaj plaub caug tsib txheeb tsib puas leej.
Suav taagnrho tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees cov txivneej muaj rau pua ib txheeb xyaa pua peb caug leej.
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas,
“Koj ca le muab lub tebchaws nuav faib rua tej xeem lawv le tej xeem ntawd muaj tuabneeg coob hab tsawg.
Muab lub tebchaws nuav rhu ntawv faib, muab thaaj aav dlaav rua tej xeem kws muaj tuabneeg coob nyob hab muab thaaj aav nqaim rua tej xeem kws muaj tuabneeg tsawg nyob.”
Xeem Levis sau npe lawv le cuab Nkesoos, Kauhas, hab Melalis.
Suav taagnrho puab cov xeebntxwv muaj lawv le nuav: cuab Linpenis, cuab Henploos, cuab Mahalis, cuab Musis hab cuab Kaulas. Kauhas yog Alamas txiv,

nwg yuav Levis tug ntxhais Yaukhenpes kws yug nraag tebchaws Iziv ua quaspuj. Yaukhenpes txhaj yug tau ob tug tub rua Alamas: ob tug tub ntawd yog Aloos hab Mauxes, hab yug tau ib tug ntxhais hu ua Milias.
Aloos muaj plaub tug tub, Nadas, Anpihus, Ele-axas hab Ithamas.
Nadas hab Anpihus obtug tuag thaus obtug muab cov ncaig tawg kws tsi dlawbhuv hlawv khoom fij rua tug TSWV lawm.
Cov Levis tej txivneej kws noobnyoog ib hlis rov sau muaj neeg nkaum peb txheeb leej. Cov Levis tsi sau npe nrug cov Yixalayees, vim puab tsi muaj feem tau lub tebchaws Yixalayees lug ua puab tug.
Taagnrho tej cuab Yixalayees nuav puavleej yog Mauxes hab cuab Ele-axas ua ob tug kws sau puab tej npe nyob huv lub taj Mau-am ntawm ntug Dlej Yauladees kws nyob ncaaj lub nroog Yelikaus saab tid.
Cov tuabneeg kws Mauxes hab Aloos obtug sau npe thawj zag nraag taj Suabpuam Xinais yeej tsi tshuav ib tug seem le lawm.
Tug TSWV has tas, taagnrho puab cov ntawd yuav tuag taag rua huv taj suabpuam, tsuas tshuav Yefunes tug tub Kalej hab Noos tug tub Yausuas nkaus xwb txhaj tsi tuag.

Malas, Nau-es, Haunkelas, Milekas hab Tilexas, puavleej yog Hefeles tug tub Xelaufehas cov ntxhais, (Xelaufehas yog Hefeles tub, Hefeles yog Nkele-as tub, Nkele-as yog Makis tub, Makis yog Manaxes tub hab Manaxes yog Yauxej tub.)
Puab moog sawv taabmeeg Mauxes, tug povthawj Ele-axas, cov thawjcoj hab taagnrho cov pejxeem rua ntawm tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib lub qhovrooj hab thov has tas,
“Peb txiv tuag rua tom taj suabpuam lawm nwg tsi muaj tub le, nwg tsi koom sab nrug Kaulas cov phoojywg ntxeev sab rua tug TSWV; nwg tuag vim nwg tej kev txhum nkaus xwb.

Tub yog peb txiv tsi muaj ib tug tub, yog le ntawd peb txiv lub npe txawm yuav pluj huv tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees moog le los? Thov muab peb txiv tej qubtxeeg qubteg ntawm nwg cov kwvtij lug faib rua peb hab.”
Mauxes coj puab tej lug moog has rua tug TSWV,
ces tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas,
“Xelaufehas cov ntxhais tej lug thov yeej yog lawm; koj ca le muab tej qubtxeeg qubteg ntawm puab txiv cov kwvtij lug rua puab. Ca puab yuav puab txiv tej qubtxeeg qubteg ntawd.
Qha rua cov Yixalayees has tas yog thaus ib tug txivneej twg tuag lawm, nwg tsi muaj tub lug tuav nwg tej qubtxeeg qubteg, nwg tug ntxhais yog tug lug tuav nwg tej qubtxeeg qubteg ntaag.
Yog nwg tsi muaj ntxhais le hab, maam le ca nwg cov kwvtij tuav nwg tej qubtxeeg qubteg.
Yog nwg tsi muaj kwvtij le, nwg txiv cov kwvtij yog cov tuav nwg tej qubtxeeg qubteg ntawd.

Yog nwg tsi muaj kwvtij lossis txiv ntxawm lossis yawm laug le, ces nwg tej kwvtij txheeb ze yog cov tuav nwg tej qubtxeeg qubteg. Cov Yixalayees yuavtsum ceev zaaj nuav ua ib txuj kevcai rua puab suavdlawg coj, lawv le kuv kws yog tug TSWV tau has rua koj lawm.”
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Koj ca le moog rua sau lub Roob Anpalees hab tuaj sau saib lub tebchaws kws kuv yuav muab rua cov Yixalayees nyob.
Tom qaab kws koj saib taag, koj yuav tuag moog ib yaam le koj tug tijlaug Aloos.

Rua qhov meb ob kwvtij ntxeev sab rua kuv tej lug saamfwm nraag taj suabpuam Xees. Thaus cov pejxeem ywg kuv nraag Melinpas, meb tsi kaam ua kuv lub fwjchim kws luj kawg nkaus taabmeeg rua puab pum.” (Melinpas yog lub npe qhovdlej txhawv kws nyob huv lub nroog Kades nraag taj suabpuam Xees.)
Mauxes thov Vaajtswv has tas,
“Tug TSWV, Vaajtswv kws yog tug tuav suavdlawg txujsa hab ib puas tsaav yaam huv tuabsi, kuv thov koj tsaa ib tug lug ua tug coj cov tuabneeg nuav,
hab coj puab moog ntaus rog, kuas koj tsaav tuabneeg txhaj yuav tsi zoo le paab yaaj kws tsi muaj tug tswv yug.”
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Koj ca le moog coj Noos tug tub Yausuas kws yog tug tuabneeg thoob tsib to nrog tuaj, hab tsaa koj txhais teg rua sau nwg taubhau.
Kuas nwg tuaj sawv taabmeeg tug povthawj Ele-axas hab cov pejxeem, hab tsaa nwg ua tug hloov koj chaw taabmeeg suavdlawg.
Muab koj lub fwjchim faib rua nwg, kuas cov Yixalayees txhaj yuav fwm nwg.
Yausuas yuav nrug tug povthawj Ele-axas siv lub Ulees hab lub Thumees.  Ua le nuav Ele-axas txhaj qha tau rua Yausuas hab cov Yixalayees ua hum tug TSWV sab.”
Mauxes ua lawv le tug TSWV has rua nwg. Nwg txhaj coj Yausuas moog sawv taabmeeg tug povthawj Ele-axas hab cov pejxeem Yixalayees.
Mauxes tsaa nwg ob txhais teg rua sau Yausuas taubhau hab tsaa Yausuas ua tug hloov Mauxes chaw, lawv le tug TSWV tau has rua Mauxes lawm.
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas,
Koj ca le qha rua cov Yixalayees kuas puab yuavtsum coj tej khoom tsw qaab kws txaus kuv sab tuaj hlawv fij rua kuv lawv le tau teem tseg lawm.
Hab koj has rua puab tas, ntawm nuav yog tej khoom kws coj tuaj fij rua tug TSWV: cov kws muab hlawv fij txhua nub yog ob tug thaav yaaj noobnyoog ib xyoos kws tsi muaj ib qhov phem le.
Muab ib tug fij rua thaus sawv ntxuv hab muab ib tug fij rua thaus yuav tsaus ntuj,
ib tug thaav yaaj twg muab ob choj moov nplej ntse xyaw ob khob roj txiv ntoo moog fij nrug.
Nuav yog txuj kevcai kws naj nub muab khoom hlawv fij, kuas tsw qaab ntxag txaus tug TSWV sab, lawv le txeev ua tom roob Xinais lawm.
Cov cawv txiv maab kws coj moog fij nrug tug mivnyuas yaaj, thaus sawv ntxuv, mas muab ob khob laub rua huv chaav pehawm tug TSWV.
Tug kws fij thaus yuav tsaus ntuj los muab cov cawv txiv maab fij nrug ib yaam le tug kws fij thaus sawv ntxuv. Tej nuav yog khoom hlawv fij kuas tsw qaab ntxag txaus tug TSWV sab.

Nub Xanpataus, mas muab ob tug thaav yaaj noobnyoog ib xyoos kws tsi muaj ib qhov phem le, hab plaub choj moov nplej ntse xyaw roj txiv ntoo coj moog ua zaub mov fij, hab muab cawv txiv maab moog fij nrug.
Cov khoom kws hlawv fij nuav yuavtsum coj moog fij txhua nub Xanpataus hab ntxiv rua cov khoom fij kws naj nub hlawv fij nrug cov cawv txiv maab.

Txhua lub hlis nub xab ib, hlawv khoom fij rua tug TSWV le nuav: ob tug ntsuag nyuj, ib tug laug yaaj, xyaa tug thaav yaaj noobnyoog ib xyoos, txhua tug tsaj nuav yog cov kws tsi muaj ib qhov phem le.
Tej qoobloo kws coj moog ua khoom fij, muab tej moov nplej ntse xyaw roj txiv ntoo coj moog fij le nuav: ib tug nyuj twg muab rau choj moov nplej; ib tug laug yaaj twg muab plaub choj moov nplej;
hab ib tug thaav yaaj twg muab ob choj moov nplej moog fij nrug. Tej khoom nuav coj moog hlawv fij kuas tsw qaab ntxag txaus tug TSWV sab.

Ib tug nyuj twg muab plaub khob cawv txiv maab fij nrug ib tug laug yaaj muab peb khob cawv txiv maab fij nrug, hab ib tug thaav yaaj twg muab ob khob cawv txiv maab moog fij nrug. Tej nuav yog txuj kevcai kws hlawv khoom fij rua txhua lub hlis nub xab ib moog kuas taag xyoo.
Hab muab ib tug laug tshis tua fij dlaws txim, ntxiv rua tej khoom kws naj nub coj moog hlawv fij nrug tej cawv txiv maab kws coj moog fij ntawd.
Ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau qhuas tug TSWV thaus lub ib hlis ntuj nub kaum plaub.
Nub kaum tsib yog nub pib ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau kws yog ua kuas txwm nkaus xyaa nub, thaus lub sijhawm ntawd, mas noj cov ncuav tsi xyaw keeb nkaus xwb.
Thawj nub kws pib ua kevcai yog nub mej sis sau tuaj pehawm, hab tsi xob ua ib yaam num dlaabtsi le.
Mej muab khoom hlawv fij rua tug TSWV lawv le nuav: ob tug ntsuag nyuj, ib tug laug yaaj, hab xyaa tug thaav yaaj kws noobnyoog ib xyoos, txhua tug tsaj nuav yog cov kws tsi muaj ib qhov phem le.
Muab tej moov nplej ntse xyaw roj txiv ntoo le nuav coj moog ua khoom fij: ib tug nyuj twg muab rau choj moov nplej, fij nrug ib tug laug yaaj muab plaub choj moov nplej fij nrug,
hab ib tug thaav yaaj twg muab ob choj moov nplej moog fij nrug.
Hab muab dlua ib tug laug tshis moog tua fij dlaws txim, hab ca le ua kevcai ntxuav rua cov pejxeem.
Tej khoom fij nuav, yog muab ntxiv rua tej khoom fij kws mej naj taagkig coj moog hlawv fij rua tug TSWV.

Ib yaam nkaus le ntawd, xyaa nub kws mej fij tej zaub mov ntawd rua tug TSWV, ua kuas tsw qaab ntxag rua tug TSWV. Tej khoom nuav yog fij ntxiv rua tej khoom kws mej naj nub hlawv fij hab tej cawv txiv maab kws yog khoom fij.
Nub xyaa mej yuavtsum rov tuaj sis sau pehawm Vaajtswv hab tsi xob ua ib yaam num dlaabtsi le.
Thawj nub kws ua Kevcai Sau Qoobloo, yog thaus mej coj tej qoob tshab tuaj fij rua tug TSWV, mej tuaj sis sau ua ke pehawm Vaajtswv, hab nub ntawd tsi xob ua ib yaam num dlaabtsi le.

Muab khoom moog hlawv fij kuas tsw qaab ntxag rua tug TSWV le nuav: ob tug ntsuag nyuj, ib tug laug yaaj hab xyaa tug thaav yaaj noobnyoog ib xyoos, txhua tug tsaj nuav yog cov kws tsi muaj ib qhov phem le.
Muab cov moov nplej ntse xyaw roj txiv ntoo coj moog fij: ib tug txiv nyuj twg muab rau choj moov nplej, ib tug laug yaaj muab plaub choj moov nplej,
hab ib tug thaav yaaj twg muab ob choj moov nplej moog fij nrug.
Hab muab dlua ib tug laug tshis moog tua fij dlaws txim, hab ua kevcai ntxuav rua cov pejxeem.
Fij tej khoom hab tej cawv txiv maab nuav ntxiv rua tej khoom kws naj nub hlawv fij, hab tej qoobloo kws yog khoom fij. Tej tsaj kws muab fij ntawd yog cov kws tsi muaj ib qhov phem le.
Thaus nub xab ib lub xyaa hli ntuj mej ca le tuaj sis sau pehawm Vaajtswv, hab tsi xob ua ib yaam num dlaabtsi le. Nub ntawd yog nub kws tshuab raaj tshuab xyu.

Mej muab khoom coj moog hlawv fij rua tug TSWV, kuas tsw qaab ntxag rua nwg: ib tug ntsuag nyuj, ib tug laug yaaj, hab xyaa tug thaav yaaj noobnyoog ib xyoos, txhua tug tsaj nuav yog cov kws tsi muaj ib qhov phem le.
Muab moov nplej ntse xyaw roj txiv ntoo coj moog fij: ib tug ntsuag nyuj muab rau choj moov nplej fij, ib tug laug yaaj muab plaub choj moov nplej
hab ib tug thaav yaaj twg muab ob choj moov nplej moog fij nrug.
Hab muab dlua ib tug laug tshis moog tua fij dlaws txim hab ua kevcai ntxuav rua cov pejxeem.

Cov khoom nuav coj moog fij ntxiv rua cov khoom kws naj nub fij thaus nub xab ib nrug puab tej qoobloo hab cov cawv txiv maab kws coj moog hlawv fij. Muab tej khoom nuav hlawv fij kuas tsw qaab ntxag txaus tug TSWV sab.
Lub xyaa hli ntuj nub xab kaug, mej ca le tuaj sis sau pehawm Vaajtswv; tsi xob noj zaub noj mov hab tsi xob ua ib yaam num dlaabtsi hlo le.

Muab ib tug ntsuag nyuj, ib tug laug yaaj, hab xyaa tug thaav yaaj noobnyoog ib xyoos kws tsi muaj ib qhov phem le tuaj tua hlawv fij rua tug TSWV, hab ua kuas tej ntawd tsw qaab ntxag txaus tug TSWV sab.
Muab moov nplej ntse xyaw roj txiv ntoo coj moog fij: ib tug nyuj muab rau choj moov nplej, ib tug laug yaaj muab plaub choj moov nplej,
hab ib tug thaav yaaj twg muab ob choj moov nplej moog fij nrug.

Hab muab dlua ib tug laug tshis moog tua fij dlaws txim, ntxiv rua tug tshis kws tua fij ua kevcai ntxuav rua cov pejxeem, hab tej khoom fij kws naj nub hlawv fij nrug tej qoobloo, hab puab tej cawv txiv maab kws coj moog fij.
Lub xyaa hli ntuj nub kaum tsib mej ca le sis sau tuaj ua ke pehawm Vaajtswv. Ua kevcai qhuas tug TSWV kuas txwm xyaa nub hab tsi xob ua ib yaam num dlaabtsi le.

Nub ib muab tej khoom moog hlawv fij rua tug TSWV, kuas tsw qaab ntxag txaus nwg sab: kaum peb tug ntsuag nyuj, ob tug laug yaaj, hab kaum plaub tug thaav yaaj noobnyoog ib xyoos, txhua tug tsaj nuav yog cov kws tsi muaj ib qhov phem le.
Muab moov nplej ntse xyaw roj txiv ntoo coj moog fij: ib tug nyuj muab rau choj moov nplej, ib tug laug yaaj twg muab plaub choj moov nplej,
hab kaum ob tug thaav yaaj ntawd ib tug twg muab ob choj moov nplej hab muab cov cawv txiv maab moog fij nrug.
Hab muab dlua ib tug laug tshis moog tua fij dlaws txim, ntxiv rua tej khoom fij kws naj nub coj moog hlawv fij nrug tej qoobloo hab tej cawv txiv maab.
Nub ob fij kaum ob tug ntsuag nyuj, ob tug laug yaaj, hab kaum plaub tug thaav yaaj noobnyoog ib xyoos, txhua tug tsaj nuav yog cov kws tsi muaj ib qhov phem le.
Cov nyuj, cov laug yaaj hab cov thaav yaaj, muab moov nplej coj moog fij nrug lawv le cov kws fij thawj nub.
Hab muab dlua ib tug laug tshis moog tua fij dlaws txim, ntxiv rua tej khoom fij kws naj nub coj moog hlawv fij nrug tej qoobloo hab puab tej cawv txiv maab.
Nub peb fij kaum ib tug ntsuag nyuj, ob tug laug yaaj, hab kaum plaub tug thaav yaaj noobnyoog ib xyoos, txhua tug tsaj nuav yog cov kws tsi muaj ib qhov phem le.
Cov nyuj, cov laug yaaj hab cov thaav yaaj muab moov nplej coj moog fij nrug lawv le cov kws fij thawj nub.
Hab muab ib tug laug tshis moog tua fij dlaws txim, ntxiv rua tej khoom fij kws naj nub coj moog hlawv fij nrug tej qoobloo hab puab tej cawv txiv maab.
Nub plaub fij kaum tug ntsuag nyuj, ob tug laug yaaj hab kaum plaub tug thaav yaaj noobnyoog ib xyoos, txhua tug tsaj nuav yog cov kws tsi muaj ib qhov phem le.
Cov nyuj, cov laug yaaj hab cov thaav yaaj, muab moov nplej coj moog fij nrug lawv le cov kws fij thawj nub.
Hab muab dlua ib tug laug tshis moog tua fij dlaws txim, ntxiv rua tej khoom fij kws naj nub coj moog hlawv fij nrug tej qoobloo hab puab tej cawv txiv maab.
Nub tsib fij cuaj tug ntsuag nyuj, ob tug laug yaaj, hab kaum plaub tug thaav yaaj noobnyoog ib xyoos, txhua tug tsaj nuav yog cov kws tsi muaj ib qhov phem le.
Cov nyuj, cov laug yaaj hab cov thaav yaaj, muab moov nplej coj moog fij nrug lawv le cov kws fij thawj nub.
Hab muab dlua ib tug laug tshis moog tua fij dlaws txim, ntxiv rua tej khoom fij kws naj nub coj moog hlawv fij nrug tej qoobloo, hab puab tej cawv txiv maab.
Nub rau fij yim tug ntsuag nyuj, ob tug laug yaaj, hab kaum plaub tug thaav yaaj noobnyoog ib xyoos, txhua tug tsaj nuav yog cov kws tsi muaj ib qhov phem le.
Cov nyuj, cov laug yaaj, hab cov thaav yaaj, muab moov nplej coj moog fij nrug lawv le cov kws fij thawj nub.
Hab muab dlua ib tug laug tshis moog tua fij dlaws txim, ntxiv rua tej khoom fij kws naj nub coj moog hlawv fij nrug tej qoobloo, hab puab tej cawv txiv maab.
Nub xyaa fij xyaa tug ntsuag nyuj, ob tug laug yaaj, hab kaum plaub tug thaav yaaj noobnyoog ib xyoos, txhua tug tsaj nuav yog cov kws tsi muaj ib qhov phem le.
Cov nyuj, cov laug yaaj, hab cov thaav yaaj, muab moov nplej coj moog fij nrug lawv le cov kws fij thawj nub.
Hab muab dlua ib tug laug tshis moog tua fij dlaws txim, ntxiv rua tej khoom fij kws naj nub coj moog hlawv fij nrug tej qoobloo, hab puab tej cawv txiv maab.
Nub yim ca le rov tuaj sis sau ua ke pehawm Vaajtswv, hab tsi xob ua ib yaam num dlaabtsi le.

Muab tej khoom coj moog hlawv fij rua tug TSWV, ua kuas tsw qaab ntxag txaus nwg sab: muab ib tug ntsuag nyuj, ib tug laug yaaj, hab xyaa tug thaav yaaj noobnyoog ib xyoos kws tsi muaj ib qhov phem le.
Tug ntsuag nyuj, tug laug yaaj, hab cov thaav yaaj, muab moov nplej coj moog fij nrug lawv le cov kws fij thawj nub.
Hab muab dlua ib tug laug tshis moog tua fij dlaws txim, ntxiv rua tej khoom fij kws naj nub coj moog hlawv fij nrug tej qoobloo, hab puab tej cawv txiv maab.

Ntawm nuav yog txuj kevcai kws has txug tej khoom kws muab hlawv fij rua tug TSWV, tej qoobloo, tej cawv txiv maab, hab fij tej khoom ua kev sis raug zoo rua tug TSWV lawv le lub sijhawm kws mej teem tseg rua thaus ua kevcai. Tej khoom nuav yog muab fij ntxiv rua mej tej khoom fij ua tsaug kws mej tau coglug tseg lawm lossis tej khoom kws mej txaus sab fij.
Yog le Ntawd, Mauxes txhaj qha txhua yaam kws tug TSWV tau saamfwm rua nwg lawm rua cov Yixalayees.
Mauxes qha tej lug nuav rua cov thawjcoj ntawm txhua xeem Yixalayees has tas:

Thaus muaj ib tug tuabneeg twg coglug muab ib yaam dlaabtsi rua tug TSWV lossis coglug rua tej yaam dlaabtsi lawm, nwg tsi xob thim nwg tej lug cog tseg ntawd, tabsis nwg yuavtsum ua txhua yaam lawv le nwg tau coglug lawm.
Ib tug ntxhais twg thaus nwg tseem ua hluas nkauj nrug nwg nam nwg txiv nyob, yog nwg tau coglug yuav muab ib yaam dlaabtsi rua tug TSWV lossis coglug yuav ua ib yaam dlaabtsi lawm,
yog nwg txiv nov tej lug cog tseg ntawd, nwg txiv tsi txwv nwg tej lug cog tseg ntawd, ces nwg yuav tau ua txhua yaam kuas tav lawv le nwg tau coglug tseg lawm.

Tabsis yog thaus nwg txiv nov nwg tej lug cog tseg ntawd, nwg txiv txwv tsi pub ua le ntawd, ces nwg muab tej lug cog tseg ntawd tso tseg hab tsi xob ua. Tug TSWV txhaj yuav zaam nwg lub txim, rua qhov nwg txiv tsi pub nwg ua.
Yog muaj ib tug ntxhais twg kws tsi tau yuav quasyawg coglug tseg, vim nwg tsi ua tuab zoo xaav lossis tsi ceevfaaj lossis nwg coglug yuav ua ib yaam dlaabtsi, nwg maam yuav quasyawg,
yog nwg tug quasyawg tsi txwv thaus nov nwg cov lug cog tseg ntawd, mas tug quaspuj yuav tau ua txhua yaam lawv le nwg tau coglug tseg lawm.

Tabsis thaus tug quasyawg nov tej lug cog tseg ntawd, yog tug quasyawg txwv tsi pub nwg ua lawv le nwg coglug tseg, ces tug quaspuj tsi taag yuav ua lawv le tej lug kws nwg tau cog tseg ntawd. Tug TSWV txhaj yuav zaam nwg lub txim.
Ib tug puj ntsuag lossis ib tug puj nrauj twg, tau coglug tseg le caag lawm, nwg yuav tau ua kuas tav lawv le tej lug kws nwg cog tseg ntawd.
Yog tug quaspuj kws nwg tub yuav quasyawg lawm, tau coglug tseg yuav ua ib yaam dlaabtsi,
yog has tas nwg tug quasyawg tsi txwv thaus tug quasyawg nov nwg tej lug cog tseg ntawd, nwg yuav tau ua kuas tav txhua yaam lawv le nwg tau coglug tseg lawm.
Tabsis yog nwg tug quasyawg txwv tsi pub nwg ua tej ntawd, nwg tsi taag yuav ua le nwg tau coglug lawm. Ces tug TSWV txhaj yuav zaam nwg lub txim, rua qhov nwg tug quasyawg txwv tsi pub nwg ua.
Nwg tug quasyawg muaj cai muab tej lug kws nwg tau cog tseg ntawd xuam povtseg.

Tabsis yog tug quasyawg nov tug quaspuj tej lug cog tseg, ib nub dlhau ib nub tsi has dlaabtsi le, ces tug quaspuj yuavtsum ua txhua yaam le nwg tau coglug tseg. Vim tug quasyawg yeej tsi txwv nub kws nwg nov lug lawm.
Tabsis yog has tas tom qaab ntawd, tug quasyawg maam rhuav nwg tug quaspuj tej lug cog tseg, nwg yuav tau ris nwg tug quaspuj lub txim, vim nwg tug quaspuj tsi tau ua kuas cov lug cog tseg ntawd tav.
Tej nuav yog tej kevcai kws tug TSWV muab cob rua Mauxes, has txug tej lug cog tseg ntawm tej ntxhais kws tseem nrug nwg nam nwg txiv nyob lossis tug ntxhais kws tub yuav quasyawg lawm.
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas,
“Koj ca le rau txim rua cov tuabneeg Midias pauj tej kws puab tau ua rua tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees taag lug lawm. Ces tom qaab kws koj ua tej ntawd tav lawm koj yuav tuag moog.”

Yog le ntawd, Mauxes txawm has rua cov pejxeem has tas, “Ca le npaaj cuabyeej kuas txhij moog ntaus rog, mej muaj cuabkaav tua yeej cov Midias hab rau txim rua puab pauj tej kws puab tau ua rua tug TSWV.
Tso ib xeem Yixalayees twg ib txheeb leej moog ntaus rog.”
Yog le ntawd, ib xeem twg txhaj xaiv tau ib txheeb leej, suav taagnrho kaum ob xeem ntawd xaiv tau kaum ob txheeb tug txivneej moog ntaus rog.
Mauxes tso puab moog ntaus rog, tug povthawj Ele-axas tug tub Finehas ua tug coj, nwg yog tug kws coj tej khoom dlawbhuv hab cov raaj xyu kws tshuab txhib tua rog.
Puab tua cov Midias lawv le tug TSWV saamfwm rua Mauxes, puab muab cov txivneej tua tuag taag huv tuabsi,
hab tseem tua cov Midias tsib tug vaajntxwv kws yog Evis, Lekees, Xules, Hules hab Lenpas tuag huv tuabsi. Hab puab tseem tua Npe-aus tug tub Npala-aas tuag lawm hab.
Cov Yixalayees txhaj nteg tau taagnrho cov Midias cov quaspuj hab mivnyuas, tej nyuj, tej yaaj hab fuab taagnrho puab tej nyaj txag qoobloo lug,
hab muab puab tej nroog tej yeej hlawv kub nyab taag.
Puab sau taagnrho tej khoom kws puab fuab tau, cov tuabneeg kws puab nteg tau hab tej tsaj txhu huv tuabsi
coj lug cob rua Mauxes, Ele-axas hab cov pejxeem Yixalayees huv lub yeej ntawm taj Mau-am kws nyob ntawm tug ntug Dlej Yauladees kws ncaaj lub nroog Yelekaus.
Mauxes, Ele-axas hab cov thawjcoj ntawm cov pejxeem txhaj tawm moog rua nrau ntug yeej, moog tog cov tubrog rov qaab lug.
Mauxes chim heev rua cov thawj tubrog kws kaav pawg txheeb hab kaav pawg pua kws rov tom tshaav rog lug.
Mauxes nug puab has tas, “Vim le caag mej tseem yuav tseg cov quaspuj nuav ua dlaabtsi?

Ncu ntsoov has tas, puab tub yog cov quaspuj kws coj lawv le Npala-aas tej lug qha thaus nyob tom Pe-aus. Hab puab tub coj cov tuabneeg moog ua tsi ncaaj hab muab tug TSWV tso tseg, vim le ntawd, tug TSWV tsaav tuabneeg txhaj raug tej kaab mob phem.
Taamsim nuav ca le muab txhua tug mivnyuas tub tua povtseg kuas taag hab muab cov quaspuj kws mej nrug pw lawm tua povtseg huv tuabsi,
tabsis tseg cov hluas nkauj hab cov nkaujxwb kws tsi tau ntxag dlua hluas nraug rua mej xwb.

Nwgnuav mej txhua tug kws tau tua ib tug twg tuag lossis tau cev teg tuav tej tuabneeg tuag lawm, yuavtsum nyob saab nrau ntug yeej xyaa nub. Nub peb hab nub xyaa ua kevcai ntxuav mej hab cov quaspuj kws mej nteg tau lug ntawd tsaiv.
Hab mej yuavtsum ua kevcai ntxuav rua tej khaub dluag txhua dlaim hab txhua yaam kws yog muab tawv tsaj, plaub tshis lossis ntoo ua huv tuabsi.”
Ele-axas kws yog tug povthawj has rua cov kws rov tom tshaav rog lug has tas, “Ntawm nuav yog tej kevcai kws tug TSWV tau muab cob rua Mauxes.
Kub, nyaj, tooj, hlau, txhuas, tooj dlawb
hab txhua yaam kws thev taug suavtawg, mej yuavtsum coj moog hlawv huv qhovcub hab muab dlej ntxuav txhaj huv. Hab yaam twg kws thev tsi taug suavtawg, mej yuavtsum muab dlej ntxuav txhaj huv.
Nub xyaa mej ca le muab mej tej rig tsho ntxhua; mej txhaj huv hab txhaj lug tau rua huv lub yeej.”
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas,
“Koj hab Ele-axas moog nrug cov thawjcoj ntawm cov pejxeem suav txhua yaam kws mej moog fuab tau lug, suav tej tuabneeg kws mej nteg tau lug hab tej tsaj txhu huv tuabsi.
Hab muab tej khoom kws fuab tau lug nuav faib ua ob pawg, muab ib pawg rua cov tubrog, muab ib pawg rua cov pejxeem.

Pawg kws yog cov tubrog tug, yuavtsum muab ib leeg ntawm tsib puas leej kws raug nteg lug coj moog ua se them rua tug TSWV, hab tej nyuj, tej neeg luav, tej yaaj hab tej tshis los ua ib yaam nkaus le ntawd.
Muab tej ntawd rua tug povthawj Ele-axas ib yaam le muab ua khoom pub tshwjxeeb rua tug TSWV.

Pawg kws yog cov pejxeem tug, muab ib leeg ntawm tsib caug leej kws raug nteg lug hab tej nyuj, tej neeg luav, tej yaaj hab tej tshis los ua ib yaam nkaus le ntawd. Muab rua cov Levis kws yog cov tu tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub.”
Mauxes hab Ele-axas obtug ua lawv le tug TSWV tau saamfwm rua obtug lawm.
Taagnrho tej kws cov tubrog moog fuab tau lug hab cov kws tseg ca rua puab: muaj rau pua xyaa caum tsib txheeb tug yaaj hab tshis,
xyaa caum ob txheeb tug nyuj,
rau caum ib txheeb tug neeg luav,
hab peb caug ob txheeb tug ntxhais nkaujxwb kws tsi tau ntxag dlua hluas nraug le.
Hab ib nraab kws muab faib rua cov tubrog, suav tau peb puas peb caug xyaa txheeb tsib puas tug yaaj hab tshis,
cov kws muab rhu moog rua tug TSWV yog rau pua xyaa caum tsib tug;
peb caug rau txheeb tug nyuj, cov kws muab rhu moog rua tug TSWV yog xyaa caum ob tug;
peb caug txheeb tsib puas tug neeg luav, cov kws muab rhu moog rua tug TSWV yog rau caum ib tug;
kaum rau txheeb tug ntxhais nkaujxwb, cov kws muab rhu moog rua tug TSWV muaj peb caug ob leeg.
Yog le ntawd, Mauxes txhaj coj cov se nuav moog rua Ele-axas muab pub tshwjxeeb rua tug TSWV, lawv le tug TSWV tau has rua Mauxes lawm.
Tej khoom kws cov tubrog moog fuab tau lug Mauxes muab ib nraab faib rua cov pejxeem,
