cov kws faib rua cov pejxeem muaj peb puas peb caug xyaa txheeb tsib puas tug yaaj hab tshis,
peb caug rau txheeb tug nyuj,
peb caug txheeb tsib puas tug neeg luav,
hab kaum rau txheeb tug ntxhais nkaujxwb.

Pawg nuav Mauxes rhu ib leeg ntawm tsib caug leej kws raug nteg lug, hab tej tsaj txhu los rhu ib yaam nkaus le ntawd, coj moog rua cov Levis kws tu tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub, lawv le tug TSWV tau has rua Mauxes lawm.
Ces cov thawj tubrog txhaj moog cuag Mauxes
hab tshaab xu rua nwg has tas, “Peb cov kws yog koj tubkhai, suav cov tubrog kws nyob huv peb kev tswjfwm tsi muaj ib tug pluj le.
Yog le ntawd peb txhaj nqaa tej saw kub, tej paugteg, tej saw teg, tej nplhaib hab tej paug kws peb fuab tau lug huv tuabsi tuaj. Peb coj tej ntawd tuaj fij rua tug TSWV theej peb lub txhoj.”
Mauxes hab Ele-axas txhaj txais tej kub hab tej saw ntawd.
Taagnrho tej khoom kws cov thawj tubrog coj tuaj ntawd nyaav tshaaj plaub puas choj.
Cov tubrog ca puab yuav tej kws puab fuab tau lug.
Yog le ntawd, Mauxes hab Ele-axas coj tej kub ntawd moog tso rua huv lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib, tug TSWV txhaj tsomkwm cov Yixalayees.
Xeem Lunpees hab xeem Khas muaj tsaj txhu coob heev. Thaus puab pum lub tebchaws Yaxes hab lub tebchaws Nkile-as kws yog qhov chaw zoo ua tshaav tsaj rua puab tej tsaj,
puab txhaj moog cuag Mauxes, Ele-axas hab cov thawjcoj, puab thov has tas,

“Tug TSWV paab cov Yixalayees tua tau cov nroog nuav: lub nroog Atalaus, lub nroog Dinpoos, lub nroog Yaxes, lub nroog Nilas, lub nroog Hesenpoos, lub nroog Ele-ales, lub nroog Simas, lub nroog Nenpaus hab lub nroog Npe-oos kws yog lub tebchaws kws zoo ua tshaav tsaj, hab peb muaj tsaj txhu coob kawg le.
Yog meb pum zoo, thov muab lub tebchaws nuav pub rua peb ua peb tug, hab thov tsi xob ca peb hlaa tug Dlej Yauladees moog nyob saab tid.”
Mauxes teb Khas hab Lunpees cov xeebntxwv has tas, “Mej xaav nyob ntawm nuav hab ca mej cov kwvtij Yixalayees moog ntaus rog xwb los?
Ua le caag mej yuav khuv ca mej cov kwvtij Yixalayees muaj kev tu sab rua qhov kws hlaa tug Dlej Yauladees moog rua tim lub tebchaws kws tug TSWV muab rua puab?
Mej ua ib yaam le thaus kuv tso cov kws yog mej txiv tawm huv lub nroog Kades Npane-as moog soj lub tebchaws lug txug hab puab ua ntaag.

Puab moog txug tim lub Haav Esekaus hab moog pum lub tebchaws ntawd taag lawm, tabsis thaus puab rov qaab lug, puab ua rua cov pejxeem taag kev ca sab, puab txhaj tsi xaav moog rua huv lub tebchaws kws tug TSWV muab rua puab lawm.
Nub ntawd tug TSWV txhaj chim heev hab nwg tau coglug tseg le nuav:

‘Vim puab tsi muab sab npuab kuv, mas txhua tug txivneej kws noobnyoog neeg nkaum xyoo rov sau kws kuv coj nraag tebchaws Iziv lug, yuav tsi tau moog nyob huv lub tebchaws kws kuv coglug rua Anplahaas, Ixaj hab Yakhauj puab lawm.’

Cov lug nuav yog has rua txhua tug huv tuabsi, tsuas yog tshuav Yefunes tug tub Kalej kws yog cov Kenais hab Noos tug tub Yausuas nkaus xwb txhaj yuav tau moog nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd; rua qhov obtug yeej ibtxwm fwm tug TSWV.

Tug TSWV chim heev rua cov tuabneeg ntawd, nwg txhaj ua rua puab ncig moog ncig lug tau plaub caug xyoo rua tom taj suabpuam, ua rua tam tuabneeg kws tsi txaus sab rua nwg ntawd tuag taag huv tuabsi lawm.
Hab taamsim nuav mej sawv lug hloov cov kws yog mej txiv chaw, mej cov tuabneeg txhum kws yog tam nuav, taabtom ua rua tug TSWV txujkev chim lug raug cov Yixalayees dlua.

Yog nwgnuav xeem Lunpees hab xeem Khas tsi kaam ua lawv le tug TSWV has, nwg yuav rov muab cov tuabneeg nuav tso tseg ib zag ntxiv rua ntawm taj suabpuam nuav, hab mej yuav ua rua cov tuabneeg nuav raug kev puamtsuaj dlua.”
Puab txaav zog lug rua ntawm Mauxes hab has tas, “Thov ca peb muab pobzeb lug txhim nkuaj kaw peb tej yaaj hab ua nroog rua peb tej quaspuj mivnyuas nyob ntawm nuav tsaiv.

Ces peb yuav nrug peb cov kwvtij Yixalayees moog ntaus rog hab nas tsaam ua ntej moog txug thaus puab tau moog nyob huv lub tebchaws kws yog puab tug. Lub sijhawm ntawd peb tej quaspuj mivnyuas yuav nyob huv tej nroog kws txhim ntsaa zeb, kuas puab txhaj nyob tso sab lug tsi ntshai cov tuabneeg huv lub tebchaws nuav.
Peb yuav tsi rov qaab lug tsev moog txug thaus cov Yixalayees tau lub tebchaws kws hom tseg rua puab lug ua puab tug lawm tsaiv.
Peb yuav tsi nrug puab faib ib qho aav kws nyob ntawm tug Dlej Yauladees saab tid rua peb, rua qhov peb tub tau thaaj chaw kws nyob ntawm tug Dlej Yauladees saab nubtuaj nuav ua peb tug lawm.”
Mauxes teb has tas, “Yog mej txaus sab ua lawv le kws mej has tag, ces mej ca le npaaj cuabyeej kuas txhij moog ntaus rog taabmeeg tug TSWV.
Taagnrho mej cov tubrog ca le hlaa tug dlej Yauladees moog rua saab tid taabmeeg tug TSWV, moog txug thaus tug TSWV tua yeej nwg cov yeebncuab,
hab txeeb tau lub tebchaws lug nyob lawm. Tom qaab ntawd, mej maam rov qaab lug, rua qhov mej yuav ua kuas tav lawv le mej tshuav tug TSWV hab mej cov kwvtij Yixalayees nqe.
Tabsis yog mej tsi ua lawv le mej coglug tseg, kuv qha rua mej has tas, mej ua txhum rua tug TSWV ntaag. Yog mej tsi ua le ntawd, mej yuav raug txim vim mej tej kev txhum.
Yog le ntawd, ca le txhim nroog rua mej nyob hab txhim nkuaj kaw mej tej yaaj, tabsis ncu ntsoov ua lawv le tej lug kws mej tau cog tseg lawm!”
Xeem Khas hab xeem Lunpees teb has tas, “Peb cov kws yog koj tubkhai, peb yuav ua le koj has ntaag.
Peb tej quaspuj hab mivnyuas, tej nyuj hab tej yaaj, yuav nyob huv lub nroog Nkile-as nuav.
Tabsis taagnrho peb cov txivneej kws yog koj cov tubkhai yuav npaaj moog ntaus rog taabmeeg tug TSWV. Peb yuav hlaa tug dlej Yauladees moog rua saab tid hab ntaus rog lawv le koj has.”
Yog le ntawd, Mauxes txhaj muab tej lug saamfwm nuav rua Ele-axas, Yausuas hab cov Yixalayees lwm tug thawjcoj has tas:

“Yog xeem Khas hab xeem Lunpees hlaa tug dlej Yauladees moog ntaus rog lawv le tug TSWV tej lug saamfwm hab yog puab paab mej tua kuas yeej lub tebchaws ntawd, ces mej ca le tu lub tebchaws Nkile-as rua puab nyob ua puab tug.
Tabsis yog puab tsi hlaa tug dlej Yauladees hab tsi nrug mej moog ntaus rog, ces puab yuav tau nrug mej nyob lub tebchaws Kana-aas ib yaam le mej tau hab.”
Xeem Khas hab xeem Lunpees teb has tas, “Lawv le tug TSWV tau saamfwm rua koj cov tubkhai nuav lawm, peb yuav ua le ntawd ntaag.
Peb yuav hlaa tug dlej Yauladees moog rua tim lub tebchaws Kana-aas taabmeeg tug TSWV hab moog ntaus rog, kuas peb txhaj tau tug Dlej Yauladees saab nubtuaj nuav ua peb tug.”

Yog le ntawd, Mauxes txhaj muab cov Amaules tug Vaajntxwv Xihoos lub nroog hab cov Npasaas tug vaajntxwv Aunkas lub nroog, taagnrho lub tebchaws nrug tej nroog hab ib cheebtsaam kws nyob puagncig tej nroog ntawd tu rua xeem Khas, xeem Lunpees hab xeem Manaxes ib nraab rua puab nyob ua puab tug.
Xeem Khas txhaj rov txhim khu dlua puab tej nroog rua huv Dinpoos, Atalaus, Alu-es,
Etelas Saufas, Yaxes, Yaunpehas,
Npethes Nilas hab Npethes Halaas.
Xeem Lunpees txhaj rov txhim khu dlua puab tej nroog rua huv Hesenpoos, Ele-ales, Kili-athas,
Nenpaus, Npa-aas Me-oos, (lub npe nuav tub hloov lawm), hab Xinpemas. Puab tis dlua npe tshab taagnrho rua tej nroog kws puab txhim khu dlua tshab nuav huv tuabsi.

Makhis cuab kwvtij kws yog xeem Manaxes, moog txeeb tau lub tebchaws Nkile-as, puab kaav hlo lub tebchaws ntawd hab muab cov Amaules kws ibtxwm nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd lawv tawm tsiv huv tuabsi lawm.
Yog le ntawd, Mauxes txhaj muab lub tebchaws Nkele-as rua Makhis cuab kwvtij, ces puab txhaj nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd lawm.
Yailes kws yog xeem Manaxes moog tua hab txeeb tau lub puav zog, hab nwg tis npe rua cov zog ntawd hu ua, “Yais cov zog.”
Naunpas moog tua hab txeeb tau lub nroog Kenas hab tej zog miv kws nyob ibncig ntawd, hab nwg muab lub nroog ntawd tis npe hu ua Naunpas, lawv le nwg lub npe ntaag.

Txij ntawm nuav moog yog qha txug tej thaaj chaw kws cov Yixalayees tsuam yeej ua ntu zug taug kev nraag tebchaws Iziv lug kws yog Mauxes hab Aloos obtug ua ob tug coj taagnrho puab txhua xeem huv tuabsi.
Mauxes teev tej thaaj chaw kws cov Yixalayees tsuam yeej ua ntu zug lug, lawv le tug TSWV tau saamfwm rua Mauxes lawm.

Cov Yixalayees sawv kev tawm nraag Iziv lug yog lub ib hlis ntuj nub kaum tsib kws yog tom qaab nub kws puab ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau. Tug TSWV tsomkwm puab tawm huv lub nroog Lamexes lug taabmeeg cov Iziv,
thaus cov Iziv taabtom log puab tej tub hlub kws tug TSWV muab tua tuag taag lawm. Tub yog le nuav, tug TSWV txhaj qha has tas, nwg yog tug muaj fwjchim luj dlua cov Iziv tej vaajtswv huv tuabsi.
Cov Yixalayees sawv kev huv lub nroog Lamexes lug hab tsuam yeej su rua ntawm Xukaus.
Puab sawv kev ntawm Xukaus lug tsuam yeej rua ntawm Ethas kws nyob ntawm ntug taj suabpuam.
Puab tawm huv Ethas rov moog rua ntawm Pis Hahilaus kws nyob ntawm Npa-aas Xefoos saab nubtuaj, hab puab tsuam yeej ze rua ntawm Midaules.
Puab sawv kev ntawm Pis Hahilaus hab lug hlaa Havtxwv Lab moog rua tom taj suabpuam Ethas; tom qaab kws puab lug tau peb nub ke lawm, puab txhaj lug tsuam yeej rua ntawm Malahas.
Thaus puab sawv kev ntawm Malahas lug rua ntawm Elimes, puab txhaj tsuam yeej rua qhov ntawd, rua qhov nyob ntawd muaj kaum ob lub qhovdlej hab xyaa caum tsob toovlaaj.
Puab sawv kev ntawm Elimes lug tsuam yeej ze rua ntawm ceg Havtxwv Lab.
Puab sawv kev ntawm Elimes lug tsuam yeej rua ntawm taj suabpuam Xees.
Ces puab sawv kev ntawm taj suabpuam Xees lug tsuam yeej rua ntawm Daufekas,
hab tom qaab ntawd puab lug tsuam yeej rua tom Aluses,
dlhau qhov ntawd lug, puab txhaj lug tsuam yeej rua ntawm Lefidees, qhov chaw kws tsi muaj dlej rua cov tuabneeg haus.

Thaus puab sawv kev ntawm Lefidees hab tsuam yeej ua ntu zug lug txug rua ntawm lub Roob Haules: puab lug nyob rua ntawm taj suabpuam Xinais, Kinpaus Hata-avas, (lossis “Cov Tuabneeg Nqhes Dlej Tej Qhov Ntxaa”), Haxelaus, Lithamas, Limoos Peles, Linpanas, Lixas, Kehelathas, lub Roob Sefeles, Haladas, Makhelaus, Tahas, Telas, Mithakas, Hasemaunas, Mauxelaus, Npenes Ya-akaas, Haules Hankinkas, Yanpathas, Alaunas, Exi-oosnkenpes, ntawm taj suabpuam Xees, (kws yog Kades) hab lug rua ntawm lub Roob Haules kws nyob ntawm nrimteb Edoos.

Tug povthawj Aloos nce moog rua sau lub Roob Haules lawv le tug TSWV tau saamfwm. Aloos tuag rua sau lub roob ntawd, thaus nwg noobnyoog muaj ib puas neeg nkaum peb xyoos rua nub xab ib lub tsib hlis ntuj xyoo plaub caug tom qaab cov Yixalayees tsiv nraag tebchaws Iziv lug.
Cov Alas tug vaajntxwv kws kaav lub tebchaws Kana-aas saab qaabteb nov has tas, cov Yixalayees taabtom sawv kev lug lawm.

Thaus cov Yixalayees sawv kev ntawm Roob Haules lug rua ntawm lub taj Mau-am, puab tsuam yeej ua ntu zug lawv le tej chaw nuav: Xalemaunas, Punoos, Aunpaus, ntawm Anpalees kws puamtsuaj taag huv tebchaws Mau-am, Dinpoos Nkas, Alemoos Dilathayees, ntawm lub Roob Anpalees kws nyob ze lub Roob Nenpaus, hab tom lub taj Mau-am ntawm ntug Dlej Yauladees kws nyob ncaaj lub nroog Yelikaus, huv lub Haav Npethes Yesimaus hab lub Haav Akaxias kis nruab nraab.
Thaus nyob huv lub taj Mau-am ntawm ntug Dlej Yauladees kws nyob ncaaj lub nroog Yelikaus, tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas,
“Koj yuavtsum qha tej lug nuav rua cov Yixalayees has tas, ‘Thaus mej hlaa tug Dlej Yauladees moog rua tim tebchaws Kana-aas,

mej yuavtsum muab taagnrho cov tuabneeg kws ibtxwm nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd lawv tsiv moog kuas taag. Muab puab tej mlom pobzeb, mlom hlau hab puab tej chaw teev dlaab tsoo kuas puamtsuaj taag huv tuabsi.’
Txeeb lub tebchaws ntawd lug rua mej hab muab mej cov tuabneeg faib moog nyob kuas thoob plawg huv lub tebchaws ntawd, rua qhov kuv muab lub tebchaws ntawd rua mej lawm.
Muab lub tebchaws rhu ntawv faib rua tej xeem hab tej cuab kwvtij, tej thaaj aav kws dlaav, muab rua tej cuab kwvtij coob hab tej thaaj aav kws nqaim muab rua tej cuab kwvtij tsawg.

Tabsis yog mej tsi muab cov tuabneeg kws ibtxwm nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd lawv tawm, cov tuabneeg kws mej tseg ca yuav ua kev nyuaj sab rua mej ib yaam le tug saus kws nyob huv mej qhovmuag hab tej maab xuavpaug kws nyob ntawm mej ib saab, hab puab yuav tawmtsaam mej.
Yog mej tsi lawv puab tawm, kuv yuav ua kuas mej puamtsuaj lawv le kuv tub npaaj yuav ua rua puab, kuas puab raug kev puamtsuaj.”
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas,

“Koj yuavtsum qha tej lug nuav rua cov tuabneeg Yixalayees has tas, ‘Thaus mej moog rua huv lub tebchaws Kana-aas kws kuv muab rua mej lawm, mej tej nrimteb kws yog mej lub tebchaws yuav muaj lawv le nuav:
Saab qaabteb, tug nrim txij ndlua ntawm taj suabpuam Xees lawv cov Edoos tug nrimteb. Pib kag ntawm saab nubtuaj qaabteb lug xaus rua ntawm Havtxwv tuag.

Ces mej tug nrimteb yuav tig moog rua saab qaabteb ncaaj nraim moog rua ntawm lub dlawm Alanpees hab hlaa moog rua ntawm taj suabpuam Xees hab moog txug ntawm Kades Npane-as saab qaabteb. Ces tug nrimteb nkhaus rov nce toj moog rua saab qaumteb nubpoob moog rua Haxas Adales hab moog txug ndlua rua ntawm Axemoos,
tug nrimteb yuav nkhaus lawv lub haav ntawm Iziv tug nrimteb moog xaus rua peg Havtxwv Meditelanees.’
“Saab nubpoob tug nrimteb lawv ntug Havtxwv Meditelanees nce toj.
“Saab qaumteb tug nrimteb yuav lawv ntug Havtxwv Meditelanees moog rua peg lub Roob Haules
hab pib ntawm lub Roob Haules, mej hom ncaaj nraim moog txug ndlua rua ntawm txujkev kws moog rua ntawm lub dlawm Hamas, hab tug nrimteb dlhau qhov ntawd moog txug ndlua ntawm Xedas,
hab moog txug rua ntawm Xifaloos, moog xaus rua ntawm Haxas Enas.
“Saab nubtuaj, mej hom tug nrimteb pib kag ntawm Haxas Enas moog rua ntawm Sefas.
Ces tug nrimteb yuav lem moog rua saab qaabteb, moog txug rua ntawm Linpelas saab nubtuaj ntawm lub nroog Ayees, hab moog txug ntawm cov laaj roob tim ntug Havtxwv Kalilais saab nubtuaj.
Tug nrimteb moog rua saab qaabteb, yog lawv tug Dlej Yauladees nqeg haav moog xaus rua ntawm Havtxwv tuag. “Qhov nuav yuav yog mej lub tebchaws plaub saab nrimteb.”

Yog le ntawd, Mauxes txhaj has rua cov Yixalayees has tas, “Ntawm nuav yog lub tebchaws kws mej yuav tau moog nyob hab rhu ntawv faib, yog lub tebchaws kws tug TSWV muab rua mej cuaj xeem hab ib nraab xeem nyob.
Xeem Lunpees, xeem Khas hab ib nraab ntawm xeem Manaxes kws nyob saab nubtuaj tub tau tebchaws nyob ua puab tug hab muab faib lawv le puab tej tsev tuabneeg lawm,
yog nyob ntawm tug ntug dlej Yauladees saab nubtuaj, ncaaj lub nroog Yelikaus saab tid.”
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas,
“Koj ca le kuas tug povthawj Ele-axas hab Noos tug tub Yausuas, ca le muab lub tebchaws nuav faib rua cov tuabneeg nyob.
Muab ib xeem ib tug thawjcoj moog paab obtug.”

Ntawm nuav yog cov tuabneeg kws tug TSWV xaiv tej npe: Yudas yog Yefunes tug tub Kalej Xime-oos yog Amihus tug tub Selumiyees Npeenyamees yog Khixeloos tug tub Elidas Daas yog Yaunkelis tug tub Npukis Manaxes yog Efaus tug tub Haniyees Efalayees yog Sifetas tug tub Kemuyees Xenpuloos yog Palenas tug tub Elixafas Ixakhas yog Axas tug tub Patiyees Aseles yog Selaumis tug tub Ahihus Nathalis yog Amihus tug tub Pedahees.
Cov tuabneeg nuav yog cov kws tug TSWV tsaa ua cov faib lub tebchaws Kana-aas rua cov Yixalayees nyob ua puab tug.
Thaus tseem nyob huv lub taj ntawm tug Dlej Yauladees kws ncaaj lub nroog Yelikaus, tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas,
“Koj ca le has rua cov Yixalayees, kuas puab muab tej aav kws puab tau lug ua puab tug lawm qee lub nroog hab tej tshaav zaub kws nyob ibncig ntawm tej nroog ntawd rua cov Levis.
Tej nroog ntawd yuav ua cov Levis tug, hab puab yuav nyob qhov ntawd moog le. Tej tshaav zaub los yuav ua tshaav rua puab tej nyuj hab lwm yaam tsaj huv tuabsi.
Lub tshaav zaub pib ntawm tug ntsaa yeej moog, kuas ib saab twg muaj ob puas tsib caug dlaaj,
yog le ntawd, mej ntsuag kuas dlaav xwmfaab xwmmeem, ib meem twg kuas muaj tsib puas dlaaj, txhaj txaus ua lub nroog rua huv plawv.
Mej yuavtsum muab rau lub nroog rua cov Levis, ca rua cov tuabneeg tua tuabneeg tau tsiv moog cawm sav. Mej yuavtsum muab plaub caug ob lub nroog ntxiv rua puab hab,
taagnrho kuas muaj plaub caug yim lub nroog, nrug rua puab tej tshaav tsaj huv tuabsi.
Cov nroog kws cov Yixalayees muab ua cov Levis tug, tej xeem coob muab ntau lub nroog rua, tej xeem tsawg muab tsawg lub nroog rua.”
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas,
“Koj qha rua cov Yixalayees has tas, ‘Thaus puab hlaa tug Dlej Yauladees moog txug rua huv tebchaws Kana-aas lawm,
mej xaiv ib cov nroog ca rua cov tuabneeg kws tua tuabneeg tau tsiv moog cawm sav.

Qhov ntawd yuav ua ib qhov chaw rua tug tuabneeg kws tua tuabneeg tau tsiv moog nraim tug tuag tej kwvtij kws nrhav nwg tua povtseg pauj tug tuag lawm. Kuas tug kws yuam kev tua tuabneeg ntawd tsi raug tua tuag ua ntej luas coj nwg moog cuag cov tu plaub ntug txav txim rua nwg.’
Xaiv rau lub nroog,
peb lub rua tim tug Dlej Yauladees saab nubtuaj hab peb lub rua huv tebchaws Kana-aas.

Cov nroog nuav yuav ca ua ib cov nroog cawm sav lossis nraim cev rua cov Yixalayees hab cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws kws nrug mej nyob ib ntus lossis nyob moog le. Yog leejtwg tua ib tug twg tuag, tug ntawd ca le tsiv moog nkaum rua huv cov nroog ntawd ib lub.

“Yog leejtwg lossis ib tug tuabneeg twg siv tej cuabyeej kws yog hlau lossis pobzeb lossis ntoo tua ib tug tuabneeg tuag, nwg yog tug muaj txim tua tuabneeg hab yuavtsum muab nwg tua kuas tuag pauj tug ntawd.
Tug tuag ntawd cov kwvtij txheeb ze muab tug txivneej kws tua tuabneeg ntawd tua kuas tuag. Thaus nwg nrhav tau tug tuabneeg ntawd, ces nwg ca le muab tua kuas tuag.
“Yog tug txivneej twg ntxub luas hab muab tug ntawd tua kws yog muab nwg thawb qaug lossis muab ib yaam dlaabtsi ntaus tug ntawd tuag,

lossis yog muab nrig ntaus, nwg yog tug muaj txim tua tuabneeg, hab ca le muab nwg ntaus kuas tuag. Tug tuag ntawd tug kwvtij txheeb ze muab tug txivneej kws tua tuabneeg ntawd tua kuas tuag. Thaus nwg nrhav tau tug kws tua tuabneeg ntawd, nwg ca le muab ntaus kuas tuag.
“Tabsis yog tug txivneej twg tua ib tug tuabneeg twg tuag kws tsi yog nwg tug yeebncuab, tsi has muab thawb qaug lossis laim tej yaam dlaabtsi moog raug tuag.
Lossis yog tug txivneej ntawd tsi ua tuab zoo saib, nwg laim pobzeb moog raug ib tug tuabneeg twg tuag kws tsi yog nwg tug yeebncuab, hab tsi yog nwg txhobtxwm ntaus.

Yog muaj tej plaub ntug zoo le has nuav, ca cov pejxeem ua cov txav txim rua tug kws tua tuabneeg tuag ntawd kuas lawv le puab pum zoo, mas tsi pub ua lawv le tug tuabneeg tuag ntawd cov kwvtij xaav ua pauj.

Cov pejxeem kws tuaj tu plaub, yuavtsum paab tug tuabneeg kws tua tuabneeg ntawd kuas dlim ntawm tug tuag cov kwvtij kws yuav muab nwg tua pauj, hab puab muab nwg tso rov qaab moog tom lub nroog cawm sav kws nwg tsiv moog nkaum. Nwg yuavtsum nyob tod txug thaus tug Povthawj Hlub kws muab roj pleev hab txhawb meejthawj tuag lawm tsaiv, nwg maam rov qaab lug.
Yog tug txivneej kws tua tuabneeg ntawd ca le txhobtxwm tawm huv lub nroog cawm sav kws nwg tsiv moog nkaum ntawd,
hab yog tug tuag ntawd cov kwvtij pum nwg hab muab nwg tua tuag lawm, ces qhov kws ua pauj le ntawd tsi yog txim tua tuabneeg.
Tug txivneej kws tua tuabneeg ntawd yuavtsum nyob tuabywv huv lub nroog cawm sav moog txug thaus tug Povthawj Hlub tuag lawm, tom qaab ntawd nwg maam le rov lug tsev tau.
Txuj kevcai tswjfwm nuav muab cob rua koj hab koj cov xeebntxwv kws yuav faib moog nyob rua txhua qhov chaw.

“Yog leejtwg laam tau laam tua tuabneeg, yuavtsum muab tug ntawd tua povtseg yog has tas muaj ob leeg lossis coob tshaaj ntawd ua timkhawv; yog muaj ib tug ua timkhawv xwb, tej lug timkhawv tsi tau txaus muab tug tuabneeg ntawd tua povtseg.
Leejtwg tua tuabneeg, yuavtsum muab nwg tua pauj. Muab nyaj txhwv nwg lub txim tua tuabneeg ntawd tsi tau.
Yog tug tuabneeg ntawd tsiv moog nkaum rua huv lub nroog cawm sav lawm, tsi xob ca nwg them nyaj kuas muab nwg tso rov lug tsev ua ntej kws tug Povthawj Hlub tuag.

Yog mej ua le nuav, ces yog mej txhobtxwm ua kuas lub tebchaws kws mej nyob ntawd tsi huv. Tua tuabneeg tuag ua rua lub tebchaws tsi huv, hab tsi muaj ib yaam dlaabtsi yuav ntxuav tau kuas lub tebchaws nuav huv, tsuas yog muab tug tuabneeg tua tuabneeg ntawd tua povtseg nkaus xwb.
Mej tsi xob ua rua lub tebchaws tsi huv, rua qhov kuv yog mej tug TSWV hab kuv nrug nraim tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees nyob.”
Cov thawjcoj ntawm Nkile-as cuab kwvtij kws yog Makhis tug tub hab yog Yauxej tug tub Manaxes tug xeebntxwv txhaj moog cuag Mauxes hab lwm tug thawjcoj.

Puab moog thov has tas, “Tug TSWV has rua mej lawm, nwg muab lub tebchaws nuav rhu ntawv faib rua cov Yixalayees nyob. Hab nwg has rua mej kuas muab peb tug kwvtij Xelufehas tej qubtxeeg qubteg rua nwg cov ntxhais.
Tabsis mej yuavtsum ncu ntsoov, yog puab moog yuav quasyawg rua lwm xeem lawm, ces puab tej qubtxeeg qubteg yuav yog xeem ntawd tug, hab tej kws yog peb ndlag tug yuav tsawg heev lawm.

Thaus txug Xyoo Thim kws thim tej qubtxeeg qubteg kws muab muag lawm rov qaab lug rua tug qub tswv, yuav tau muab Xelufehas tej qubtxeeg qubteg ntxiv rua xeem kws nwg cov ntxhais moog yuav ntawd, hab peb xeem yuav tsi tau tej ntawd le lawm.”
Yog le ntawd, Mauxes txhaj has rua cov Yixalayees lawv le tug TSWV tej lug kws has tas, “Tej lug kws xeem Manaxes has ntawd yeej yog lawm,
hab tug TSWV has tseg tas, Xelaufehas cov ntxhais muaj cai yuav tau quasyawg lawv le puab sab nyam, tabsis yuavtsum yuav cov kws yog nwg xeem xwb.
Ua le ntawd kuas txhua xeem Yixalayees tej qubtxeeg qubteg txhaj yog nwg xeem ntawd tug moog le.

Txhua tug quaspuj kws muaj qubtxeeg qubteg nyob huv tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees xeem twg lawm, nwg yuavtsum yuav tug quasyawg kws yog xeem ntawd xwb. Ua le nuav txhua tug Yixalayees txhaj le yuav tau puab cov yawmkoob tej qubtxeeg qubteg ca
hab tej qubtxeeg qubteg ntawd txhaj tsi poob ntawm xeem nuav moog ua xeem tod tug. Txhua xeem Yixalayees nyag yuavtsum muaj nyag teej tug.”
Yog le ntawd, Malas, Tilexas, Haunkelas, Milekas hab Nau-es kws yog Xelufehas cov ntxhais, tau ua lawv le tug TSWV has rua Mauxes lawm, puab txhaj moog yuav puab cov nug kwvtij xwb.
Puab moog yuav Yauxej cov xeebntxwv kws yog xeem Manaxes cuab kwvtij, hab puab tej qubtxeeg qubteg txhaj tseem yog puab txiv tug.
Tej lug nuav yog kev tswjfwm hab kevcai kws tug TSWV saamfwm rua Mauxes kuas qha rua cov Yixalayees, thaus puab tseem nyob huv taj nraag Mau-am ntawm ntug Dlej Yauladees kws ncaaj lub nroog Yelikaus.
